Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
' Scripts to populate element tagged values from user-defined. WIP
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC TM Forum Scripts.Utility Scripts
const CW_DATA_TYPE_LOOKUP1 = "7" const CW_DATA_TYPE_LOOKUP2 = "9"
dim metamodelPropertyList 'as Scripting.Dictionary
populateElementProperties "{528F1124-6C38-4822-86CF-8DECFFED8B36}" ' Business Processes 'populateElementProperties "{ED525874-1825-41a4-AD9E-3E97C73AF111}" ' Process 'populateElementProperties "{4001E562-BC3A-40db-9D8A-1619B1BE37F2}" ' Metrics 'populateElementProperties "{DB857CCA-C67C-4438-837F-4ADBF5262897}" ' TAM 'populateElementProperties "{CA3C3C3B-361A-46e6-9DC1-DB94AC483E00}" ' Touchpoints
sub populateElementProperties(topPackageGUID)
dim topPackage as EA.Package
set metamodelPropertyList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary")
Session.Output vbCRLF & "Populating Element tagged values from CW user-defined properties...."
set topPackage = Repository.GetPackageByGuid(topPackageGUID)
updatePackageElements topPackage, 0
Session.Output vbCRLF & "Finished!"
end sub
sub updatePackageElements( package, level)
dim element as EA.Element dim childPackage as EA.Package
Session.Output String(level * 2, ".") & "Package '" & package.Name & "'..."
level = level + 1
for each element in package.Elements updateElement element, level next
for each childPackage in package.Packages updatePackageElements childPackage, level next
level = level - 1
end sub
sub updateElement( element, level)
dim taggedValue as EA.TaggedValue dim xmlString 'as String dim xmlDoc 'as XMLDOM dim nodeList 'as XMLNodeList dim propNode 'as XMLNode dim propName 'as String dim propValue 'as String dim childElement as EA.Element
set taggedValue = element.TaggedValues.GetByName("USERDEFINED")
if taggedValue is nothing then Session.Output String(level * 2, ".") & "<<" & element.Stereotype & ">> " & element.Name & " [" & element.Type & "] - No USERDEFINED properties; Skipping..." else
Session.Output String(level * 2, ".") & element.Name & " element - Processing USERDEFINED properties..."
xmlString = taggedValue.Notes
set xmlDoc = CreateObject( "Microsoft.XMLDOM")
xmlDoc.Async = false xmlDoc.LoadXML xmlString
set nodeList = xmlDoc.SelectNodes("//property")
for each propNode in nodeList
propName = propNode.GetAttribute( "scriptname") propValue = propNode.Text
setElementPropertyValue element, propName, propValue
next
level = level + 1
for each childElement in element.Elements updateElement childElement, level next
level = level - 1
end if
end sub
sub setElementPropertyValue( element, propName, propValue)
dim propList 'as Dictionary dim dataType 'as String dim classProp as EA.Element dim lookupValueElement as EA.Element
set propList = getMetamodelPropertyList( element.Stereotype)
if propList.Exists( propName) then
set classProp = propList.Item( propName)
dataType = getElementTaggedValueValue( classProp, "PPT_DATA_TYPE")
if dataType = CW_DATA_TYPE_LOOKUP1 or dataType = CW_DATA_TYPE_LOOKUP2 then
set lookupValueElement = lookupElementTaggedValue( "LU_ID", propValue, "lookupValue", "Part")
propValue = lookupValueElement.Name
end if
setElementTaggedValueValue element, classProp.Name, propValue
else Session.Output "***ERROR*** No metamodel class mapping property found for '" & propName & "'" end if
end sub
function getMetamodelPropertyList( stereotype)
dim metamodelClassName 'as String dim metamodelElement as EA.Element dim propList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim classProp 'as String dim propName 'as String
select case stereotype case "TMF_Application" metamodelClassName = "Frameworx Application" case "TMF_Function" metamodelClassName = "Frameworx Function" case "TMF_Domain" metamodelClassName = "Frameworx Domain" case "ArchiMate_BusinessInteraction" metamodelClassName = "Frameworx Business Scenario" case "TMF_Metric" metamodelClassName = "Frameworx Metric" case "TMF_BusinessProcess" metamodelClassName = "Frameworx Process" case "ArchiMate_BusinessService" metamodelClassName = "Frameworx Touchpoint" case "ArchiMate_BusinessProcess" metamodelClassName = "Process" case else metamodelClassName = vbNullString end select
if metamodelClassName = vbNullString then Session.Output "***ERROR*** No metamodel class mapping for stereotype '" & stereotype & "'" set propList = nothing else
if metamodelPropertyList.Exists( stereotype) then set propList = metamodelPropertyList.Item( stereotype) else
Session.Output "Building property list for '" & stereotype & "'..."
set metamodelElement = lookupElementName( metamodelClassName, vbNullString, "Class")
set propList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary")
for each classProp in metamodelElement.Elements
propName = getElementTaggedValueValue( classProp, "PPT_SCRPT_NAME")
if propName <> vbNullString then propList.Add propName, classProp end if
next
metamodelPropertyList.Add stereotype, propList
end if
end if
set getMetamodelPropertyList = propList
end function

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Value Stream Report" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script Name: Value Stream Stage List XML ' Author: Giu Platania ' Purpose: Build an XML (rows/columns) of all "Value Stream Stage" elements under a Value Stream, ' ordered by TreePos (then uniquely keyed), including basic details and related Value Items. ' Date: 2025-08-28 ' Version: 1.1 ' Notes: ' Robust against duplicate SortedList keys (TreePos/Name collisions) by appending ElementID. ' Defensive initialization of xmlDoc/xmlData in case the included library does not set them. ' Verbose logging to Script window for troubleshooting. ' Preserves and uses existing helper functions assumed from includes: createXMLDocument, addColumn, ' getTaggedValueValue, getRelatedElementList (from your utility libs). ' Returns a wellformed XML string.
Option Explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Report Scripts.Report Script Library
'=========================== ' Globals for XML document '=========================== Dim xmlDoc ' Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLDocument (late-bound) Dim xmlData ' Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLNode (late-bound) points to <Data> container
'=========================== ' Logging helpers '=========================== Private Sub EnsureOutput() On Error Resume Next Repository.EnsureOutputVisible "Script" On Error GoTo 0 End Sub
Private Sub LOG(msg) On Error Resume Next Session.Output CStr(Now) & ": " & msg On Error GoTo 0 End Sub
'========================================= ' Safe XML bootstrap (if include doesnt do it) '========================================= Private Sub EnsureXmlBootstrapped() On Error Resume Next If (xmlDoc Is Nothing) Then Set xmlDoc = CreateObject("MSXML2.DOMDocument.6.0") xmlDoc.appendChild xmlDoc.createProcessingInstruction("xml", "version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'") Dim root, data Set root = xmlDoc.createElement("Rows") xmlDoc.appendChild root Set data = xmlDoc.createElement("Data") root.appendChild data Set xmlData = data LOG "XML bootstrapped locally (<Rows><Data/>)." ElseIf (xmlData Is Nothing) Then Dim root2 Set root2 = xmlDoc.documentElement If Not root2 Is Nothing Then Set xmlData = xmlDoc.createElement("Data") root2.appendChild xmlData LOG "xmlData initialized onto existing xmlDoc root." Else ' Fallback: rebuild minimal structure Set xmlDoc = Nothing EnsureXmlBootstrapped End If End If On Error GoTo 0 End Sub
'========================================= ' Main entry: build XML for a Value Streams stages '========================================= Public Function getValueStreamStageList(valueStreamID) Dim valueStream ' As EA.Element Dim elementList ' As System.Collections.SortedList (late-bound) Dim streamStage ' As EA.Element Dim elementIndex ' As Integer Dim elementKey ' Variant (TreePos or Name)
EnsureOutput LOG "getValueStreamStageList: start (ValueStreamID=" & valueStreamID & ")"
' Resolve the Value Stream element Set valueStream = Repository.GetElementByID(valueStreamID) If valueStream Is Nothing Then LOG "ERROR: Element not found for ID=" & valueStreamID getValueStreamStageList = "" Exit Function End If
' Prepare XML document (prefer library routine, then ensure locally) On Error Resume Next createXMLDocument ' From included library expected to assign xmlDoc and xmlData On Error GoTo 0 EnsureXmlBootstrapped
' Sorted list to maintain order by TreePos/Name with stable uniqueness Set elementList = CreateObject("System.Collections.Sortedlist")
' Collect stages For Each streamStage In valueStream.Elements If streamStage.Stereotype = "Value Stream Stage" Then elementKey = streamStage.TreePos If (CLng(0) = 0) Then ' dummy statement to satisfy Option Explicit with CLng usage End If If (elementKey = 0) Then elementKey = streamStage.Name
' Add with duplicate-key resilience (SortedList.Add throws on duplicates) Dim added added = False On Error Resume Next elementList.Add elementKey, streamStage If Err.Number <> 0 Then ' Likely duplicate key append ElementID to ensure uniqueness while preserving ordering intent Err.Clear elementKey = CStr(elementKey) & "_" & CStr(streamStage.ElementID) elementList.Add elementKey, streamStage End If If Err.Number = 0 Then added = True On Error GoTo 0
If added Then LOG " + Stage queued: key=" & elementKey & " | Name=" & streamStage.Name & " | TreePos=" & streamStage.TreePos Else LOG " ! WARNING: Failed to queue stage: Name=" & streamStage.Name End If End If Next
' Emit rows to XML in sorted order For elementIndex = 0 To elementList.Count - 1 Set streamStage = elementList.GetByIndex(elementIndex) addDetailRow streamStage Next
getValueStreamStageList = xmlDoc.XML LOG "getValueStreamStageList: end (Rows=" & elementList.Count & ")" End Function
'========================================= ' Append one Row with the stages details '========================================= Private Sub addDetailRow(element) Dim xmlRow ' As Microsoft.XMLDOM.IXMLDOMNode Set xmlRow = xmlDoc.createElement("Row") xmlData.appendChild xmlRow
addColumn xmlRow, "Name", Nz(element.Name), False addColumn xmlRow, "Notes", Nz(element.Notes), True addColumn xmlRow, "EntranceCriteria", Nz(getTaggedValueValue(element, "Entrance Criteria")), False addColumn xmlRow, "ExitCriteria", Nz(getTaggedValueValue(element, "Exit Criteria")), False addColumn xmlRow, "ValueItemList", Nz(getValueItemList(element)), False End Sub
'========================================= ' Build a CRLF-delimited list of related Value Items (by offers association) '========================================= Private Function getValueItemList(element) Dim dict ' As Scripting.Dictionary Dim relatedElement ' As EA.Element Dim nameList ' As String
Set dict = getRelatedElementList(element, "Association", "offers", "Class", "Value Item")
nameList = vbNullString If Not dict Is Nothing Then For Each relatedElement In dict.Items If nameList <> vbNullString Then nameList = nameList & vbCrLf nameList = nameList & Nz(relatedElement.Name) Next End If
getValueItemList = nameList End Function
'========================================= ' Simple Null/Empty helper (returns empty string for Null/Empty) '========================================= Private Function Nz(val) If IsObject(val) Then If val Is Nothing Then Nz = "" Else Nz = val Else If IsNull(val) Or IsEmpty(val) Then Nz = "" Else Nz = val End If End Function
'========================================= ' Quick test harness (leave commented in production) '========================================= 'Private Sub test() ' EnsureOutput ' Session.Output getValueStreamStageList(404) 'End Sub ' 'test()

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Report Script Library" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
'' Moved to Model Management Utilities
function getTaggedValueValue( element, taggedValueName)
dim taggedValue as EA.TaggedValue dim taggedValueValue 'as String
set taggedValue = element.TaggedValues.GetByName( taggedValueName)
if taggedValue is nothing then taggedValueValue = "" else taggedValueValue = taggedValue.Value end if
getTaggedValueValue = taggedValueValue
end function
function getRelatedElement( element, connectorMetaType, connectorStereotype, relatedElementMetaType, relatedElementStereotype)
dim relatedElementList ' as Scripting.Dictionary dim relatedElementArray ' as Element()
set relatedElementList = getRelatedElementList( element, connectorMetaType, connectorStereotype, relatedElementMetaType, relatedElementStereotype)
if relatedElementList.Count > 0 then relatedElementArray = relatedElementList.Items set getRelatedElement = relatedElementArray(0) else set getRelatedElement = nothing end if
end function
function getRelatedElementList( element, connectorType, connectorStereotype, relatedElementType, relatedElementStereotype)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim relatedElementList dim relatedElementID dim relatedElement as EA.Element
set relatedElementList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary")
for each connector in element.Connectors
if connector.Type = connectorType then
if IsNull(connectorStereotype) or connector.Stereotype = connectorStereotype then
if connector.ClientID = element.ElementID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(relatedElementID)
if relatedElement.Type = relatedElementType then
if IsNull( relatedElementStereotype) or relatedElement.Stereotype = relatedElementStereotype then relatedElementList.Add relatedElement.ElementGUID, relatedElement end if
end if
end if
end if next
set getRelatedElementList = relatedElementList
end function
function getSortedRelatedElementList( element, connectorType, connectorStereotype, relatedElementType, relatedElementStereotype)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim relatedElementList dim relatedElementID dim relatedElement as EA.Element set relatedElementList = CreateObject( "System.Collections.SortedList")
for each connector in element.Connectors if connector.Type = connectorType then if IsNull(connectorStereotype) or connector.Stereotype = connectorStereotype then if connector.ClientID = element.ElementID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(relatedElementID) if relatedElement.Type = relatedElementType then if IsNull( relatedElementStereotype) or relatedElement.Stereotype = relatedElementStereotype then relatedElementList.Add relatedElement.Name, relatedElement end if end if end if end if next set getSortedRelatedElementList = relatedElementList end function
sub addColumn( xmlRow, name, text, formatted)
dim xmlColumn 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLNode dim xmlAttr 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLAttribute
set xmlColumn = xmlDoc.createElement( name) xmlColumn.Text = text
if formatted then
set xmlAttr = xmlDoc.CreateAttribute( "formatted") xmlAttr.Value = "1"
xmlColumn.Attributes.SetNamedItem xmlAttr
end if
xmlRow.appendChild xmlColumn
end sub
function createXMLDocument()
dim xmlProc 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLNode dim xmlRoot 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLNode dim xmlDataset 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLNode
set xmlDoc = CreateObject( "Microsoft.XMLDOM")
xmlDoc.validateOnParse = false xmlDoc.async = false
set xmlProc = xmlDoc.createProcessingInstruction("xml", "version='1.0' encoding='ISO-8859-1'") xmlDoc.appendChild xmlProc
set xmlRoot = xmlDoc.createElement( "EADATA") xmlDoc.appendChild xmlRoot
set xmlDataset = xmlDoc.createElement( "Dataset_0") xmlRoot.appendChild xmlDataset
set xmlData = xmlDoc.createElement( "Data") xmlDataSet.appendChild xmlData
set createXMLDocument = xmlDoc
end function
function getOwnedElementNameList( element, ownedMetatypeList)
dim ownedElement as EA.Element dim nameList 'as String dim typeID 'as Integer dim typeElement as EA.Element dim elementName 'as String dim objectState 'as String
nameList = vbNullString
if ownedMetatypeList <> vbNullString then ownedMetatypeList = ownedMetatypeList & "," end if
for each ownedElement in element.EmbeddedElements
if InStr( ownedMetatypeList, ownedElement.MetaType & ",") then
typeID = ownedElement.PropertyType
if typeID = 0 then typeID = ownedElement.ClassfierID end if
if typeID = 0 then elementName = ownedElement.Name else
set typeElement = Repository.GetElementByID( typeID)
elementName = typeElement.Name
end if
if nameList <> vbNullString then nameList = nameList & vbCRLF end if
nameList = nameList & elementName
objectState = getCustomPropertyValue( ownedElement, "objectState")
if objectState <> vbNullString then nameList = nameList & " [" & objectState & "]" end if
end if
next
getOwnedElementNameList = nameList
end function
function getCustomPropertyValue( ownedElement, propertyName)
dim customProperty as EA._CustomProperty dim propertyValue 'as String
propertyValue = vbNullString
for each customProperty in ownedElement.CustomProperties
if customProperty.Name = propertyName then propertyValue = customProperty.Value exit for end if
next
getCustomPropertyValue = propertyValue
end function
function getAncestorPackage( element, ancestorPackageLevel)
dim packageLevel 'as Integer dim packageID 'as Integer dim package as EA.Package
packageID = element.PackageID
set package = Repository.GetPackageByID( packageID)
for packageLevel = 2 to ancestorPackageLevel
packageID = package.ParentID
if packageID = 0 then exit for end if
set package = Repository.GetPackageByID( packageID)
next
set getAncestorPackage = package
end function
function getChildElementList( parentElement, childStereotype)
dim childElement as EA.Element dim childElementList 'as Scripting.Dictionary set childElementList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary") for each childElement in parentElement.Elements if childElement.Stereotype = childStereotype then childElementList.Add childElement.ElementGUID, childElement end if next set getChildElementList = childElementList end function
function getChildDiagram( parentElement, childDiagramName)
dim childDiagram as EA.Diagram dim foundDiagram as EA.Diagram
set foundDiagram = nothing
for each childDiagram in parentElement.Diagrams if childDiagram.Name = childDiagramName then set foundDiagram = childDiagram exit for end if next set getChildDiagram = foundDiagram
end function
function createChildInstance( parentElement, childClassifier, childStereotype)
dim childElement as EA.Element dim foundInstance as EA.Element
set foundInstance = nothing
for each childElement in parentElement.Elements
if childElement.ClassifierID = childClassifier.ElementID then set foundInstance = childElement exit for end if
next
if foundInstance is nothing then
set foundInstance = parentElement.Elements.AddNew( "", "Object")
foundInstance.Stereotype = childStereotype foundInstance.ClassifierID = childClassifier.ElementID
foundInstance.Update
parentElement.Elements.Refresh
end if
set createChildInstance = foundInstance
end function

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Biz -Create Value Stream Stage Capability Cross-Map Diagram" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
' Script to automatically build a Value Stream Stage to Capability cross-map diagram. WIP
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Report Scripts.Report Script Library
const HORIZ_PADDING = 40 const VERT_PADDING = 20 const DIAGRAM_LEFT_OFFSET = 40 const DIAGRAM_VERT_OFFSET = 10 const ELEMENT_WIDTH = 100 const ELEMENT_HEIGHT = 50
const vbYesNo = 4 const vbYes = 6
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
dim treeSelectedType
treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
if treeSelectedType = otElement then
dim valueStream as EA.Element
set valueStream = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
if valueStream.Stereotype = "Value Stream" then createCapabilityCrossMap valueStream else Session.Prompt "Must select a Value Stream element for this script.", promptOK end if
else Session.Prompt "Must select a Value Stream element for this script.", promptOK end if
end sub
sub createCapabilityCrossMap( valueStream)
dim diagramName 'as String dim diagram as EA.Diagram dim overwriteDiagram 'as Boolean
diagramName = valueStream.Name & " - Capability Cross-Map"
diagramName = InputBox( "Enter diagram name:", "Create Capability Cross-Map", diagramName)
if diagramName <> "" then
set diagram = getChildDiagram( valueStream, diagramName)
if diagram is nothing then
Session.Output "Creating capability cross-map diagram..."
set diagram = valueStream.Diagrams.AddNew( diagramName, "Object")
diagram.StyleEx = diagram.StyleEx & "MDGDgm=BIZBOK Value Mapping Diagrams::Value Cross Mapping;"
diagram.Update
updateCapabilityCrossMapDiagram diagram, valueStream, diagramName
else
overwriteDiagram = MsgBox( "Diagram already exists. Overwrite?", vbYesNo)
if overwriteDiagram = vbYes then
deleteDiagramObjects diagram
updateCapabilityCrossMapDiagram diagram, valueStream, diagramName
end if
end if
end if
end sub
sub deleteDiagramObjects( diagram)
dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim objectCount 'as Integer dim objectIndex 'as Integer
objectCount = diagram.DiagramObjects.Count
for objectIndex = objectCount - 1 to 0 step -1 diagram.DiagramObjects.Delete( objectIndex) next
diagram.Update
end sub
sub updateCapabilityCrossMapDiagram( diagram, valueStream, diagramName)
Repository.OpenDiagram(diagram.DiagramID)
addValueStreamStages valueStream, diagram
valueStream.Diagrams.Refresh
Repository.RefreshModelView( valueStream.PackageID)
Repository.SaveDiagram(diagram.diagramID)
Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.DiagramID)
Session.Output "Finished!"
end sub
sub addValueStreamStages( valueStream, diagram)
dim stageList 'as List dim stage as EA.Element dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim leftPos 'as Integer dim left 'as Integer dim right 'as Integer dim top 'as Integer dim bottom 'as Integer
set stageList = getChildElementList( valueStream, "Value Stream Stage")
leftPos = DIAGRAM_LEFT_OFFSET
for each stage in stageList.Items
Session.Output "Adding " & stage.Name
left = leftPos right = leftPos + ELEMENT_WIDTH top = DIAGRAM_VERT_OFFSET bottom = DIAGRAM_VERT_OFFSET + ELEMENT_HEIGHT
set diagramObject = diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "l=" & left & ";r=" & right & ";t=" & top & ";b=" & bottom, "")
diagramObject.ElementID = stage.ElementID
diagramObject.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.DiagramID)
addCapabilityInstances diagram, stage, leftPos, bottom
leftPos = right + HORIZ_PADDING
next
end sub
sub addCapabilityInstances( diagram, stage, parentLeft, parentBottom)
dim capabilityList 'as System.Collections.Sortedlist dim capability as EA.Element dim capabilityInstance as EA.Element dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim bottomPos 'as Integer dim index 'as Integer dim left 'as Integer dim right 'as Integer dim top 'as Integer dim bottom 'as Integer
set capabilityList = getSortedRelatedElementList( stage, "Association", "enables", "Class", "Capability")
bottomPos = parentBottom
for index = 0 to capabilityList.Count - 1
set capability = capabilityList.GetByIndex( index)
set capabilityInstance = createChildInstance( stage, capability, "Capability Instance")
left = parentLeft right = parentLeft + ELEMENT_WIDTH top = bottomPos + DIAGRAM_VERT_OFFSET bottom = bottomPos + DIAGRAM_VERT_OFFSET + ELEMENT_HEIGHT
Session.Output "- Adding " & capability.Name ' Session.Output "l=" & left & ";r=" & right & ";t=" & top & ";b=" & bottom
set diagramObject = diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "l=" & left & ";r=" & right & ";t=" & top & ";b=" & bottom, "")
diagramObject.ElementID = capabilityInstance.ElementID
diagramObject.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.DiagramID)
bottomPos = bottom
' Session.Output "bottomPos=" & bottomPos
next
end sub
sub runTest
dim valueStream as EA.Element
set valueStream = Repository.GetElementByGuid( "{7B1A45DF-84A8-4952-A140-EBFD1A885C19}")
createCapabilityCrossMap valueStream
end sub
'runTest
OnProjectBrowserScript

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' v1.5: 20220610: 1. Updated to allow for different metatypes at different levels (with new HierarchyLevel.elementMetatype property). ' 2. Updated to allow specifying object dimenisions at different levels (with new HierarchyLevel properties). ' 3. Added new base parameter to specify diagram type (instead of always defaulting to "Package"). ' 4. Added new base parameter to sepcify whether diagram should be open while building. Diagrams are created ' more quickly if they are not opened. ' 5. Updated so diagrams that are children of elements are marked as the composite diagram.
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Set Diagram Styles !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Color Constants !INC Utils.Model Management Utilities
const HIERARCHY_TAB = "Nested Hierarchy Diagram"
const TOP_DOWN_FLOW_DIRECTION = 1 ' as Integer const LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION = 2 ' as Integer
const ELEMENT_SUBTYPE_COMPOSITE = 8
const XREF_NAME_DEFAULT_DIAGRAM = "DefaultDiagram" const XREF_TYPE_ELEMENT = "element property" const XREF_VISIBILITY_PUBLIC = "public"
Function isInArray(value, arr) dim i If IsArray(arr) Then isInArray = False For i = 0 To UBound(arr) If arr(i) = value Then isInArray = True Exit Function End If Next Else isInArray = (value = arr) End If End Function
class HierarchyDiagram
public objectHeight ' as Integer public objectWidth ' as Integer public horizOffset ' as Integer public horizSpace ' as Integer public vertOffset ' as Integer public vertSpace ' as Integer public seqIndex ' as Integer public levelList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) public childObjectList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyObject) public parentItem ' as EA.Package/Element public diagram ' as EA.Diagram public includeParent ' as Boolean
private sub Class_Initialize
seqIndex = 9999 set levelList = nothing set childObjectList = nothing set parentItem = nothing set diagram = nothing
end sub
public sub createDiagram( diagramType)
dim diagramName 'as String diagramName = parentItem.Name set diagram = parentItem.Diagrams.AddNew( diagramName, diagramType) diagram.Update setDiagramStyle diagram, "HideEStereo=1" setParentElement
end sub
public sub loadRootObjectList
dim rootObject ' as HierarchyObject dim rootLevel ' as HierarchyLevel dim elementMetatype ' as String
' check whether or not to use the updated version of the script to maintain legacy support if includeParent then set rootLevel = levelList.Item(2) set childObjectList = createParentHierarchyObjectListUpdated( Me, parentItem, rootLevel) else set rootLevel = levelList.Item(1) elementMetatype = rootLevel.elementMetatype set childObjectList = createParentHierarchyObjectList( Me, parentItem, elementMetatype) end if for each rootObject in childObjectList.Items set rootObject.diagram = Me Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "--> Loading Root Element '" & rootObject.element.Name & "'...", 0 if levelList.Count > 1 then rootObject.LoadChildObjectList end if next end sub
public sub drawRootObjects dim rootObject ' as HierarchyObject drawObjectList Me, childObjectList, 1 for each rootObject in childObjectList.Items rootObject.drawChildObjects next diagram.Update end sub
public sub hideConnectors
dim link ' as EA.DiagramLink
for each link in diagram.DiagramLinks link.IsHidden = true link.Update next
diagram.DiagramLinks.Refresh
end sub
public sub addObject( anObject)
dim nextSeqIndex ' as Integer
set anObject.diagram = Me set anObject.diagramObject = Me.diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew("", "") anObject.diagramObject.ElementID = anObject.element.ElementID nextSeqIndex = Me.SeqIndex - 1 anObject.diagramObject.sequence = nextSeqIndex
Me.seqIndex = nextSeqIndex
end sub
private sub setParentElement()
if parentItem.ObjectType = otElement then diagram.ParentID = parentItem.ElementID diagram.PackageID = parentItem.PackageID diagram.Update() parentItem.Subtype = ELEMENT_SUBTYPE_COMPOSITE parentItem.Update() setElementPDATA parentItem, 1, diagram.DiagramID insertXrefRow XREF_NAME_DEFAULT_DIAGRAM, XREF_TYPE_ELEMENT, XREF_VISIBILITY_PUBLIC, vbNullString, "0", vbNullString, parentItem.ElementGUID, diagram.DiagramGUID End If End Sub end Class
private sub setElementPDATA(element, PDATAIndex, PDATAValue)
dim SQLString 'As String dim PDATAColumnName 'As String PDATAColumnName = "PDATA" & PDATAIndex SQLString = "UPDATE t_object SET " & PDATAColumnName & "='" & PDATAValue & "' WHERE Object_ID = " & element.ElementID Repository.Execute(SQLString) element.Refresh()
end sub
private sub insertXrefRow(name, xrefType, visibility, behavior, partition, description, client, supplier)
dim typeLib ' as TypeLib Dim SQLString 'as String Dim xrefGUID 'as String
set typeLib = CreateObject("Scriptlet.TypeLib")
xrefGUID = typeLib.Guid xrefGUID= Left( xrefGUID, Len( xrefGUID) - 2)
SQLString = "INSERT INTO t_xref (XrefID, Name, Type, Visibility, Behavior, Partition, Description, Client, Supplier) VALUES (" SQLString = SQLString & "'" & xrefGUID & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & name & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & xrefType & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & visibility & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & behavior & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & partition & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & description & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & client & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & supplier & "')"
Repository.Execute(SQLString)
end sub
class ElementProfile public elementMetatype ' as String public relationProfiles ' as List of RelationProfile
private sub Class_Initialize set relationProfiles = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary") end sub End class
class RelationProfile public nestingType ' as String Related | Nested public relationType ' as String public relationStereotype ' as String public relatedStereotype ' as String public relatedType ' as String
End class
class HierarchyLevel public elementMetatype ' as String public elementProfiles public levelNumber ' as Integer public numObjects ' as Integer = numRows when flowDirection = TOP_DOWN; = numColumns when flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT public flowDirection ' as Integer public objectStyle ' as ObjectStyle public objectHeight ' as Integer public objectWidth ' as Integer public horizOffset ' as Integer public horizSpace ' as Integer public vertOffset ' as Integer public vertSpace ' as Integer public isParent ' as Boolean private sub Class_Initialize set elementProfiles = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary") set objectStyle = new HierarchyObjectStyle isParent = False objectHeight = -1 objectWidth = -1 horizOffset = -1 horizSpace = -1 vertOffset = -1 vertSpace = -1
end sub End class
class HierarchyObjectStyle
public fillColor ' as RGB/Integer public lineWidth ' as Integer public lineColor ' as RGB/Integer public fontName ' as String public fontSize ' as Integer public fontColor ' as RGB/Integer public fontBold ' as Boolean public fontItalic ' as Boolean public fontUnderline ' as Boolean
End Class
class HierarchyObject
public levelNumber ' as Integer public row ' as Integer public column ' as Integer public parentObject ' as HierarchyObject public childObjectList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyObject) public diagram ' as HierarchyDiagram public element ' as EA.Element public diagramObject ' as EA.DiagramObject public isParent ' as Boolean
private sub Class_Initialize isParent = False set parentObject = nothing set childObjectList = nothing set diagram = nothing set diagramObject = nothing
end sub
public sub loadChildObjectList
dim eaElement ' as EA.Element dim childObject ' as HierarchyObject dim childLevel ' as HierarchyLevel dim childMetatypes ' as Variant dim relatedElements ' as Dict dim tmpElements dim relatedElement dim stereotype dim key dim ex
set childLevel = diagram.levelList.Item(levelNumber + 1)
if childLevel.elementProfiles.Count>0 then call loadChildObjectListUpdated else call loadChildObjectListHistoric
end if end sub
public sub loadChildObjectListUpdated dim eaElement ' as EA.Element dim childObject ' as HierarchyObject dim childLevel ' as HierarchyLevel dim childMetatypes ' as Variant dim relatedElement dim elementProfile dim elementProfileKey dim relationProfileKey dim relationProfile dim tmpElements dim stereotype dim key
set childLevel = diagram.levelList.Item(levelNumber + 1)
set childObjectList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
For Each elementProfileKey In childLevel.elementProfiles.Keys set elementProfile = childLevel.elementProfiles.Item(elementProfileKey) For Each relationProfileKey In elementProfile.relationProfiles.Keys set relationProfile = elementProfile.relationProfiles(relationProfileKey) dim relatedElements set relatedElements = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary") If relationProfile.nestingType = "Related" then for each stereotype in Split(relationProfile.relationStereotype, ";") set tmpElements = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary") set tmpElements = getRelatedElementList(element, relationProfile.relationType, stereotype, relationProfile.relatedType, relationProfile.relatedStereotype) For Each key In tmpElements.Keys relatedElements.Add key, tmpElements.Item(key) Next Next for each relatedElement in relatedElements set childObject = New HierarchyObject set childObject.element = Repository.GetElementByGUID(relatedElement) set childObject.parentObject = Me set childObject.diagram = diagram childObject.levelNumber = levelNumber + 1 childObjectList.Add childObject.element.ElementGUID, childObject Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(childObject.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> Loading Child Element '" & childObject.element.Name & "'...", 0 if childObject.levelNumber = diagram.levelList.Count then set childObject.childObjectList = Nothing else childObject.loadChildObjectList end if Next ElseIf relationProfile.nestingType = "Nested" then for each eaElement in element.Elements if eaElement.MetaType = elementProfile.elementMetatype then set childObject = New HierarchyObject set childObject.element = eaElement set childObject.parentObject = Me set childObject.diagram = diagram childObject.levelNumber = levelNumber + 1 childObjectList.Add childObject.element.ElementGUID, childObject Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(childObject.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> Loading Child Element '" & childObject.element.Name & "'...", 0 if childObject.levelNumber = diagram.levelList.Count then set childObject.childObjectList = Nothing else childObject.loadChildObjectList end if end if next Else Err.Raise vbObjectError + 1000, "loadChildObjectListUpdated", "Unsupported string value." end if Next Next
end sub
public sub loadChildObjectListHistoric
dim eaElement ' as EA.Element dim childObject ' as HierarchyObject dim childLevel ' as HierarchyLevel dim childMetatype ' as String
set childLevel = diagram.levelList.Item(levelNumber + 1)
childMetatype = childLevel.elementMetatype
set childObjectList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
for each eaElement in element.Elements if eaElement.MetaType = childMetatype then set childObject = New HierarchyObject set childObject.element = eaElement set childObject.parentObject = Me set childObject.diagram = diagram childObject.levelNumber = levelNumber + 1 childObjectList.Add childObject.element.ElementGUID, childObject Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(childObject.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> Loading Child Element '" & childObject.element.Name & "'...", 0 if childObject.levelNumber = diagram.levelList.Count then set childObject.childObjectList = Nothing else childObject.loadChildObjectList end if
end if
next end sub
public sub drawChildObjects
dim childObject ' as HierarchyObject if not childObjectList is Nothing then drawObjectList diagram, childObjectList, levelNumber + 1 for each childObject in childObjectList.Items childObject.drawChildObjects next end if
end sub
public sub resize( childObject)
dim objectCurrRight ' as Integer dim objectCurrBottom ' as Integer dim objectNewRight ' as Integer dim objectNewBottom ' as Integer dim level ' as HierarchyLevel dim vertSpace ' as Integer dim horizSpace ' as Integer
set level = diagram.levelList.Item(levelNumber)
if level.vertSpace = -1 then vertSpace = diagram.vertSpace else vertSpace = level.vertSpace end if
if level.horizSpace = -1 then horizSpace = diagram.horizSpace else horizSpace = level.horizSpace end if
objectCurrRight = diagramObject.right objectCurrBottom = diagramObject.bottom
objectNewRight = childObject.diagramObject.right + horizSpace objectNewBottom = childObject.diagramObject.bottom - vertSpace
if objectCurrRight <> objectNewRight or objectCurrBottom <> objectNewBottom then
if objectNewRight > objectCurrRight then diagramObject.right = objectNewRight end if
if objectNewBottom < objectCurrBottom then diagramObject.bottom = objectNewBottom end if
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "*** RESIZED object '" & element.name & "' to (" & diagramObject.left & "," & diagramObject.top & ") x ( " & diagramObject.right & "," & diagramObject.bottom & ")", 0
diagramObject.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
moveNeighborObjects
if Not parentObject is nothing then
if TypeName(parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" Then parentObject.resize Me end if
end if
end if
end sub
public sub moveNeighborObjects
dim rightObject ' as HierarchyObject dim rightObjectWidth ' as Integer dim rightObjectCurrLeft ' as Integer dim rightObjectNewLeft ' as Integer dim rightObjectMoved ' as Integer dim bottomObject ' as HierarchyObject dim bottomObjectHeight ' as Integer dim bottomObjectCurrTop ' as Integer dim bottomObjectNewTop ' as Integer dim bottomObjectMoved ' as Integer dim level ' as HierarchyLevel dim vertSpace ' as Integer dim horizSpace ' as Integer
set level = diagram.levelList.Item(levelNumber)
if level.vertSpace = -1 then vertSpace = diagram.vertSpace else vertSpace = level.vertSpace end if
if level.horizSpace = -1 then horizSpace = diagram.horizSpace else horizSpace = level.horizSpace end if
set rightObject = getRightObject set bottomObject = getBottomObject
rightObjectMoved = false bottomObjectMoved = false
if rightObject is nothing then
if TypeName(parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then parentObject.resize Me end if
else
rightObjectWidth = rightObject.width rightObjectCurrLeft = rightObject.diagramObject.left rightObjectNewLeft = diagramObject.right + horizSpace
if rightObjectNewLeft <> rightObjectCurrLeft then
rightObject.diagramObject.left = rightObjectNewLeft rightObject.diagramObject.right = rightObjectNewLeft + rightObjectWidth
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "*** Moved RIGHT object '" & rightObject.element.name & "' to (" & rightObject.diagramObject.left & "," & rightObject.diagramObject.top & ") x ( " & rightObject.diagramObject.right & "," & rightObject.diagramObject.bottom & ")", 0
rightObject.diagramObject.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
rightObjectMoved = true
end if
end if
if bottomObject is nothing then
if TypeName(parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then parentObject.resize Me end if
else
bottomObjectHeight = bottomObject.Height bottomObjectCurrTop = bottomObject.diagramObject.top bottomObjectNewTop = diagramObject.bottom - vertSpace if bottomObjectNewTop <> bottomObjectCurrTop then bottomObject.diagramObject.top = bottomObjectNewTop bottomObject.diagramObject.bottom = bottomObjectNewTop - bottomObjectHeight
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "*** Moved BOTTOM object '" & bottomObject.element.name & "' to (" & bottomObject.diagramObject.left & "," & bottomObject.diagramObject.top & ") x ( " & bottomObject.diagramObject.right & "," & bottomObject.diagramObject.bottom & ")", 0
bottomObject.diagramObject.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
bottomObjectMoved = true
end if
end if
if rightObjectMoved then rightObject.moveNeighborObjects end if
if bottomObjectMoved then bottomObject.moveNeighborObjects end if
end sub
public property get height height = diagramObject.top - diagramObject.bottom end property
public property get width width = diagramObject.right - diagramObject.left end property
public function getRightObject set getRightObject = getGridObject(column + 1, row) end function
public function getBottomObject set getBottomObject = getGridObject(column, row + 1) end function
public function getGridObject( getColumn, getRow)
dim peerObject ' as HierarchyObject dim foundObject ' as HierarchyObject
set foundObject = nothing
for each peerObject in parentObject.childObjectList.Items
if peerObject.column = getColumn and peerObject.row = getRow then set foundObject = peerObject exit for end if
next
set getGridObject = foundObject
end function
public property let fillColor( value) if value <> vbNullString then SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "BCol=" & value end if end property
public property let lineWidth( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "LWth=" & value end property
public property let lineColor( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "LCol=" & value end property
public property let fontName( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "font=" & value end property
public property let fontSize( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "fontsz=" & value * 10 end property
public property let fontColor( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "BFol=" & value end property
public property let fontBold( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "bold=" & value end property
public property let fontItalic( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "italic=" & value end property
public property let fontUnderline( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "ul=" & value end property
End Class
public sub drawObjectList( diagram, objectList, levelNumber)
dim level ' as HierarchyLevel dim objectIndex ' as Integer dim coord1 ' as Integer dim coord2 ' as Integer dim object ' as HierarchyObject dim parentObjectLeft ' as Integer dim parentObjectTop ' as Integer dim objectWidth ' as Integer dim objectHeight ' as Integer dim vertOffset ' as Integer dim vertSpace ' as Integer dim horizOffset ' as Integer dim horizSpace ' as Integer
set level = diagram.levelList.Item(levelNumber) if level.objectWidth = -1 then objectWidth = diagram.objectWidth else objectWidth = level.objectWidth end if
if level.objectHeight = -1 then objectHeight = diagram.objectHeight else objectHeight = level.objectHeight end if
if level.vertOffset = -1 then vertOffset = diagram.vertOffset else vertOffset = level.vertOffset end if
if level.vertSpace = -1 then vertSpace = diagram.vertSpace else vertSpace = level.vertSpace end if
if level.horizOffset = -1 then horizOffset = diagram.horizOffset else horizOffset = level.horizOffset end if
if level.horizSpace = -1 then horizSpace = diagram.horizSpace else horizSpace = level.horizSpace end if
objectIndex = 1
for each object in objectList.Items
diagram.addObject object
coord1 = Int( ( objectIndex - 1 ) / level.numObjects ) + 1 coord2 = objectIndex - ( coord1 - 1 ) * level.numObjects
if level.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION then object.row = coord1 object.column = coord2 else object.row = coord2 object.column = coord1 end if
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(object.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> Adding diagram object for Element '" & object.element.Name & "' #" & objectIndex & " ( " & object.column & ", " & object.row & " )", 0
if object.parentObject is nothing then parentObjectLeft = 0 parentObjectTop = 0 else
if TypeName(object.ParentObject) = "HierarchyObject" and object.isParent=False then parentObjectLeft = object.parentObject.diagramObject.left parentObjectTop = object.parentObject.diagramObject.top else parentObjectLeft = 0 parentObjectTop = 0 end if
end if
object.diagramObject.left = parentObjectLeft + ( object.column - 1 ) * ( objectWidth + horizSpace ) + horizOffset object.diagramObject.top = parentObjectTop - ( ( object.row - 1 ) * ( objectHeight + vertSpace ) + vertOffset ) object.diagramObject.right = object.diagramObject.left + objectWidth object.diagramObject.bottom = object.diagramObject.top - objectHeight
object.fillColor = level.objectStyle.fillColor object.lineWidth = level.objectStyle.lineWidth object.lineColor = level.objectStyle.lineColor object.fontName = level.objectStyle.fontName object.fontSize = level.objectStyle.fontSize object.fontColor = level.objectStyle.fontColor object.fontBold = level.objectStyle.fontBold object.fontItalic = level.objectStyle.fontItalic object.fontUnderline = level.objectStyle.fontUnderline
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(object.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> LeftTop: ( " & object.diagramObject.left & ", " & object.diagramObject.top & " ) RightBottom: ( " & object.diagramObject.right & ", " & object.diagramObject.bottom & " )", 0
object.diagramObject.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram(object.diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
if Not object.parentObject is Nothing then
if TypeName(object.parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then object.parentObject.resize object end if
end if
objectIndex = objectIndex + 1
next
end sub
sub createNestedHierarchyDiagram( parentItem, levelList, diagramType, openDiagram)
dim diagram ' as HierarchyDiagram
Repository.CreateOutputTab HIERARCHY_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible HIERARCHY_TAB
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Creating nested hierarchy diagram for Element '" & parentItem.Name & "'...", 0
set diagram = New HierarchyDiagram
'diagram.elementMetaType = elementMetatype diagram.horizOffset = 10 diagram.horizSpace = 10 diagram.vertOffset = 50 diagram.vertSpace = 10 diagram.objectHeight = 50 diagram.objectWidth = 150 set diagram.parentItem = parentItem dim val set val = levelList(1) if val.isParent then diagram.includeParent = true end if diagram.createDiagram diagramType
if openDiagram then Repository.OpenDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID) end if
set diagram.levelList = levelList
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "diagram.levelList.Count = " & diagram.levelList.count, 0
diagram.loadRootObjectList
diagram.drawRootObjects
diagram.hideConnectors
Repository.SaveDiagram(diagram.diagram.diagramID)
if openDiagram then Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID) end if
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Finished!", 0
end sub
function createParentHierarchyObjectList( diagram, parentItem, elementMetatype)
dim objectList dim eaElement as EA.Element dim object dim elementMetatypes ' as Variant dim inArr ' as Bool
elementMetatypes = Split(elementMetatype, ";") set objectList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
for each eaElement in parentItem.Elements inArr = isInArray(eaElement.MetaType, elementMetatypes) if inArr then set object = New HierarchyObject
set object.Element = eaElement set object.ParentObject = diagram object.levelNumber = 1
objectList.Add object.element.ElementGUID, object
end if
next
set createParentHierarchyObjectList = objectList
end function
function createParentHierarchyObjectListUpdated( diagram, parentItem, rootList)
dim objectList dim eaElement as EA.Element dim topLevelHierObj dim elementMetatypes ' as Variant dim inArr ' as Bool
set objectList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
set topLevelHierObj = New HierarchyObject set topLevelHierObj.Element = parentItem set topLevelHierObj.ParentObject = diagram topLevelHierObj.levelNumber = 1 topLevelHierObj.isParent = True objectList.Add topLevelHierObj.element.ElementGUID, topLevelHierObj
set createParentHierarchyObjectListUpdated = objectList
end function
sub Test( packageGUID)
dim packageID ' as String dim parentItem ' as EA.Package/Element dim levelList ' as Dictionary(Of HierarcyLevel) dim level1 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level2 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level3 ' as HierarchyLevel
set levelList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
set level1 = New HierarchyLevel
level1.numObjects = 1 level1.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION level1.elementMetatype = "ABE" level1.objectHeight = 90 level1.objectWidth = 200 level1.horizOffset = 10 level1.horizSpace = 10 level1.vertOffset = 10 level1.vertSpace = 10
'level1.objectStyle.fillColor = colorPaleGreen 'level1.objectStyle.lineWidth = 2 'level1.objectStyle.lineColor = colorRed level1.objectStyle.fontName = "Calibri" level1.objectStyle.fontSize = 12 level1.objectStyle.fontBold = "1" ' true 'level1.objectStyle.fontColor = colorGold
levelList.Add 1, level1
set level2 = new hierarchylevel level2.numobjects = 9 level2.flowdirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION level2.elementMetatype = "ABE" level2.objectHeight = 50 level2.objectWidth = 100 level2.horizOffset = 10 level2.horizSpace = 10 level2.vertOffset = 30 level2.vertSpace = 10
level2.objectstyle.fillcolor = colorWhite 'level2.objectstyle.linewidth = 3 'level2.objectstyle.linecolor = colormediumorchid level2.objectstyle.fontname = "Calibri" level2.objectstyle.fontsize = 10 'level2.objectstyle.fontcolor = colorred
levellist.add 2, level2
' set level3 = New HierarchyLevel ' ' level3.numObjects = 3 ' level3.flowDirection = TOP_DOWN_FLOW_DIRECTION ' ' levelList.Add 3, level3
'set parentItem = Repository.GetPackageByGuid( packageGUID) set parentItem = Repository.GetElementByGuid( packageGUID)
createNestedHierarchyDiagram parentItem, levelList, "Custom", false
end sub
'Test "{5AEBAAC2-16D2-4e7f-8201-F110C4B7C6BD}"

' contains colors that can be used in various other scripts ' If needed, get more color constants from http://cloford.com/resources/colours/500col.htm
const colorBlack = 0 const colorRed = 255 const colorGreen = 32768 const colorDarkOrange = 36095 const colorGold = 55295 const colorLightCoral = 8421616 const colorPaleGreen = 10025880 const colorMediumOrchid = 13850042 const colorLightSkyBlue = 16436871 const colorBlue = 16711680 const colorDeepSkyBlue = 16760576 const colorWhite = 16777215 const colorOrchid = 8996747 const colorLightSteelBlue1 = 16769482 const colorAzure2 = 15658720 const cololorKhakh1 = 9434879 const colorSilver =12632256 const colorGray40 =6710886

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Set Diagram Styles" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Scripts to update styles diagram objects. '
const STYLE_DELIMITER = ";" const STYLE_ASSIGNMENT = "="
sub SetCurrentDiagramObjectsStyle(elementMetaType, updateStyleList)
dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram
set theDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram
theDiagram.Update
SetDiagramObjectsStyle theDiagram, elementMetaType, updateStyleList
theDiagram.Update
end sub
sub SetDiagramObjectsStyle( theDiagram, elementMetaType, updateStyleList)
dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim diagramElement as EA.Element dim elementID dim updateStyleArray dim updateStyle
updateStyleArray = Split(updateStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
for each diagramObject in theDiagram.DiagramObjects
elementID = diagramObject.ElementID
set diagramElement = Repository.GetElementByID(elementID)
if diagramElement.metaType = elementMetaType then
for each updateStyle in updateStyleArray SetDiagramObjectStyle diagramObject, updateStyle next
diagramObject.Update
end if
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram theDiagram.DiagramID
end sub
sub SetDiagramObjectStyle( diagramObject, updateStyle)
dim updateStylePartArray dim updateStyleName dim lineStyleList dim lineStyleArray dim lineStyleIndex dim lineStyle dim styleFound
updateStylePartArray = Split(updateStyle, STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) updateStyleName = updateStylePartArray(0) lineStyleList = diagramObject.Style
lineStyleArray = Split(lineStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
lineStyleIndex = 0 styleFound = false
for each lineStyle in lineStyleArray
if InStr( lineStyle, updateStyleName & STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) then
lineStyle = updateStyle
lineStyleArray(lineStyleIndex) = lineStyle
styleFound = true
end if
lineStyleIndex = lineStyleIndex + 1
next
lineStyleList = Join(lineStyleArray, STYLE_DELIMITER)
if not( styleFound) then lineStyleList = lineStyleList & updateStyle & STYLE_DELIMITER end if
diagramObject.Style = lineStyleList
end sub
sub SetDiagramStyle( diagram, updateStyle)
dim updateStylePartArray dim updateStyleName dim lineStyleList dim lineStyleArray dim lineStyleIndex dim lineStyle dim styleFound
updateStylePartArray = Split(updateStyle, STYLE_ASSIGNMENT)
updateStyleName = updateStylePartArray(0)
lineStyleList = diagram.ExtendedStyle
lineStyleArray = Split(lineStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
lineStyleIndex = 0 styleFound = false
for each lineStyle in lineStyleArray
if InStr( lineStyle, updateStyleName & STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) then
lineStyle = updateStyle
lineStyleArray(lineStyleIndex) = lineStyle
styleFound = true
end if
lineStyleIndex = lineStyleIndex + 1
next
lineStyleList = Join(lineStyleArray, STYLE_DELIMITER)
if not( styleFound) then lineStyleList = lineStyleList & updateStyle & STYLE_DELIMITER end if
diagram.ExtendedStyle = lineStyleList
end sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Biz - Create Capability Map (4x4)" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
' Script Name: Biz - Create Capability Map (4x4) ' Author: Giu Platania ' Purpose: create a diagram with TMF_capabilities up-to 4 levels ' Date: 2023 12
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Create Nested Hierarchy Diagram !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Color Constants
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
dim treeSelectedType dim thePackage as EA.Package dim levelList ' as Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel)
treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
select case treeSelectedType case otPackage
set thePackage = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() set levelList = getDiagramLevelList CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram thePackage, "Capability", levelList case else Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK end select
end sub
OnProjectBrowserScript
sub Test(packageGUID)
dim aPackage As EA.Package dim levelList ' as Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel)
set aPackage = Repository.GetPackageByGuid(packageGUID)
set levelList = getDiagramLevelList
CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram aPackage, "Capability", levelList
end sub
function getDiagramLevelList
dim levelList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim level1 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level2 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level3 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level4 ' as HierarchyLevel
set levelList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
' *** FIRST LEVEL ***
set level1 = New HierarchyLevel
level1.numObjects = 4 level1.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION
'level1.objectStyle.fillColor = colorDeepSkyBlue 'level1.objectStyle.lineWidth = 2 'level1.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack 'level1.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" 'level1.objectStyle.fontSize = 14 'level1.objectStyle.fontColor = colorGold
levelList.Add 1, level1
' *** SECOND LEVEL ***
set level2 = New HierarchyLevel
level2.numObjects = 2 level2.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION
'level2.objectStyle.fillColor = colorDeepSkyBlue 'level2.objectStyle.lineWidth = 1 'level2.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack level2.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" 'level2.objectStyle.fontSize = 10 'level2.objectStyle.fontColor = colorBlack
levelList.Add 2, level2
' *** THIRD LEVEL ***
set level3 = New HierarchyLevel
level3.numObjects = 3 level3.flowDirection = TOP_DOWN_FLOW_DIRECTION
'level3.objectStyle.fillColor = colorLightCoral 'level3.objectStyle.lineWidth = 1 'level3.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack level3.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" 'level3.objectStyle.fontSize = 10 'level3.objectStyle.fontColor = colorBlack
levelList.Add 3, level3
' *** FOURTH LEVEL ***
set level4 = New HierarchyLevel
level4.numObjects = 2 level4.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION
'level4.objectStyle.fillColor = colorLightSkyBlue 'level4.objectStyle.lineWidth = 1 'level4.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack 'level4.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" level4.objectStyle.fontSize = 10 'level4.objectStyle.fontColor = colorBlack
levelList.Add 4, level4
set getDiagramLevelList = levelList
end function

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Utility Scripts" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
function getElementTaggedValueValue( element, taggedValueName)
dim taggedValue as EA.TaggedValue
set taggedValue = element.TaggedValues.GetByName( taggedValueName)
getElementTaggedValueValue = taggedValue.Value
end function
sub setElementTaggedValueValue( element, taggedValueName, taggedValueValue)
dim taggedValue as EA.TaggedValue
set taggedValue = element.TaggedValues.GetByName( taggedValueName)
if taggedValue is nothing then set taggedValue = element.TaggedValues.AddNew( taggedValueName, vbNullString) end if
taggedValue.Value = taggedValueValue taggedValue.Update
end sub
function getConnectorTaggedValueValue( connector, taggedValueName)
dim taggedValue as EA.ConnectorTag set taggedValue = connector.TaggedValues.GetByName( taggedValueName) getConnectorTaggedValueValue = taggedValue.Value
end function
sub setConnectorTaggedValueValue( connector, taggedValueName, taggedValueValue)
dim taggedValue as EA.ConnectorTag set taggedValue = connector.TaggedValues.GetByName( taggedValueName) if taggedValue is nothing then set taggedValue = connector.TaggedValues.AddNew( taggedValueName, vbNullString) end if taggedValue.Value = taggedValueValue taggedValue.Update
end sub
function lookupElementName(lookupValue, lookupStereotype, lookupElementType)
dim sqlString ' As String dim elementList_XML ' As String dim elementList_XMLDoc ' As Xml.XmlDocument dim element_XMLNodeList ' As Xml.XmlNodeList dim element_XMLNode ' As Xml.XmlNode dim elementGUID ' As String dim lookupColumnName ' As String dim lookupElement as EA.Element
sqlString = "SELECT ea_guid FROM t_object" sqlString = sqlString & " WHERE t_object.Name = '" & lookupValue & "'"
If lookupStereotype = vbNullString Then sqlString = sqlString & " AND t_object.Stereotype Is Null" Else sqlString = sqlString & " AND t_object.Stereotype = '" & lookupStereotype & "'" End If
sqlString = sqlString & " AND t_object.Object_Type = '" & lookupElementType & "'"
elementList_XML = Repository.SQLQuery(sqlString)
set elementList_XMLDoc = CreateObject("Microsoft.XMLDOM")
elementList_XMLDoc.LoadXml(elementList_XML)
set element_XMLNodeList = elementList_XMLDoc.SelectNodes("/EADATA/Dataset_0/Data/Row")
If element_XMLNodeList.Length > 0 Then
set element_XMLNode = element_XMLNodeList.Item(0) elementGUID = element_XMLNode.FirstChild.Text set lookupElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid(elementGUID)
Else set lookupElement = Nothing End If
set lookupElementName = lookupElement
end function
function lookupElementTaggedValue(taggedValueName, lookupValue, lookupStereotype, lookupElementType)
dim sqlString ' As String dim elementList_XML ' As String dim elementList_XMLDoc ' As Xml.XmlDocument dim element_XMLNodeList ' As Xml.XmlNodeList dim element_XMLNode ' As Xml.XmlNode dim elementGUID ' As String dim lookupColumnName ' As String dim lookupElement as EA.Element
sqlString = "SELECT t_object.ea_guid" sqlString = sqlString & " FROM t_object" sqlString = sqlString & " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties ON t_object.Object_ID = t_objectproperties.Object_ID" sqlString = sqlString & " WHERE t_objectproperties.Property = '" & taggedValueName & "'" sqlString = sqlString & " AND t_objectproperties.Value = '" & lookupValue & "'"
If lookupStereotype = vbNullString Then sqlString = sqlString & " AND t_object.Stereotype Is Null" Else sqlString = sqlString & " AND t_object.Stereotype = '" & lookupStereotype & "'" End If sqlString = sqlString & " AND t_object.Object_Type = '" & lookupElementType & "'" elementList_XML = Repository.SQLQuery(sqlString) set elementList_XMLDoc = CreateObject("Microsoft.XMLDOM") elementList_XMLDoc.LoadXml(elementList_XML) set element_XMLNodeList = elementList_XMLDoc.SelectNodes("/EADATA/Dataset_0/Data/Row") If element_XMLNodeList.Length > 0 Then set element_XMLNode = element_XMLNodeList.Item(0) elementGUID = element_XMLNode.FirstChild.Text set lookupElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid(elementGUID) Else set lookupElement = Nothing End If set lookupElementTaggedValue = lookupElement end function
function getConnectorGUIDListTaggedValue(taggedValueName, lookupValue, lookupStereotype, lookupConnectorType)
dim connGUIDList() ' As String dim sqlString ' As String dim connList_XML ' As String dim connList_XMLDoc ' As Xml.XmlDocument dim conn_XMLNodeList ' As Xml.XmlNodeList dim conn_XMLNode ' As Xml.XmlNode dim connIndex ' As Integer dim connGUID ' As String
sqlString = "SELECT t_connector.ea_guid" sqlString = sqlString & " FROM t_connector" sqlString = sqlString & " INNER JOIN t_connectortag ON t_connector.Connector_ID = t_connectortag.ElementID" sqlString = sqlString & " WHERE t_connectortag.Property = '" & taggedValueName & "'" sqlString = sqlString & " AND t_connectortag.Value = '" & lookupValue & "'"
If lookupStereotype <> vbNullString Then sqlString = sqlString & " AND t_connector.Stereotype = '" & lookupStereotype & "'" End If if lookupConnectorType <> vbNullString then sqlString = sqlString & " AND t_connector.Connector_Type = '" & lookupConnectorType & "'" end if connList_XML = Repository.SQLQuery(sqlString) set connList_XMLDoc = CreateObject("Microsoft.XMLDOM") connList_XMLDoc.LoadXml(connList_XML) set conn_XMLNodeList = connList_XMLDoc.SelectNodes("/EADATA/Dataset_0/Data/Row") connIndex = 0 for each conn_XMLNode in conn_XMLNodeList connGUID = conn_XMLNode.FirstChild.Text redim preserve connGUIDList( connIndex + 1) connGUIDList( connIndex) = connGUID connIndex = connIndex + 1 next getConnectorGUIDListTaggedValue = connGUIDList end function
sub setElementPDATA(element, pdataIndex, pdataValue) 'PDATA1 ' For Package elements: primary key of the package ' For Elements: Same as the Status column ' For Parts/Instances: GUID of the classifier ' For UseCase: #EXP#=<ep>; semi-colon separated list of Extension Points <ep> ' For Notes: linked element feature name ' For Text displaying as hyperlink: t_diagram.Diagram_ID ' For Requirements: Status property ' For UMLDiagram: Diagram_ID of the underlying diagram; ' If Object_Type is one of Activity, Artifact, Class, Interaction, Requirement, State, 'StateMachine, UseCase (and probably some more) and NType is 8 and PDATA1 has a number 'greater then zero then PDATA1 corresponds to t_diagram.Diagram_ID of the composite 'diagram. 'if NType is 82 diagram hyperlink; PDATA1 == t_diagram.Diagram_ID ' ' PDATA2 ' For Elements: Same as the Priority column ' For Notes: Object_ID of the linked feature element ' For Requirements: Priority property
' PDATA3 ' For Elements: Same as the Difficulty column ' For Notes: Reference name into the linked feature element ' For Ports in classified Parts: the GUID of the corresponding Port in the Classifier. ' For State: t_diagram.Diagram_ID of the composite diagram ' For Requirements: Difficulty property
' PDATA4 ' For Note elements: Yes if the note is linked to an element feature and idref=<val>; list where <val> is the primary key of the connector(s) to which the note is linked ' For elements: If > 0 this is the primary key of the connector for which this element is defines as association class
' PDATA5 Keywords property
Dim sqlString 'As String Dim pdataColumnName 'As String pdataColumnName = "PDATA" & pdataIndex sqlString = "UPDATE t_object SET " & pdataColumnName & "='" & pdataValue & "' WHERE Object_ID = " & element.ElementID Repository.Execute( sqlString) element.Refresh End Sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Connector -> Populate Properties " Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
' Scripts to populate connector tagged values. WIP
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Frameworx Scripts.Utility Scripts
const CW_DATA_TYPE_LOOKUP1 = "7" const CW_DATA_TYPE_LOOKUP2 = "9"
dim lookupValueList 'as Scripting.Dictionary
populateConnectorProperties "20021", "Category", "GO_TYPE"
sub populateConnectorProperties( objectTypeID, propName, typeTaggedValueName)
dim connList 'as String() dim connGUID 'as String dim connGUIDList 'as String dim connector as EA.Connector
Session.Output vbCRLF & "Populating Connector tagged values from CW properties...."
connGUIDList = getConnectorGUIDListTaggedValue( "OT_ID", objectTypeID, vbNullString, vbNullString)
createLookupValueList objectTypeID, propName
for each connGUID in connGUIDList
set connector = Repository.GetConnectorByGuid( connGUID)
Session.Output "Connector: " & connector.ConnectorGUID
updateConnector connector, propName, typeTaggedValueName
next
end sub
sub updateConnector( connector, propName, typeTaggedValueName)
' No need to have code for USERDEFINED XML property as none of the CW relationship ' that need to be imported have non-null values.
dim lookupValueID 'as String dim lookupValueName 'as String
lookupValueID = getConnectorTaggedValueValue( connector, typeTaggedValueName)
if lookupValueID <> vbNullString then
if lookupValueList.Exists( lookupValueID) then
lookupValueName = lookupValueList.Item( lookupValueID)
setConnectorTaggedValueValue connector, propName, lookupValueName
Session.Output "..Set '" & propName & "' to '" & lookupValueName
else Session.Output "***ERROR*** No lookup value found for '" & lookupValueID & "' for '" & propName & "'" end if
end if
end sub
sub createLookupValueList( objectTypeID, propName)
dim metamodelElement as EA.Element dim propElement as EA.Element dim propID 'as String dim lookupTypeElement as EA.Element dim lookupValueElement as EA.Element dim lookupValue 'as String
Session.Output "Building lookup value list for property '" & propName & "' for CW Object Type '" & objectTypeID & "'..."
set lookupValueList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary")
set metamodelElement = lookupElementTaggedValue( "OT_ID", objectTypeID, vbNullString, "Class")
for each propElement in metamodelElement.Elements
if propElement.Name = propName then
propID = getElementTaggedValueValue( propElement, "PPT_ID")
set lookupTypeElement = lookupElementTaggedValue( "PPT_ID", propID, "lookupType", "Class")
for each lookupValueElement in lookupTypeElement.Elements
lookupValue = getElementTaggedValueValue( lookupValueElement, "LU_ID")
lookupValueList.Add lookupValue, lookupValueElement.Name
next
exit for
end if
next
end sub

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
' Script to migrate a stereotype into another. use carefully ' currently TAM Applications initially imported as ArchiMate Capabilities and Business Fuctions ' to Application Functions.
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
sub startMigration
dim packageGUID 'as String dim package as EA.Package
packageGUID = "{73CA9578-FDF8-440c-9CD3-F97F5AFD4CC2}"
set package = Repository.GetPackageByGuid( packageGUID)
migratePackage package
end sub
sub migratePackage( package)
dim element as EA.Element dim childPackage as EA.Package
Session.Output "Migrating package '" & package.Name & "'..."
for each element in package.Elements migrateElement element next
for each childPackage in package.Packages migratePackage childPackage next
end sub
sub migrateElement( element)
dim childElement as EA.Element dim objTypeTV as EA.TaggedValue dim objType 'as string
Session.Output "- Migrating element '" & element.Name & "' Type: " & element.Type & "..."
set objTypeTV = element.TaggedValues.GetByName("OT_ID")
if not objTypeTV is nothing then
objType = objTypeTV.Value
select case objType case "20016" ' TAM Application element.Type = "Component" element.StereotypeEx = "TMF_ArchiMate3::TMF_Application" element.Update case "20063" ' TAM Function element.Type = "Activity" element.StereotypeEx = "TMF_ArchiMate3::TMF_Function" element.Update end select
end if
for each childElement in element.Elements migrateElement childElement next
end sub
startMigration

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Group Type="NORMAL" Notes=""/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value: Diagram Script Utilities

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Set Current Diagram Connector Labels" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script utilities to update label settings for all connectors on a diagram. '
const SECTION_DELIMITER = "$" const GEOMETRY_DELIMITER = ";" const LABEL_DELIMITER = ":" const ASSIGNMENT = "="
sub HideCurrentDiagramConnectorLabels( labelIDList)
dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram
set theDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram
theDiagram.Update
HideDiagramConnectorLabels theDiagram, labelIDList
theDiagram.Update
end sub
sub HideDiagramConnectorLabels( theDiagram, labelIDList)
dim diagramLink as EA.DiagramLink dim labelIDArray 'as String() dim labelID 'as String
labelIDArray = Split(labelIDList, GEOMETRY_DELIMITER)
for each diagramLink in theDiagram.DiagramLinks
for each labelID in labelIDArray HideDiagramLinkLabel diagramLink, labelID next
diagramLink.Update
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram theDiagram.DiagramID
end sub
sub HideDiagramLinkLabel( diagramLink, labelID)
dim geometrySectionList 'as String dim geometrySectionArray 'as String() dim labelStyleList 'as String dim labelStyleArray 'as String() dim labelStyleIndex 'as Integer dim labelStyle 'as String dim styleFound 'as Boolean
geometrySectionList = diagramLink.Geometry
geometrySectionArray = Split( geometrySectionList, SECTION_DELIMITER)
labelStyleList = geometrySectionArray(1)
labelStyleArray = Split(labelStyleList, GEOMETRY_DELIMITER)
labelStyleIndex = 0 styleFound = false
for each labelStyle in labelStyleArray
if InStr( labelStyle, labelID & ASSIGNMENT) then
labelStyle = labelID & ASSIGNMENT & "HDN=1"
labelStyleArray( labelStyleIndex) = labelStyle
styleFound = true
exit for
end if
labelStyleIndex = labelStyleIndex + 1
next
labelStyleList = Join( labelStyleArray, GEOMETRY_DELIMITER)
if not( styleFound) then labelStyleList = labelStyleList & labelID & ASSIGNMENT & "HDN=1" & GEOMETRY_DELIMITER end if
geometrySectionArray(1) = labelStyleList
geometrySectionList = Join( geometrySectionArray, SECTION_DELIMITER)
diagramLink.Geometry = geometrySectionList
end sub
sub test
dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram
set theDiagram = Repository.GetDiagramByID( 129)
HideDiagramConnectorLabels theDiagram, "LLT;LRT"
end sub
'test

Column.value:
option explicit
' Script to migrate TAM Business Processes initially imported as ArchiMate Business Processes ' to TMF_BusinessProcess.
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
sub startMigration
dim packageGUID 'as String dim package as EA.Package
packageGUID = "{64C7CCBF-9923-49d5-9ABB-F8A50A26F398}"
set package = Repository.GetPackageByGuid( packageGUID)
migratePackage package
end sub
sub migratePackage( package)
dim element as EA.Element dim childPackage as EA.Package
Session.Output "Migrating package '" & package.Name & "'..."
for each element in package.Elements migrateElement element next
for each childPackage in package.Packages migratePackage childPackage next
end sub
sub migrateElement( element)
dim childElement as EA.Element dim objTypeTV as EA.TaggedValue dim objType 'as string
set objTypeTV = element.TaggedValues.GetByName("OT_ID")
if not objTypeTV is nothing then
objType = objTypeTV.Value
select case objType case "20007" ' eTOM Business Process
Session.Output "- Migrating element <<" & element.Stereotype & ">> '" & element.Name & "' Type: " & element.Type & "..."
element.Type = "Activity" element.StereotypeEx = "TMF_ArchiMate3::TMF_BusinessProcess" element.Update
case else Session.Output "- Skipping element <<" & element.Stereotype & ">> '" & element.Name & "' Type: " & element.Type & "..." end select
end if
for each childElement in element.Elements migrateElement childElement next
end sub
startMigration

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="util - create Diagram Hyperlinks" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC TM Forum Scripts.Utility Scripts ' util - create Diagram Hyperlinks ' Script to create hyperlinks to child diagrams for TMF hyperlink stereotypes (i.e. TMF_CategoryHyperlink) ' on top level diagrams (i.e. Application Framework Level 1 Overview). WIP
dim diagramGUID 'as string diagramGUID = "{61BAFBF9-2981-4cac-A497-58FD47F2D2E8}" setDiagramHyperlinks diagramGUID
sub setDiagramHyperlinks( diagramGUID)
dim diagram as EA.Diagram dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim elementID 'as Integer dim diagramElement as EA.Element
set diagram = Repository.GetDiagramByGuid( diagramGUID) Session.Output "Set diagram hyperlinks for '" & diagram.name & "'...." for each diagramObject in diagram.DiagramObjects elementID = diagramObject.ElementID set diagramElement = Repository.GetElementByID( elementID)
select case diagramElement.Stereotype case "TMF_CategoryHyperlink" setObjectHyperlink diagramElement, "Class", "Frameworx Category" case "TMF_DomainHyperlink" setObjectHyperlink diagramElement, "Class", "Frameworx Domain" case else Session.Output "- Skipping <<" & diagramElement.Stereotype & ">> '" & diagramElement.Name & "'..." end select
next
end sub
sub setObjectHyperlink( diagramElement, objType, stereotype)
dim taggedValue as EA.TaggedValue dim OT_ID 'as string dim GO_ID 'as string dim parentElement as EA.Element dim childDiagram as EA.Diagram
Session.Output "- Setting hyperlink for '" & diagramElement.Name & "'..."
set taggedValue = diagramElement.TaggedValues.GetByName( "OT_ID") if taggedValue is nothing then OT_ID = "" else OT_ID = taggedValue.Value end if
set taggedValue = diagramElement.TaggedValues.GetByName( "GO_ID") if taggedValue is nothing then GO_ID = "" else GO_ID = taggedValue.Value end if if OT_ID <> "" and GO_ID <> "" then set parentElement = getParentElement( OT_ID, GO_ID, objType, stereotype) if parentElement.Diagrams.Count > 0 then set childDiagram = parentElement.Diagrams.GetAt(0) diagramElement.Notes = diagramElement.Name diagramElement.Name = "$diagram://" & childDiagram.DiagramGUID diagramElement.ParentID = parentElement.ElementID diagramElement.Update setElementPDATA diagramElement, 1, childDiagram.DiagramID end if end if end sub
function getParentElement( OT_ID, GO_ID, objType, stereotype)
dim sqlString ' As String dim elementList_XML ' As String dim elementList_XMLDoc ' As Xml.XmlDocument dim element_XMLNodeList ' As Xml.XmlNodeList dim element_XMLNode ' As Xml.XmlNode dim elementGUID ' As String dim parentElement as EA.Element
sqlString = "SELECT t_object.ea_guid FROM (t_object" sqlString = sqlString & " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS OT_ID_Prop ON t_object.Object_ID = OT_ID_Prop.Object_ID)" sqlString = sqlString & " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS GO_ID_Prop ON t_object.Object_ID = GO_ID_Prop.Object_ID" sqlString = sqlString & " WHERE (((OT_ID_Prop.Property)='OT_ID')" sqlString = sqlString & " AND ((OT_ID_Prop.Value)='" & OT_ID & "')" sqlString = sqlString & " AND ((GO_ID_Prop.Property)='GO_ID')" sqlString = sqlString & " AND ((GO_ID_Prop.Value)='" & GO_ID & "')" sqlString = sqlString & " AND ((t_object.Stereotype)='" & stereotype & "')" sqlString = sqlString & " AND ((t_object.Object_Type)='" & objType & "'))"
elementList_XML = Repository.SQLQuery(sqlString) set elementList_XMLDoc = CreateObject("Microsoft.XMLDOM") elementList_XMLDoc.LoadXml(elementList_XML) set element_XMLNodeList = elementList_XMLDoc.SelectNodes("/EADATA/Dataset_0/Data/Row") If element_XMLNodeList.Length > 0 Then set element_XMLNode = element_XMLNodeList.Item(0) elementGUID = element_XMLNode.FirstChild.Text set parentElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid(elementGUID) Else set parentElement = Nothing End If
set getParentElement = parentElement
end function

option explicit
' Util - Migrate Stereotype by Tagged Value ' change the stereotype of a hierqarchy based on a certain Tagged Value
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
sub startMigration dim packageGUID 'as String dim package as EA.Package packageGUID = "{64C7CCBF-9923-49d5-9ABB-F8A50A26F398}" set package = Repository.GetPackageByGuid( packageGUID) migratePackage package end sub
sub migratePackage( package)
dim element as EA.Element dim childPackage as EA.Package
Session.Output "Migrating package '" & package.Name & "'..."
for each element in package.Elements migrateElement element next
for each childPackage in package.Packages migratePackage childPackage next
end sub
sub migrateElement( element)
dim childElement as EA.Element dim objTypeTV as EA.TaggedValue dim objType 'as string
' change the name of the Tag value to be evaluated set objTypeTV = element.TaggedValues.GetByName("OT_ID")
if not objTypeTV is nothing then
objType = objTypeTV.Value
select case objType case "20007" ' eTOM Business Process
Session.Output "- Migrating element <<" & element.Stereotype & ">> '" & element.Name & "' Type: " & element.Type & "..."
element.Type = "Class" element.StereotypeEx = "TMF::TMF_Process" element.Update
case else Session.Output "- Skipping element <<" & element.Stereotype & ">> '" & element.Name & "' Type: " & element.Type & "..." end select
end if
for each childElement in element.Elements migrateElement childElement next
end sub
startMigration
