Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Elements -> Transform Class Into Schema" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Utils.Model Management Utilities
' ' Script Name: Transform Class Into Schema ' Author: ' Purpose: Transforms a selected class in a diagram into a JSON schema, including all connectors and properties. ' Date: 10/04/2024
sub OnDiagramScript()
dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram dim selectedObject as EA.DiagramObject dim selectedElement as EA.Element dim control as EA.Element dim controlName 'as string dim package as EA.Package dim flag ' as boolean dim jsonElement as EA.Element ' flag identifies whether schema has been generated already flag = false set currentDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram() if currentDiagram.SelectedObjects.Count = 1 then for each selectedObject in currentDiagram.SelectedObjects set selectedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(selectedObject.ElementID) if selectedElement.Type = "Class" then Session.Output "Class found, starting conversion....." set package = Repository.GetPackageByID(selectedElement.PackageID) ' iterate the elements in the package of the selected element for each control in package.Elements controlName = selectedElement.Name controlName = Replace (controlName, " ", "") ' if the selected element has already been generated, ignore it and continue if control.Stereotype = "TMF_JSON_Schema" and control.Name = controlName then Session.Output "This class already has a JSON element" set jsonElement = control flag = true exit for end if Next ' if the JSON Schema has not yet been generated, generate it if flag = false then set jsonElement = TransferClass(selectedElement, currentDiagram) end if ' add any aggregations SearchForAggregation selectedElement, currentDiagram
' add any associations CreateAssociation selectedElement, jsonElement
Repository.ReloadDiagram(currentDiagram.diagramID) else Session.Prompt "The diagram object must be a class", promptOK end if flag = false next else Session.Prompt "This script requires an object to be selected in a diagram to be visible", promptOK end if Session.Output "done" end sub
' creates a json element function TransferClass (element, diagram) dim jsonElement as EA.Element dim package as EA.Package
set package = Repository.GetPackageByID (element.PackageID) set jsonElement = Package.Elements.AddNew (Element.Name, "TMF_JSON_Schema") ' jsonElement.Stereotype = "TMF_JSON_Schema" jsonElement.StereotypeEx = "TMF_JSON_Schema,dModelClass" jsonElement.Name = Element.Name jsonElement.Name = replace(jsonElement.Name, " ", "") jsonElement.Notes = Element.Notes jsonElement.Gentype = "UML2" jsonElement.Update Session.Output "JSONSchema Created" CopyAttributes element, jsonElement Session.Output "Attributes copied" CreateRealizationConn element, jsonElement Session.Output "Realisation connector created" CreateDiagramObject jsonElement Session.Output "Diagram object created" set TransferClass = jsonElement end function
sub CopyAttributes (element, jsonElement) dim i ' as index dim newAttr as EA.Attribute dim attrVal as EA.Attribute
for i = 0 to element.Attributes.Count - 1 set attrVal = element.Attributes.GetAt(i) set newAttr = jsonElement.Attributes.AddNew (attrVal.Name, attrVal.Type) newAttr.Name = replace (newAttr.Name, " ", "") newAttr.Stereotype = attrVal.Stereotype newAttr.Notes = attrVal.Notes newAttr.Update jsonElement.Attributes.Refresh next
end sub
sub CreateRealizationConn (source, target) dim newConnector as EA.Connector
set newConnector = source.Connectors.AddNew ("Realization", "Realization") newConnector.ClientID = target.ElementID newConnector.SupplierID = source.ElementID newConnector.Update source.Connectors.Refresh target.Connectors.Refresh end sub
sub CreateDiagramObject (jsonElement) dim dObject as EA.DiagramObject dim diagram as EA.Diagram
set diagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram set dObject = diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew ("", "") dObject.ElementID = jsonElement.ElementID
dObject.Update() diagram.Update() diagram.DiagramObjects.Refresh() end sub
sub SearchForAggregation (element, diagram) dim i ' as index dim generalization as EA.Connector dim aggregator as EA.Element dim package as EA.Package dim control as EA.Element dim jsonControl as EA.Element dim controlName 'as string dim flag 'as boolean
for each generalization in element.Connectors if generalization.MetaType = "Generalization" then Session.Output "Generalization found, transferring aggregator element....." set aggregator = Repository.GetElementByID(generalization.SupplierID) set package = Repository.GetPackageByID(element.PackageID) ' for each control in package.Elements ' controlName = aggregator.Name ' controlName = Replace (controlName, " ", "") ' if control.Stereotype = "TMF_JSON_Schema" and control.Name = controlName then ' Session.Output "This class already has a JSON element" ' flag = true ' exit for ' end if ' Next set jsonControl = findJsonElement(aggregator) if jsonControl is nothing then TransferClass aggregator, diagram end if CreateGeneralizationConn aggregator, element end if next end sub
sub CreateGeneralizationConn (sourceClass, clientClass) Session.Output "Creating Generalization connector" dim newConnector as EA.Connector dim source as EA.Element dim client as EA.Element dim flag 'as boolean dim control as EA.Element dim connector as EA.Connector dim package as EA.Package dim controlName 'as string
set package = Repository.GetPackageByID(clientClass.PackageID)
set source = findJsonElement(sourceClass)
set client = findJsonElement(clientClass)
for each connector in source.Connectors if connector.MetaType = "Schema Generalization" and connector.ClientID = Client.ElementID then Session.Output "Generalization relationship already exists" Flag = true exit for end if next
if flag = false then set newConnector = sourceClass.Connectors.AddNew ("", "Generalization" ) newConnector.ClientID = Client.ElementID newConnector.SupplierID = Source.ElementID newConnector.Stereotype = "TMF_SchemaGeneralizesSchema" newConnector.Update end if
end sub
' This method creates the schemas associated with the first level of relationships ' assuming source json element already exists. sub CreateAssociation (sourceClass, sourceJsonElem) ' define variables dim navigableConnectorsList dim clientElementList dim targetElem as EA.Element dim targetJsonElem as EA.Element dim connector as EA.Connector
' get all supplier associations from sourceClass and transfer them to json schema associations set navigableConnectorsList = getNavigableConnectors(sourceClass, "Association", "Class") TransferRelations navigableConnectorsList, sourceClass, sourceJsonElem, "Association", "TMF_Schema_Associates_Schema"
end sub
sub TransferRelations (ConnectorGuidList, sourceElement, SourceJsonElem, relType, relStereotype) dim targetElem as EA.Element dim targetJsonElem as EA.Element dim targetName ' as string dim connectorGuid ' as string dim connector as EA.Connector dim sourceConnector as EA.Connector dim connectorAttribute as EA.Attribute dim targetConnectorAttribute as EA.Attribute dim isSupplier dim searchConnector as EA.Connector dim bounds dim upperBound ' as string dim lowerBound ' as string dim searchName ' as string
Session.Output "now transfer relationships" ' iterate associations and create for each connectorGuid in ConnectorGuidList set connector = nothing
' search for element w/ target name and stereotype set sourceConnector = Repository.GetConnectorByGuid(connectorGuid)
' check if the sourceElement is the client or supplier if sourceConnector.ClientID = sourceElement.ElementID then isSupplier = false set targetElem = Repository.GetElementByID(sourceConnector.SupplierID) elseif sourceConnector.SupplierID = sourceElement.ElementID then isSupplier = true set targetElem = Repository.GetElementByID(sourceConnector.ClientID) end if
' try to find existing json element set targetJsonElem = findJsonElement(targetElem)
' if not found, create element and association if targetJsonElem is nothing then ' create element set targetJsonElem = TransferClass(targetElem, Repository.GetCurrentDiagram()) end if
' create default name if none exists if sourceConnector.Name = "" then searchName = SourceJsonElem.Name+"_Associates_"+targetJsonElem.Name else searchName = sourceConnector.Name end if
' check if the connector already exists for each searchConnector in targetJsonElem.Connectors ' if the connector is found leave connector set to this target if searchConnector.Name = searchName then ' if relationship is found to have already been created, exit set connector = searchConnector exit for end if next
' if the connector is not found create it if connector is nothing then if isSupplier = false then set connector = addConnector(sourceJsonElem, relType, relStereotype, targetJsonElem) else set connector = addConnector(targetJsonElem, relType, relStereotype, sourceJsonElem) end if end if
' copy all connector properties from the source to the target if a new connector has been created copyConnector sourceConnector,connector copyConnectorEnd sourceConnector.ClientEnd, connector.ClientEnd copyConnectorEnd sourceConnector.SupplierEnd, connector.SupplierEnd connector.Name = searchName connector.Update
' add attribute to schema set connectorAttribute = setAttribute(SourceJsonElem, connector.Name, "") connectorAttribute.Type = targetJsonElem.Name connectorAttribute.ClassifierID = targetJsonElem.ElementID if isSupplier = false then connectorAttribute.UpperBound = getConnectorEndUpperBound(connector.SupplierEnd) connectorAttribute.LowerBound = getConnectorEndLowerBound(connector.SupplierEnd) else connectorAttribute.UpperBound = getConnectorEndUpperBound(connector.ClientEnd) connectorAttribute.LowerBound = getConnectorEndLowerBound(connector.ClientEnd) end if connectorAttribute.Update SourceJsonElem.Update
' add attribute to target schema if reverse is navigable if isSupplier=true then if sourceConnector.SupplierEnd.Navigable<>"Non-Navigable" then set targetConnectorAttribute = setAttribute(targetJsonElem, connector.Name, "") targetConnectorAttribute.Type = SourceJsonElem.Name targetConnectorAttribute.ClassifierID = SourceJsonElem.ElementID targetConnectorAttribute.UpperBound = getConnectorEndUpperBound(connector.SupplierEnd) targetConnectorAttribute.LowerBound = getConnectorEndLowerBound(connector.SupplierEnd) targetConnectorAttribute.Update targetJsonElem.Update end if else if sourceConnector.ClientEnd.Navigable<>"Non-Navigable" then set targetConnectorAttribute = setAttribute(targetJsonElem, connector.Name, "") targetConnectorAttribute.Type = SourceJsonElem.Name targetConnectorAttribute.ClassifierID = SourceJsonElem.ElementID targetConnectorAttribute.UpperBound = getConnectorEndUpperBound(connector.ClientEnd) targetConnectorAttribute.LowerBound = getConnectorEndLowerBound(connector.ClientEnd) targetConnectorAttribute.Update targetJsonElem.Update end if end if connector.Update next end sub
function findJsonElement(element) dim name dim jsonElem ' dim element as EA.Element dim connector as EA.Connector dim candidateElem as EA.Element dim condition dim condition2 set candidateElem = nothing name = Replace(element.Name, " ", "") set jsonElem = lookupElement(name, "TMF_JSON_Schema", "Class") set findJsonElement = jsonElem ' iterate connectors for each connector in element.Connectors ' find connector which is realization with this element as the supplier condition = connector.SupplierID = element.ElementID and connector.MetaType = "Realisation" if condition then ' check the name and the stereotype of the element on the client end of the relationships set candidateElem = Repository.GetElementByID(connector.ClientID) condition2 = candidateElem.Stereotype = "TMF_JSON_Schema" and candidateElem.Name = name if condition2 then set findJsonElement = candidateElem exit for end if end if next if candidateElem is nothing then set findJsonElement = nothing end if end function
OnDiagramScript

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Create Sequence Diagram via PlantUML" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Common.Print-Array !INC Common.color-picker !INC EAScriptLib.VBScript-Logging 'LOGLEVEL=0 'ERROR LOGLEVEL=1 'INFO 'LOGLEVEL=2 'WARNING 'LOGLEVEL=3 'DEBUG 'LOGLEVEL=4 'TRACE ' ' Script Name: GenerateSequenceDiagramViaPlantUML ' Author: David Anderson ' Purpose: Import PlantUML Script into an EA diagram ' Date: 11-Feb-2019 ' ' Diagram Script main function ' dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram dim currentPackage as EA.Package dim timeline_array (99,7) 'store timeline elements dim sequence_array (99,7) 'store interations dim layout_array (99, 7) 'store coridinates of all sequences and fragments that needs to be positioned
dim left dim t 'timeline array index dim s 'sequence array index dim f 'fragment array index dim l 'layout array index
dim fragment_level 'fragment level indicator dim partition_level 'partition level within a fragment
sub OnDiagramScript() 'Show the script output window Repository.EnsureOutputVisible "Script" call LOGInfo ("------VBScript Create Sequence Diagram via PlantUML------" )
' Get a reference to the current diagram set currentDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram() set currentPackage = Repository.GetPackageByID(currentDiagram.PackageID) dim PlantUML dim word
if not currentDiagram is nothing then 'check..' if currentDiagram.Type = "Sequence" then ' Get a reference to any selected objects dim selectedObjects as EA.Collection set selectedObjects = currentDiagram.SelectedObjects 'dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject 'dim element as EA.Element
if selectedObjects.Count = 1 then ' One or more diagram objects are selected Dim theSelectedElement as EA.Element Dim selectedObject as EA.DiagramObject set selectedObject = selectedObjects.GetAt (0) set theSelectedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(selectedObject.ElementID) if not theSelectedElement is nothing and theSelectedElement.ObjectType = otElement and theSelectedElement.Type = "Note" then 'split note.. call LOGDebug( "PlantUML") dim i left=30 'set initial fragment_level=0 PlantUML = Split(theSelectedElement.Notes,vbcrlf,-1,0) for i = 0 to Ubound(PlantUML) call LOGDebug ( "Processing: " & PlantUML(i) ) if not PlantUML(i) = "" then if not Asc(PlantUML(i)) = 39 then word=split(PlantUML(i)) select case ucase(word(0)) case "ACTOR" create_timeline(PlantUML(i)) case "PARTICIPANT" create_timeline(PlantUML(i)) case "BOUNDARY" create_timeline(PlantUML(i)) case "CONTROL" create_timeline(PlantUML(i)) case "ENTITY" create_timeline(PlantUML(i)) case "COLLECTIONS" create_timeline(PlantUML(i)) case "DATABASE" create_timeline(PlantUML(i)) case "BOX" create_timeline(PlantUML(i)) case "END" resize_diagramObject(PlantUML(i)) 'box or a partition case "ACTIVATE" 'Session.Output( "skip: " & PlantUML(i) ) 'ignore case "DEACTIVATE" 'Session.Output( "skip: " & PlantUML(i) ) 'ignore case "ALT" create_fragment(PlantUML(i)) 'add fragment case "OPT" create_fragment(PlantUML(i)) 'add fragment case "BREAK" create_fragment(PlantUML(i)) 'add fragment case "LOOP" create_fragment(PlantUML(i)) 'add fragment case "CRITICAL" create_fragment(PlantUML(i)) 'add fragment case "ELSE" add_partition(PlantUML(i) ) 'add partition to fragment case else create_sequence(PlantUML(i)) 'replace with a regex expression to make sure sctipt line si indeed a sequence end select end if end if next
call LOGTrace( "**Timeline Array**" ) Call PrintArray (timeline_array,0,t-1)
call layout_objects 'set relative coordinates of seqeunces & fragments
call LOGTrace( "**Layout Array**" ) Call PrintArray (layout_array,0,l-1)
ReloadDiagram(currentDiagram.DiagramID)
call LOGInfo ( "Script Complete" ) call LOGInfo ( "===============" ) Session.Prompt "Done" , promptOK else Session.Prompt "A note object with the valid PlantUML script should be selected" , promptOK end if else if selectedObjects.Count = 0 then ' Nothing is selected Session.Prompt "A note object with the valid PlantUML script should be selected" , promptOK else Session.Prompt "Only one object should be selected" , promptOK end if end if else Session.Prompt "This script does not yet support " & currentDiagram.Type & " diagrams" , promptOK end if else Session.Prompt "This script requires a diagram to be visible", promptOK end if
end sub
OnDiagramScript
sub create_timeline(PlantUML) dim i dim word dim sql dim elementName dim elementType dim elementStereotype dim elements as EA.Collection dim element as EA.Element dim diagramObjects as EA.Collection dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim width dim diagramObjectName call LOGTrace("create_timeline(" & PlantUML & ")") word=split(PlantUML) select case Ucase(word(0)) case "BOX" elementType = "Boundary" width=10 elementStereotype = "" case "ACTOR" elementType = "Actor" width=90 elementStereotype = "" case "DATABASE" elementType = "Component" width=90 elementStereotype = "database" case "BOUNDARY" elementType = "Sequence" width=50 elementStereotype = "boundary" case "CONTROL" elementType = "Sequence" width=50 elementStereotype = "control" case "ENTITY" elementType = "Sequence" width=50 elementStereotype = "entity" case "COLLECTIONS" elementType = "Sequence" width=90 elementStereotype = "collections" case else elementType = "Sequence" width=90 elementStereotype = "" end select
'check if word begins with a quote.. if yes then the name is multi word.. and therefore need to reconstruct name without quotes
if Asc(word(1)) = 34 then 'check for quotes elementName = mid(word(1),2) 'loop until find the word with the enclosing chr(34) for i = 2 to Ubound(word) if Asc(right(word(i), 1)) = 34 then dim x x = int(len(word(i)))-1 elementName = elementName & " " & mid(word(i),1, x) exit for else elementName = elementName & " " & word(i) end if next else elementName = word(1) end if
sql ="SELECT Object_ID FROM t_object WHERE t_object.Name =" & chr(34) & elementName & chr(34) & " and t_object.Object_Type = " & chr(34) & elementType & chr(34) call LOGDebug ( "sql: " & sql)
set elements=Repository.GetElementSet(sql,2) call LOGDebug ("elements returned: " & elements.Count) if elements.Count = 0 then 'add element set elements = currentPackage.Elements set element = elements.AddNew( elementName, elementType ) element.Stereotype = elementStereotype if instr(Ucase(PlantUML)," AS ") > 0 then element.Alias = elementAlias(PlantUML) end if if element.Type = "Boundary" then dim borderStyle set borderStyle = element.Properties("BorderStyle") borderStyle.value = "Solid" end if element.Update currentPackage.elements.Refresh call LOGInfo( "Added Element: " & element.Name & " (ID=" & element.ElementID & ") in package " & currentPackage.Name ) else set element = Repository.GetElementByID(elements.GetAt(0).ElementID) end if
if elementType="Boundary" then diagramObjectName= "l=" & left & ";r=" & left+width & ";t=28;b=-278" else diagramObjectName= "l=" & left & ";r=" & left+width & ";t=50;b=-250" end if left=left+width+45 set DiagramObjects = currentDiagram.DiagramObjects set diagramObject = currentDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew(diagramObjectName, elementType) diagramObject.ElementID = element.ElementID 'default color if instr(PlantUML,"#") > 0 then diagramObject.BackgroundColor = color(PlantUML) end if diagramObject.Update diagramObjects.Refresh currentDiagram.Update
'add to tineline_array timeline_array (t,0) = element.ElementID timeline_array (t,1) = diagramObject.InstanceID timeline_array (t,2) = element.Name timeline_array (t,3) = element.Alias timeline_array (t,4) = Ucase(word(0)) 'PlantUML participant timeline_array (t,5) = diagramObject.left timeline_array (t,6) = diagramObject.right t=t+1 call LOGTrace("create_timeline") end sub
sub resize_diagramObject(script) dim i dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject call LOGTrace ("resize_diagramObject(" & script & ")") if ucase(script) = "END BOX" then 'find box in the timeline_array for i = t to 0 step -1 if timeline_array (i,4) = "BOX" then for each diagramObject in currentDiagram.DiagramObjects if diagramObject.ElementID = timeline_array(i,0) then diagramObject.right = left diagramObject.Update left=left+15 exit for end if next end if next else 'add fragment end to layout array layout_array (l,0) = fragment_level 'used to calculate height of object at same level layout_array (l,1) = "End" 'type of object 'layout_array (l,2) = "" 'id of the connector l=l+1 fragment_level = fragment_level-1 end if call LOGTrace ("resize_diagramObject")
end sub
sub create_sequence(script) dim word dim i dim element as EA.Element dim connector as EA.Connector
call LOGTrace( "create sequence(" & script & ")") word=split(script)
'add to sequence array 'Session.Output( "word count(" & ubound(word)+1 & ")") sequence_array (s,0) = timelineElementID(word(0)) 'source elementID sequence_array (s,1) = word(1) 'interaction type sequence_array (s,2) = timelineElementID(word(2)) 'target elementID
'create connector set element = Repository.GetElementByID (sequence_array (s,0)) set connector = element.Connectors.AddNew("","Sequence") connector.SupplierID = sequence_array (s,2) connector.SequenceNo = (s+1)*10 connector.Name = connectorName(script) connector.DiagramID = currentDiagram.DiagramID
sequence_array (s,3) = connector.Name sequence_array (s,4) = synch(word(1)) sequence_array (s,5) = signature(script) sequence_array (s,6) = isReturn(word(1)) sequence_array (s,7) = connector.ConnectorID
connector.Update element.Connectors.Refresh
dim sql sql ="UPDATE t_connector SET PData1 = '" & sequence_array (s,4) & "', PData2 = '" & sequence_array (s,5) & "', PData4 = '" & sequence_array (s,6) & "' WHERE Connector_Id = " & connector.ConnectorID & ";" call LOGDebug ( "SQL: " & sql)
Repository.Execute(sql) set connector = Repository.GetConnectorByID(connector.ConnectorID) element.Update call LOGDebug ("+created connector (" & connector.ConnectorID & ")" & vbcrlf & _ vbtab & vbtab & vbtab & " synch: " & connector.MiscData(0) ) 'Session.Output( " signature: " & connector.MiscData(1)) 'Session.Output( " isReturn: " & connector.MiscData(3)) 'Session.Output( " startpoint x: " & connector.StartPointX ) 'Session.Output( " startpoint y: " & connector.StartPointY ) 'Session.Output( " endpoint x: " & connector.EndPointX ) 'Session.Output( " endpoint y: " & connector.EndPointY ) 'Session.Output( " name: " & connector.Name ) 'Session.Output( " type: " & connector.Type ) 'Session.Output( " objecttype: " & connector.ObjectType) 'Session.Output( " styleEx: " & connector.StyleEx )
'add sequence to layout array layout_array (l,0) = fragment_level 'used to calculate height of object at same level if connector.ClientID = connector.SupplierID then layout_array (l,1) = "Sequence2Self" else layout_array (l,1) = "Sequence" 'type of object end if layout_array (l,2) = connector.ConnectorID 'id of the connector l=l+1 s=s+1
end sub
sub create_fragment(script)
dim elements as EA.Collection dim element as EA.Element dim diagramObjects as EA.Collection dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim diagramObjectName dim i dim fragmentName
'create element i = instr(script, " ") if i > 0 then fragmentName = mid(script, i+1) end if set elements = currentPackage.Elements set element = elements.AddNew( fragmentName, "InteractionFragment" ) element.Subtype = fragment_type(mid(script,1, i-1)) element.Update elements.Refresh call LOGInfo( "added fragment: " & fragmentName & " (" & element.ElementID & ")" )
fragment_level=fragment_level+1
'add fragment to layout array layout_array (l,0) = fragment_level 'used to calculate height of object at same level layout_array (l,1) = "InteractionFragment" 'type of object ie seq, Fragment layout_array (l,2) = element.ElementID 'id being element l=l+1
end sub
sub add_partition(script) dim element as EA.Element dim elementId dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim partitions as EA.Collection dim partition as EA._Partition dim partitionName dim i i = instr(script, " ") if i > 0 then partitionName = mid(script, i+1) end if
'get fragment element using the id stored in the layout array for i = l to 0 step-1 if layout_array (i,1) = "InteractionFragment" then elementId = layout_array (i,2) exit for end if next ' set element = Repository.GetElementByID(elementId) set partitions = element.Partitions set partition = partitions.AddNew(partitionName,"Partition") partition.Size=40 'default element.Update currentPackage.elements.Refresh call LOGInfo( "add partition: " & partitionName & " to Fragment (" & element.ElementID & ")" )
'add partition to layout array layout_array (l,0) = fragment_level 'used to calculate height of object at same level layout_array (l,1) = "Partition" 'type of object ie seq, Fragment layout_array (l,2) = element.ElementID 'id being element l=l+1
end sub
function timelineElementID(word) dim i call LOGTrace("timelineElementID(" & word & ")") if right(word,1) = ":" then word = mid(word, 1, len(word)-1) 'remove trailing : end if
for i = 0 to ubound(timeline_array) if word = timeline_array(i,3) then 'check using alias timelineElementID = timeline_array (i,0) exit for else if word = timeline_array(i,2) then 'check using name timelineElementID = timeline_array (i,0) exit for end if end if next call LOGTrace("timelineElementID=" & timelineElementID )
end function
function color(script) 'color is delimited by # 'the color value can be either ' - a Hex version of RGB ' - or a standard color name (refer to color-picker script) 'if a color name is provided, call color-picker to return hex value of RGB 'if not.. look up get the hex vales by color name 'return a decimal value of the RGB ' dim word dim hexRGB dim i call LOGTrace("color(" & script & ")" )
word=split(script) for i = 0 to ubound(word) if Asc(word(i)) = 35 then 'check for hash call LOGDebug( "word=" & word(i)) if ishex(mid(word(i),2,len(word(i))-1)) then hexRGB = mid(word(i),2,6) else hexRGB = mid(ColorHexByName(Ucase(word(i))),2,6) end if call LOGDebug( "hexRGB=" & hexRGB) exit for end if next if not hexRGB = "" then color=clng("&h" & mid(hexRGB,5,2) & mid(hexRGB,3,2) & mid(hexRGB,1,2)) call LOGDebug( "color decimal=" & color) end if call LOGTrace("color=" & color )
end function
function ishex(word) ishex= isnumeric("&h" & word) end function
function elementAlias(script) dim i dim word elementAlias=""
'check if word begins with a quote.. if yes then the name is multi word.. and therefore need to reconstruct name without quotes
word=split(script) ' find as for i = 0 to ubound(word) if ucase(word(i)) = "AS" then exit for end if next
if Asc(word(i+1)) = 34 then 'check for quotes elementAlias = mid(word(i+1),2) 'loop until find the word with the enclosing chr(34) for i = i+2 to Ubound(word) if Asc(right(word(i), 1)) = 34 then dim x x = int(len(word(i)))-1 elementAlias = elementAlias & " " & mid(word(i),1, x) exit for else elementAlias = elementAlias & " " & word(i) end if next else elementAlias = word(i+1) end if end function
function connectorName(script) 'start with : 'end with ( dim x dim y
x = inStr(script, ":") y = inStr(script, "(") if x > 0 then if y > x then connectorName = trim(mid(script, x+1, y-x-1)) else connectorName = trim(mid(script, x+1)) end if end if end function
function synch(arrow) call LOGTrace("synch(" & arrow & ")") if arrow = "->>" or _ arrow = "->>" then synch = "Asynchronous" else synch = "Synchronous" end if call LOGTrace("synch=" & synch) end function
function signature(script) dim i dim j call LOGTrace("signature(" & script & ")")
signature=""
i = inStr(script, ":") 'find first : j= inStr(i+1,script, ":") 'find second : denoting retrun value if j > 0 then signature = "retval=" & trim(mid(script,j+1)) else signature = "retval=void" end if
i = inStr(script, "()") 'indicates there are no params if i = 0 then i = inStr(script, "(") if i > 0 then 'add parms j = inStr(script, ")") signature = signature & ";params=;paramsDlg=" & trim(mid(script, i+1, j-i-1)) & ";" end if end if
call LOGTrace("signature(" & signature & ")")
end function
function isReturn(arrow) call LOGTrace("isReturn(" & arrow & ")") if arrow = "-->>" or _ arrow = "-->>"then isReturn = 1 else isReturn = 0 end if call LOGTrace("isReturn=" & isReturn)
end function
function fragment_type(script)
select case script case "alt" fragment_type = 0 case "opt" fragment_type = 1 case "break" fragment_type = 2 case "par" fragment_type = 3 case "loop" fragment_type = 4 case "critical" fragment_type = 5 case else fragment_type = 0 end select end function
sub layout_objects()
dim i dim j dim connector as EA.Connector dim element as EA.Element dim diagramObjectName dim diagramObjects as EA.Collection dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim diagramLink as EA.DiagramLink
dim partition as EA._Partition dim top dim bottom dim LOGLEVEL_SAVE LOGLEVEL_SAVE = LOGLEVEL 'LOGLEVEL=3 'DEBUG
'LOGDebug ("layout array count l-1=" & l-1 & " Ubound(layout_array)=" & Ubound(layout_array)) for i = 0 to l-1 'call calculate fragment heights (reursively) if layout_array(i,1) = "InteractionFragment" then layout_array (i,3) = fragmentHeight (layout_array (i,0), i) else if layout_array(i,1) = "Partition" then layout_array (i,3) = partitionHeight (layout_array (i,0), i) else 'layout_array (i,3) = layout_array (i,3) + height(layout_array (i,1)) 'j = sequenceIndex(layout_array (i,2)) 'if sequence_array(j,0) = sequence_array(j,2) then ' layout_array (i,3) = layout_array (i,3) + 10 'adjust hieght 'end if end if end if next
'set cordinates of each object top = -130
for i = 0 to l-1 'set top as an accumulation of object layout_array (i,4) = top if layout_array(i,1) = "InteractionFragment" then layout_array (i,4) = top + 20 layout_array (i,5) = layout_array (i,4) - layout_array (i,3) 'bottom 'set left and right coordinates based on the timelines call setLeftRightCoordinates(layout_array (i,0),i) else layout_array (i,4) = top top = top - height(layout_array (i,1)) 'self message height layout_array (i,5) = layout_array (i,4) end if next
set diagramObjects = currentDiagram.DiagramObjects for i = 0 to l-1 if layout_array(i,1) = "Sequence" then 'get connector & update connector Y coordinates 'set connector = Repository.GetConnectorByID (layout_array (i,2)) 'set element = Repository.GetElementByID(connector.ClientID) ' 'element.Connectors.Refresh 'set connector = Repository.GetConnectorByID (layout_array (i,2)) 'call LOGDebug( "*move sequence(" & layout_array (i,2) & ") " & connector.Name & " from " & connector.StartPointX & ":" & connector.StartPointY & " to " & layout_array (i,4)) 'connector.StartPointX = 1 'connector.StartPointY = layout_array (i,4) 'connector.EndPointX = 2 'connector.EndPointY = layout_array (i,5) 'connector.Update 'element.Connectors.Refresh 'element.Update 'currentPackage.elements.Refresh 'create diagramlink 'set diagramLink = currentDiagram.DiagramLinks.AddNew("","") 'diagramLink.ConnectorID=connector.ConnectorID 'Call LOGInfo( "created diagramLink (" & diagramLink.ConnectorID & ")") 'Session.Output( " geometry: " & diagramLink.Geometry ) 'diagramLink.Update 'currentDiagram.DiagramLinks.Refresh 'currentDiagram.Update 'Call LOGInfo( "created diagramLink (" & diagramLink.ConnectorID & ")") 'call LOGInfo( "connector (" & layout_array (i,2) & ") " & connector.Name & " startX:Y=" & connector.StartPointX & ":" & connector.StartPointY) end if if layout_array(i,1) = "InteractionFragment" then LOGDebug ("i="& i & ":Processing InteractionFragment " & layout_array (i,2)) 'add diagramobject diagramObjectName= "l=" & layout_array (i,6) & ";r=" & layout_array (i,7) & ";t=" & layout_array (i,4) & ";b=" & layout_array (i,3) set diagramObject = currentDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew(diagramObjectName, layout_array (i,1)) diagramObject.top = layout_array (i,4) diagramObject.bottom = layout_array (i,5) diagramObject.left = layout_array (i,6) diagramObject.right = layout_array (i,7) diagramObject.ElementID = layout_array (i,2) Call LOGInfo( "created diagramObject (" & diagramObject.ElementID & ") Top=" & diagramObject.top & " Bottom=" & diagramObject.bottom & " Left=" & diagramObject.left & " Right=" & diagramObject.right ) diagramObject.Update diagramObjects.Refresh currentDiagram.Update end if if layout_array(i,1) = "Partition" then 'update partition size LOGDebug ("i="& i & ":Processing partition for " & layout_array (i,2)) dim pcount pcount=0 for j = i-1 to 0 step -1 LOGDebug ("j=" & j) if layout_array (i,2) = layout_array (j,2) then 'resolve which partition by counting the partitions with the same element id.. pcount=pcount+1 LOGDebug ("increment pcount to " & pcount) end if next set element = Repository.GetElementByID(layout_array (i,2)) for each partition in element.Partitions call LOGDebug( "Partitition for " & element.ElementID & " " & "name=" & partition.Name & " object type=" & partition.ObjectType & " size=" & partition.size) next LOGDebug ("Update partition number " & pcount-1 & " of " & element.Partitions.Count & " to " & layout_array (i,3)) set partition = element.Partitions.GetAt(pcount-1) LOGDebug ("partition size to be updated from " & partition.Size & " to " & layout_array (i,3)) partition.Size = layout_array (i,3) element.Update LOGLEVEL=LOGLEVEL_SAVE end if next
'resize any timline boxes bottom = 0 for i = 0 to l-1 if layout_array (i,5) < bottom then bottom = layout_array (i,5) end if next
' call LOGDebug( "*resize timeline boxes to " & bottom) for i = 0 to t-1 if timeline_array (i,4) = "BOX" then ' call LOGDebug( "*Box (" & timeline_array(i,0) & ") to be resized") for each diagramObject in currentDiagram.DiagramObjects if diagramObject.ElementID = timeline_array(i,0) then diagramObject.bottom = bottom - 5 diagramObject.Update exit for end if next end if next
currentDiagram.Update Repository.SaveDiagram(currentDiagram.DiagramID) 'Repository.ReloadPackage(currentPackage.PackageID) ReloadDiagram(currentDiagram.DiagramID) 'LOGLEVEL=3 call LOGTrace( "**Layout Array - updated**" ) Call PrintArray (layout_array,0,l-1)
'LOGLEVEL=2
end sub
function height(thing) call LOGTrace("height(" & thing & ")") select case thing case "Sequence" height = 35 case "Sequence2Self" height = 45 case "InteractionFragment" height = 0 'alt, loop etc case "Partition" height = 0 'else case "End" height = 0 case else height = 0 end select call LOGTrace("height=" & height) end function
function fragmentHeight(level, start) dim i
call LOGTrace( "fragmentHeight(" & level & ":" & start & ")" ) fragmentHeight=0 ' for i = start to Ubound(layout_array) for i = start to l-1 ' if layout_array(i,0) = "" then ' exit for ' end if 'look for end of fragment for this level if layout_array(i,1) = "End" and _ layout_array(i,0) = level then exit for end if fragmentHeight = fragmentHeight + height(layout_array (i,1)) next call LOGTrace( "fragmentHeight=" & fragmentHeight )
end function
function partitionHeight(level, start) dim i dim LOGLEVEL_SAVE
LOGLEVEL_SAVE = LOGLEVEL ' LOGLEVEL=4 'activate debugging for the sub
call LOGTrace( "partitionHeight(" & level & ":" & start & ")" ) partitionHeight=height(layout_array (start,1)) for i = start+1 to Ubound(layout_array) 'end of partition is not specifically declared.. if layout_array(i,0) = level then if layout_array(i,1) = "InteractionFragment" or _ layout_array(i,1) = "Partition" or _ layout_array(i,1) = "End" then exit for end if end if 'is dependant upon nuumber of sequences partitionHeight = partitionHeight + height(layout_array (i,1)) 'end of partition is identified when the level indicator is less than what was passed to it next call LOGTrace( "partitionHeight=" & partitionHeight )
'restore logging level ' LOGLEVEL=LOGLEVEL_SAVE
end function
sub setLeftRightCoordinates(level,start) 'loop thru list of timelines in scope of this level and retrun the lowest value
dim i dim j dim connector as EA.Connector dim tLeft dim tRight 'LOGLEVEL=3 '
call LOGTrace("setLeftRightCoordinates(" & level & ":" & start & ")")
layout_array(start,6) = 400 layout_array(start,7) = 0
for i = start to l-1 'need some way to identify nested fragments and whether the left and right values need adjusting if layout_array(i,1) = "Sequence" or _ layout_array(i,1) = "Sequence2Self" then set connector = Repository.GetConnectorByID(layout_array(i,2))
j=timelineIndex(connector.ClientID) tLeft = timeline_array(j,5) call LOGDebug("client(" & connector.ClientID & ") " & tLeft) if tLeft < layout_array(start,6) then layout_array(start,6) = tLeft - 25 end if tRight = timeline_array(j,6) ' call LOGDebug("client(" & connector.ClientID & ") " & tRight) if tRight > layout_array(start,7) then layout_array(start,7) = tRight +25 end if
if layout_array(i,1) = "Sequence" then j=timelineIndex(connector.SupplierID) tLeft = timeline_array(j,5) call LOGDebug("supplier(" & connector.SupplierID & ") " & tLeft) if tLeft < layout_array(start,6) then layout_array(start,6) = tLeft -25 end if tRight = timeline_array(j,6) ' call LOGDebug("supplier(" & connector.SupplierID & ") " & tRight) if tRight > layout_array(start,7) then layout_array(start,7) = tRight + 25 end if end if
if layout_array(start,6) < 5 then 'left coordinate cannot be less than zero layout_array(start,6)=5 end if
'check if margins need to adjusted becuase the fragment is nested if level > 1 then for j = start to 0 step -1 if layout_array(j,0) = level -1 and _ layout_array(j,1) = "InteractionFragment" then 'scan layout arrary to find previous level fragmant if layout_array(start,4) = layout_array(j,4) then 'if top value are the same subtract 5 layout_array(start,4) = layout_array(start,4) - 5 end if if layout_array(start,5) = layout_array(j,5) then 'if bottom values are the same add 5 layout_array(start,5) = layout_array(start,5) + 5 end if if layout_array(start,6) = layout_array(j,6) then 'if left value are the same add 10 layout_array(start,6) = layout_array(start,6) + 10 end if if layout_array(start,7) = layout_array(j,7) then 'if right values are the same subtract 10 layout_array(start,7) = layout_array(start,7) - 10 end if exit for end if next end if call LOGDebug("Left=" & layout_array(start,6) & ":Right=" & layout_array(start,7))
end if 'look for end of fragment for this level if layout_array(i,1) = "End" and _ layout_array(i,0) = level then exit for end if next
call LOGTrace("setLeftRightCoordinates: Left=" & layout_array(start,6) & ":Right=" & layout_array(start,7)) 'LOGLEVEL=2 '
end sub
function timelineIndex(timelineId) dim i call LOGTrace("timelineIndex(" & timelineId & ")") 'call LOGDebug("t=" & t)
for i = 0 to t-1 if timelineId = timeline_array(i,0) then 'check using element id timelineIndex = i exit for end if next
call LOGTrace("timelineIndex=" & timelineIndex)
end function
function sequenceIndex(sequenceId) dim i call LOGTrace("sequenceIndex(" & sequenceId & ")") 'call LOGDebug("s=" & s)
for i = 0 to s-1 if sequenceId = sequence_array(i,7) then 'check using element id sequenceIndex = i exit for end if next
call LOGTrace("sequenceIndex=" & sequenceIndex)
end function

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Elements -> Create Action Flows" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
' ' This code has been included from the default Diagram Script template. ' If you wish to modify this template, it is located in the Config\Script Templates ' directory of your EA install path. ' ' Script Name: ' Author: ' Purpose: ' Date: '
' ' Diagram Script main function '
' query to get all of the diagramlinks associated with a given connector query_diagramlinks = "SELECT t_diagramlinks.DiagramID as ElementID FROM ASOT.t_diagramlinks WHERE ConnectorID = "
sub OnDiagramScript()
' Get a reference to the current diagram dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram set currentDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram()
if not currentDiagram is nothing then ' Get a reference to any selected connector/objects dim selectedConnector as EA.Connector dim api_operation as EA.Method dim selectedObjects as EA.Collection set selectedConnector = currentDiagram.SelectedConnector set selectedObjects = currentDiagram.SelectedObjects
if not selectedConnector is nothing then ' A connector is selected elseif selectedObjects.Count > 0 then ' One or more diagram objects are selected dim tmf_api as EA.Element for each tmf_api in selectedObjects ' ensure the object is a TMF_API if tmf_api.Stereotype <> "TMF_API" then session.output tmf_api.Name & " is not an api" end if ' Create a flow for each operation for each api_operation in tmf_api.Methods createFlows tmf_api, api_operation next next else ' Nothing is selected end if else set tmf_api = Repository.GetElementByGuid("{2C7D4878-E607-4c01-B847-560DAD4D00C9}") for each api_operation in tmf_api.Methods CreateFlows tmf_api, api_operation next end if
end sub
function CreateFlows(api, api_operation) ' dim api_operation as EA.Method ' dim api as EA.Element
dim subject as EA.Element dim IntegrationManager as EA.Element dim Serializer as EA.Element dim d_action as EA.TaggedValue dim d_referenced_behavior as EA.TaggedValue dim config dim action
set subject = Repository.GetElementByGuid("{4C7F9898-2BD3-4dce-84F3-2E3D3C790E86}") set Serializer = Repository.GetElementByGuid("{27CD692B-C8AA-4de7-A394-7A2FFF12E029}") set IntegrationManager = Repository.GetElementByGuid("{6D345774-0613-42d7-975C-45AD4D252B39}")
config = api.Name&"__"&api_operation.Name
' create x->subject ' dim push_connector as EA.Connector ' set push_connector = subject.Connectors.AddNew("", "Dependency") ' push_connector.SupplierID = api.ElementID ' action = buildActionName(api, api_operation) ' createActionKey push_connector, "Push", "push", buildContext(api, api_operation), ""
' create subject->component dim component_connector as EA.Connector set component_connector = subject.Connectors.AddNew("", "Dependency") api.Connectors.Refresh() component_connector.SupplierID = api.ElementID action = buildActionName(api, api_operation) createActionKey component_connector, buildActionName(api, api_operation), buildActionName(api, api_operation), buildContext(api, api_operation), "Subject", buildConf(api, api_operation)
' create component->serialization flow dim serialization_connector as EA.Connector set serialization_connector = api.Connectors.AddNew("", "Dependency") api.Connectors.Refresh() serialization_connector.SupplierID = Serializer.ElementID action = buildActionName(api, api_operation) createActionKey serialization_connector, "serializeToJson", "SerializeToJson", buildContext(api, api_operation), api.Name, buildConf(api, api_operation)
' create serialization->integration manager flow dim integration_manager_connector as EA.Connector set integration_manager_connector = Serializer.Connectors.AddNew("", "Dependency") api.Connectors.Refresh() integration_manager_connector.SupplierID = IntegrationManager.ElementID action = buildActionName(api, api_operation) createActionKey integration_manager_connector, "Publish", "publish", buildContext(api, api_operation), api.Name, buildConf(api, api_operation)
end function
function buildActionName(api, api_operation) ' Find the position of the last forward slash dim path_tv as EA.TaggedValue dim method_tv as EA.TaggedValue dim path_val dim path dim method
set path_tv = api_operation.TaggedValues.GetByName("relativePath") path_val = path_tv.Value path = Mid(path_val, 2)
set method_tv = api_operation.TaggedValues.GetByName("hTTPMethod") method = method_tv.Value
buildActionName = UCase(method) & Replace(path, "/", "")
end function
function buildContext(api, api_operation) dim path_tv as EA.TaggedValue dim path_val dim context set path_tv = api_operation.TaggedValues.GetByName("relativePath") path_val = path_tv.Value
context = Replace(path_val, "/", "^") buildContext = api.Name&"_"&context&"_"&buildActionName(api, api_operation) end function
function buildConf(api, api_operation) dim actionName actionName = buildActionName(api, api_operation) buildConf = api.Name&"__"&actionName end function
function createActionKey(connector, action, ref_behaviour, context, decorator, conf) ' dim connector as EA.Connector dim action_tv as EA.TaggedValue dim ref_behaviour_tv as EA.TaggedValue dim context_tv as EA.TaggedValue dim conf_tv as EA.TaggedValue dim decorator_tv as EA.TaggedValue dim curr_diagram as EA.Diagram
connector.Stereotype = "dActionKey" connector.Update()
' Set the action tagged value set action_tv = connector.TaggedValues.GetByName("action") action_tv.Value = action action_tv.Update()
' Set the ref_behaviour tagged value set ref_behaviour_tv = connector.TaggedValues.GetAt(4) ref_behaviour_tv.Value = ref_behaviour ref_behaviour_tv.Update()
' Set the context tagged value set context_tv = connector.TaggedValues.GetByName("context") context_tv.Value = context context_tv.Update()
' Set the conf tagged value set conf_tv = connector.TaggedValues.GetByName("config") conf_tv.Value = conf conf_tv.Update()
' Set the decorator tagged value set decorator_tv = connector.TaggedValues.GetByName("decorator") decorator_tv.Value = decorator decorator_tv.Update()
connector.Update()
Repository.SaveAllDiagrams() Repository.RefreshModelView 0
HideConnectorInAllOtherDiagrams(connector)
end function
function HideConnectorInAllOtherDiagrams(connector) dim query: query = query_diagramlinks& connector.ConnectorID &";" dim resultXML: resultXML = Repository.SQLQuery(query)
' Create an XMLDOM object to parse the result dim xmlDoc set xmlDoc = CreateObject("Microsoft.XMLDOM") xmlDoc.LoadXML(resultXML)
' Get the list of diagram nodes dim diagramNodes set diagramNodes = xmlDoc.SelectNodes("/EADATA/Dataset_0/Data/Row/ElementID")
' Loop through each diagram and hide the connector dim diagramNode dim diagramID dim diagram dim cur_diagram set cur_diagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram() for each diagramNode in diagramNodes diagramID = diagramNode.text set diagram = Repository.GetDiagramByID(diagramID) if not diagram is nothing and diagram.DiagramID <> cur_diagram.DiagramID then ' Hide the connector in the diagram dim diagramLink for each diagramLink in diagram.DiagramLinks if diagramLink.ConnectorID = connectorID then diagramLink.IsHidden = True diagramLink.Update end if next ' Update the diagram diagram.Update end if next
End function
' Function to extract the end of the URL Function GetURLEnd(url) b ' Find the position of the last forward slash Dim lastSlashPos lastSlashPos = InStrRev(url, "/")
' Extract the substring after the last slash If lastSlashPos > 0 Then GetURLEnd = Mid(url, lastSlashPos + 1) Else GetURLEnd = url ' If no slash is found, return the entire URL End If End Function
OnDiagramScript

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
Option Explicit !INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
'========================================================================== ' Script Name: NormalizeMySQLAttributeTypes.vbs ' Author: Giu ' Purpose: Recursively scan all classes in a package (from the ' Project Browser) and convert MySQL attribute types to UML2. ' Date: 2025/04/22 '==========================================================================
Sub OnProjectBrowserScript() Dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
Select Case treeSelectedType Case otPackage Dim thePackage Set thePackage = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() tramsformPackage thePackage
Case Else Session.Prompt "This script only supports Packages.", promptOK End Select End Sub
' entry point OnProjectBrowserScript
Sub tramsformPackage(thePackage) If thePackage Is Nothing Then Session.Output "ERROR: No package selected." Exit Sub End If
' Build our typemapping dictionary Dim mapTypes Set mapTypes = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary") mapTypes.CompareMode = vbTextCompare With mapTypes .Add "VARCHAR", "String" .Add "CHAR", "String" .Add "TEXT", "String" .Add "INT", "Int32" .Add "INTEGER", "Int32" .Add "SMALLINT", "Int32" .Add "BIGINT", "Int64" .Add "FLOAT", "Float" .Add "DOUBLE", "Double" .Add "DECIMAL", "Int32" .Add "NUMERIC", "Int32" .Add "DATE", "DateTime" .Add "DATETIME", "DateTime" .Add "TIMESTAMP", "DateTime" .Add "TIME", "DateTime" .Add "BOOLEAN", "Boolean" .Add "BIT", "Boolean" .Add "TINYINT", "Int32" ' add more as needed End With
Session.Output "Normalizing attribute types under Package: " & thePackage.Name ProcessPackage thePackage, mapTypes Session.Output "Done." End Sub
Sub ProcessPackage(pkg, mapTypes) Dim elm For Each elm In pkg.Elements If elm.Type = "Class" Then NormalizeAttributes elm, mapTypes End If Next
Dim subPkg For Each subPkg In pkg.Packages ProcessPackage subPkg, mapTypes Next End Sub
Sub NormalizeAttributes(cls, mapTypes) Dim attr, origType, baseType, newType For Each attr In cls.Attributes origType = Trim(attr.Type) If origType <> "" Then baseType = UCase(Split(origType, "(")(0)) If mapTypes.Exists(baseType) Then newType = mapTypes(baseType) If attr.Type <> newType Then Session.Output " [" & cls.Name & "] " & attr.Name & ": " & origType & " " & newType attr.Type = newType attr.Update End If End If End If NormalizeAttributeStereotype attr, cls Next cls.Attributes.Refresh End Sub
Sub NormalizeAttributeStereotype(attr, cls) ' a simple lookup: any of these source stereotypes become dValue Dim stereotypeMap
Set stereotypeMap = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary") stereotypeMap.CompareMode = vbTextCompare With stereotypeMap .Add "column", "dValue" .Add "XSDelement", "dValue" ' add more sourcetarget mappings if needed End With
Dim currentStereo currentStereo = Trim(attr.Stereotype) If currentStereo <> "" Then If stereotypeMap.Exists(currentStereo) Then attr.Stereotype = stereotypeMap(currentStereo) attr.Update Session.Output " [" & cls.Name & "." & attr.Name & "] stereotype " _ & attr.Stereotype End If End If End Sub

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script to change fill color of elements on a diagram based on an array of rules (conditions) ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2015 Armstrong Process Group, Inc. All rights reserved. www.aprocessgroup.com
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
sub ChangeDiagramElementColor(ruleArray, colorArray)
dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim backgroundColor dim elementID dim element as EA.Element dim index dim rule
set currentDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram()
if not currentDiagram is nothing then
Repository.SaveDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
for each diagramObject in currentDiagram.DiagramObjects
elementID = diagramObject.ElementID
set element = Repository.GetElementByID( elementID)
for index = 0 to UBound(ruleArray)
rule = ruleArray(index) 'Session.Prompt "inside array " & element.Name, promptOK 'Session.Prompt "inside array " & rule, promptOK 'if eval( rule) then Session.Prompt "inside array " & element.Name, promptOK backgroundColor = colorArray(index) element.SetAppearance 1, 0, backgroundColor element.SetAppearance 255,0,backgroundColor element.Update 'end if
next
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
else Session.Prompt "This script requires a diagram to be visible", promptOK end if
end sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Element -> Set Diagram Element Status Color" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
' Script to change fill color of elements on a diagram based the value of the Status property. ' ' 2011-2015: Armstrong Process Group, Inc. info@aprocessgroup.com
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Color Constants !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Change Diagram Element Color
sub OnDiagramScript
dim ruleArray(2) dim colorArray(2)
ruleArray(0) = "element.Status = ""Approved""" ruleArray(1) = "element.Status = ""Proposed""" ruleArray(2) = "element.Status = ""Mandatory"""
colorArray(0) = colorLightSkyBlue colorArray(1) = colorPaleGreen colorArray(2) = colorLightCoral
ChangeDiagramElementColor ruleArray, colorArray
end sub
OnDiagramScript

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Element -> Set Diagram Object Tagged Value Color" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
' Script to change fill color of objects on a diagram based the value of a tagged value. ' ' 2011-2015: Armstrong Process Group, Inc. info@aprocessgroup.com
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Color Constants !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Change Diagram Element Color !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Create Diagram Legend
sub OnDiagramScript
dim taggedValueName dim ruleArray(5) dim labelArray(5) dim colorArray(5)
taggedValueName = "application_disposition"
ruleArray(0) = "taggedValue.Value = ""Retain""" ruleArray(1) = "taggedValue.Value = ""Replace""" ruleArray(2) = "taggedValue.Value = ""Re-engineer""" ruleArray(3) = "taggedValue.Value = ""Retire""" ruleArray(4) = "taggedValue.Value = ""Unknown""" ruleArray(5) = "taggedValue.Value = """""
labelArray(0) = "Retain" labelArray(1) = "Replace" labelArray(2) = "Re-engineer" labelArray(3) = "Retire" labelArray(4) = "Unknown" labelArray(5) = "No value"
colorArray(0) = colorLightSkyBlue colorArray(1) = colorPaleGreen colorArray(2) = colorLightCoral colorArray(3) = colorRed colorArray(4) = colorGreen colorArray(5) = colorWhite
ChangeDiagramObjectColor ruleArray, colorArray, taggedValueName
CreateDiagramLegend "Disposition", labelArray, colorArray
end sub
OnDiagramScript

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Create Diagram Legend" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script to create a legend based on an array of rules (conditions)
' Copyright (c) 2011-2015 Armstrong Process Group, Inc. All rights reserved. www.aprocessgroup.com
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
const LEGEND_SUBTYPE = 76 const LEGEND_ELEMENT_NAME = "Capability Legend"
sub CreateDiagramLegend(legendName, valueArray, colorArray)
dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram dim diagramPackageID dim diagramPackage as EA.Package dim legendElement as EA.Element dim legendGUID dim legendObject as EA.DiagramObject dim backgroundColor dim elementID dim element as EA.Element dim index dim value dim color dim legendXrefProperties dim sqlString
set currentDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram()
if not currentDiagram is nothing then
Repository.SaveDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
diagramPackageID = currentDiagram.PackageID
set diagramPackage = Repository.GetPackageByID(diagramPackageID)
set legendElement = diagramPackage.Elements.AddNew(LEGEND_ELEMENT_NAME, "Text")
legendElement.Subtype = LEGEND_SUBTYPE
legendElement.Update
legendGUID = legendElement.ElementGUID
set legendObject = currentDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew(LEGEND_ELEMENT_NAME, "")
legendObject.DiagramID = currentDiagram.DiagramID legendObject.ElementID = legendElement.ElementID
legendObject.left = 10 legendObject.top = -350 legendObject.right = legendObject.left + 100 legendObject.bottom = legendObject.top - 150
legendObject.Update
currentDiagram.Update
legendXrefProperties = ""
for index = 0 to UBound(valueArray)
value = valueArray(index) color = colorArray(index)
legendXrefProperties = legendXrefProperties & "@PROP=@NAME=" & value & "@ENDNAME;@TYPE=LEGEND_OBJECTSTYLE@ENDTYPE;" legendXrefProperties = legendXrefProperties & "@VALU=#Back_Ground_Color#=" & color & ";#Pen_Color#=0;#Pen_Size#=1;#Legend_Type#=LEGEND_OBJECTSTYLE;@ENDVALU;" legendXrefProperties = legendXrefProperties & "@PRMT=" & index & "@ENDPRMT;@ENDPROP;"
next
legendXrefProperties = legendXrefProperties & "@PROP=@NAME=" & legendName & "@ENDNAME;@TYPE=LEGEND_STYLE_SETTINGS@ENDTYPE;@VALU=#TITLE#=" & legendName & ";@ENDVALU;@PRMT=@ENDPRMT;@ENDPROP;"
sqlString = "INSERT INTO t_xref (`XrefID`, `Name`, `Type`, `Visibility`, `Partition`, `Description`, `Client`, `Supplier`) VALUES (" sqlString = sqlString & """" & GetNewGUID & """, " sqlString = sqlString & """CustomProperties"", " sqlString = sqlString & """element property"", " sqlString = sqlString & """Public"", " sqlString = sqlString & "0, " sqlString = sqlString & """" & legendXrefProperties & """, " sqlString = sqlString & """" & legendGUID & """, " sqlString = sqlString & """<none>"")"
Repository.CreateOutputTab "test" Repository.WriteOutput "test", sqlString, 0
Repository.Execute sqlString
Repository.ReloadDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
end if
end sub
function GetNewGUID() GetNewGUID = Left(CreateObject("Scriptlet.TypeLib").Guid,38) end function

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Show Package Connectors" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script Name: ShowPackageConnectors ' Author: Giu Platania ' Purpose: Display the number of connectors in the currently selected package in the EA Project Browser. ' Date: 2025-08-06 ' Version: 1.0
Option Explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
Sub ShowPackageConnectors()
' Show the script output window Session.Output("Show Window") Session.Output("=======================================") Repository.EnsureOutputVisible "Script"
Dim package As EA.Package Dim connectors As EA.Collection
Session.Output("Show Package Connectors") Session.Output("=======================================")
' Get the currently selected package in the Project Browser Set package = Repository.GetTreeSelectedPackage()
If package Is Nothing Then MsgBox "Please select a package in the Project Browser and try again." Exit Sub End If
Set connectors = package.Connectors
Session.Output("# of connectors: " & connectors.Count) Session.Output("Done!")
End Sub
ShowPackageConnectors

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Dump Diagrams To File" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script Name: DumpDiagramsToFileSystem ' Author: Giu Platania ' Purpose: Recursively create images of all diagrams in a selected package (and its sub-packages/elements) and save them to the filesystem. ' Date: 2025-08-06 ' Version: 1.0
Option Explicit
'--- Script to create images of all diagrams in a package and write them to the filing system. ---
Dim project As EA.Project Dim folderName Dim PACKAGE_OBJECT_TYPE Dim topLevelPackage As EA.Package Dim imageFileExt Dim packageLevel Dim filterDiagramType
PACKAGE_OBJECT_TYPE = 5 imageFileExt = "jpg" packageLevel = 0
' User modifiable variables. folderName = "C:\tmp\DiagramImages"
' Diagram type filter: set to "" for all types, or restrict by type ("Activity", "Component", etc.) filterDiagramType = "" 'filterDiagramType = "Activity" 'filterDiagramType = "Analysis" 'filterDiagramType = "Component" 'filterDiagramType = "Custom" 'filterDiagramType = "Deployment" 'filterDiagramType = "Logical" 'filterDiagramType = "Sequence" 'filterDiagramType = "Statechart" 'filterDiagramType = "Use Case"
' Entry point: expects a package to be selected in the Project Browser. Sub UpdatePackageClasses() Session.Output( "Dump Diagrams to Filing System v1.0" ) Session.Output( "===================================" )
Dim theElement As EA.Element
Set project = Repository.GetProjectInterface() Set theElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
If Not theElement Is Nothing And theElement.ObjectType = PACKAGE_OBJECT_TYPE Then Set topLevelPackage = theElement DumpPackage packageLevel, topLevelPackage Else MsgBox( "This script requires a package be selected in the Project Browser." & Chr(10) & _ "Please select a package in the Project Browser and try again." ) End If
Session.Output( "Done!" ) End Sub
' Recursively processes a package, its diagrams, and its children. Sub DumpPackage(packageLevel, thePackage) Dim currentPackage As EA.Package Dim childPackage As EA.Package
Set currentPackage = thePackage packageLevel = packageLevel + 1
' Dump diagrams in this package DumpDiagrams packageLevel, currentPackage, ""
' Dump elements (recursively handles elements that may also contain diagrams/elements) DumpElements packageLevel, currentPackage, ""
' Recurse into child packages For Each childPackage In currentPackage.Packages DumpPackage packageLevel, childPackage Next End Sub
' Exports all diagrams of a given object (package or element) to file. Sub DumpDiagrams(packageLevel, theObject, elementNameQualifier) Dim currentDiagram As EA.Diagram Dim diagramType Dim diagramDate Dim fileName
For Each currentDiagram In theObject.Diagrams diagramType = currentDiagram.Type
If filterDiagramType = "" Or (filterDiagramType <> "" And filterDiagramType = diagramType) Then diagramDate = GetDateLabel(currentDiagram.ModifiedDate)
fileName = topLevelPackage.Name If elementNameQualifier <> "" Then fileName = fileName & elementNameQualifier End If
fileName = fileName & "." & theObject.Name fileName = fileName & "." & currentDiagram.Name fileName = fileName & "." & diagramType fileName = fileName & "." & diagramDate fileName = fileName & "." & imageFileExt
fileName = ConvertIllegalChars(fileName) fileName = folderName & "\" & fileName
project.PutDiagramImageToFile currentDiagram.DiagramGUID, fileName, 1 Repository.CloseDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID End If
Session.Output(fileName) Next End Sub
' Recursively processes elements, dumping their diagrams and any child elements. Sub DumpElements(packageLevel, theObject, elementNameQualifier) Dim currentElement As EA.Element Dim prevQualifier
prevQualifier = elementNameQualifier elementNameQualifier = elementNameQualifier & "." & theObject.Name
For Each currentElement In theObject.Elements DumpDiagrams packageLevel, currentElement, elementNameQualifier DumpElements packageLevel, currentElement, elementNameQualifier Next
elementNameQualifier = prevQualifier End Sub
' Formats a date as YYYYMMDD for use in filenames. Function GetDateLabel(aDate) Dim yearPart Dim monthPart Dim dayPart
yearPart = DatePart("yyyy", aDate)
monthPart = DatePart("m", aDate) monthPart = String(2 - Len(monthPart), "0") & monthPart
dayPart = DatePart("d", aDate) dayPart = String(2 - Len(dayPart), "0") & dayPart
GetDateLabel = yearPart & monthPart & dayPart End Function
' Converts illegal filename characters to underscores. Function ConvertIllegalChars(fileName) fileName = Replace(fileName, " ", "_") fileName = Replace(fileName, "\", "_") fileName = Replace(fileName, "/", "_") fileName = Replace(fileName, ":", "_") fileName = Replace(fileName, "*", "_") ConvertIllegalChars = fileName End Function
' --- Script Execution --- UpdatePackageClasses

option explicit
dim ELEMENT_OBJECT_TYPE ELEMENT_OBJECT_TYPE = 4
' ' An example of working with attributes. ' ' NOTE: Requires an element to be selected in the Project Browser ' sub AttributeLifeCycleExample()
' Get the currently selected element in the tree to work on dim theElement as EA.Element set theElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
if not theElement is nothing and theElement.ObjectType = ELEMENT_OBJECT_TYPE then
Session.Output( "Update MetaType from Stereotype Utility v1.0" ) Session.Output( "============================================" ) Session.Output( "Working on element '" & theElement.Name & "' (Type=" & theElement.Type & _ ", ID=" & theElement.ElementID & ")" )
Session.Output( "MetaType = " & theElement.Metatype ) Session.Output( "Stereotype = " & theElement.Stereotype )
Session.Output( "Done!" )
else ' No item selected in the tree, or the item selected was not an element MsgBox( "This script requires an element be selected in the Project Browser." & chr(10) & _ "Please select an element in the Project Browser and try again." ) end if
end sub
AttributeLifeCycleExample

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Info- Show element details" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script Name: RecursiveModelDumpExample ' Author: Giu Platania ' Purpose: Recursively outputs the names and IDs of all packages and elements in the current EA repository model. ' Date: 2025-08-06 ' Version: 1.0
Option Explicit
' Entry point: starts the recursive dump of the model structure. Sub RecursiveModelDumpExample() Session.Output( "Show Package Info" ) Session.Output( "=======================================" )
' Iterate through all root models (top-level packages) in the project Dim currentModel As EA.Package For Each currentModel In Repository.Models ' Recursively process this package and its children DumpPackage "", currentModel Next
Session.Output( "Done!" ) End Sub
' Recursively dump a package and its children ' indent - String used for indentation for visual hierarchy ' thePackage - The EA.Package object to process Sub DumpPackage ( indent, thePackage ) Dim currentPackage As EA.Package Set currentPackage = thePackage
' Output package name and ID Session.Output( indent & currentPackage.Name & " (PackageID=" & currentPackage.PackageID & ")" )
' Output all elements within this package DumpElements indent & " ", currentPackage
' Recursively process child packages Dim childPackage As EA.Package For Each childPackage In currentPackage.Packages DumpPackage indent & " ", childPackage Next End Sub
' Output all elements of a package ' indent - String used for indentation for visual hierarchy ' thePackage - The EA.Package object whose elements are output Sub DumpElements ( indent, thePackage ) Dim currentPackage As EA.Package Set currentPackage = thePackage
Dim currentElement As EA.Element For Each currentElement In currentPackage.Elements Session.Output( indent & "::" & currentElement.Name & _ " (" & currentElement.Type & _ ", ID=" & currentElement.ElementID & ")" ) Next End Sub
' --- Script Execution --- RecursiveModelDumpExample

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Create Capability Hierarchy Diagram" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Set Current Diagram Objects Style
const HIERARCHY_TAB = "Capability Hierarchy Diagram"
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
' Get the type of element selected in the Project Browser dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
' Handling Code: Uncomment any types you wish this script to support ' NOTE: You can toggle comments on multiple lines that are currently ' selected with [CTRL]+[SHIFT]+[C]. select case treeSelectedType
'case otElement ' Code for when an element is selected ' dim theElement as EA.Element ' set theElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram theElement, "ValueStream"
case otPackage ' ' Code for when a package is selected dim thePackage as EA.Package set thePackage = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram thePackage, "Class" ' ' case otDiagram ' ' Code for when a diagram is selected ' dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram ' set theDiagram = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' case otAttribute ' ' Code for when an attribute is selected ' dim theAttribute as EA.Attribute ' set theAttribute = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' case otMethod ' ' Code for when a method is selected ' dim theMethod as EA.Method ' set theMethod = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
case else ' Error message Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK
end select
end sub
sub CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram( topElement, subElementMetaType)
dim subElement as EA.Element dim packageObject as EA.DiagramObject dim packageBoundary as EA.Element dim heatMapDiagram as EA.Diagram dim packageIndex dim packageTop dim packageVertOffset dim packageHorizOffset dim packageVertSpace dim packageHorizSpace dim packageWidth dim packageHeight dim packageElementColumnCount dim packageColumnIndex dim maxDiagramHeight dim relatedElementList dim anElement as EA.Element dim elementBoundary as EA.Element dim elementObject as EA.DiagramObject dim elementIndex dim elementVertOffset dim elementHorizOffset dim elementVertSpace dim elementWidth dim elementHeight dim elementColumnIndex dim elementHorizSpace dim elementsPerColumn dim elementTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue dim boundaryTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue
Repository.CreateOutputTab HIERARCHY_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible HIERARCHY_TAB
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Creating heat map diagram for Element '" & topElement.Name & "'...", 0
set heatMapDiagram = topElement.Diagrams.AddNew( "Heat Map", "Package")
heatMapDiagram.Update
SetDiagramStyle heatMapDiagram, "HideEStereo=1"
Repository.OpenDiagram(heatMapDiagram.DiagramID)
elementVertOffset = 20 elementHorizOffset = 10 elementVertSpace = 10 elementWidth = 75 elementHeight = 45 elementHorizSpace = 10
packageIndex = 0 packageColumnIndex = 0 packageHorizOffset = 10 packageHorizSpace = 10 packageVertOffset = 10 packageVertSpace = 10 packageElementColumnCount = 3 packageTop = -packageVertOffset maxDiagramHeight = 400
packageWidth = packageElementColumnCount * ( elementWidth + elementHorizSpace ) + elementHorizOffset
for each subElement in topElement.Elements Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Meta type is '" & subElement.MetaType, 0 if subElement.MetaType = subElementMetaType then
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Adding diagram object for Element '" & subElement.Name & "'...", 0
set packageBoundary = topElement.Elements.AddNew(subElement.Name, "Boundary")
packageBoundary.Update
set packageObject = heatMapDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew(subElement.Name,"")
set relatedElementList = GetElementRelatedElements(subElement, "Aggregation", "Class")
packageHeight = ( Int( ( relatedElementList.Count - 1 ) / packageElementColumnCount ) + 1 ) * ( elementHeight + elementVertSpace ) + elementVertOffset
packageObject.DiagramID = heatMapDiagram.DiagramID packageObject.ElementID = packageBoundary.ElementID
packageObject.left = packageHorizOffset + packageColumnIndex * ( packageWidth + packageHorizSpace) packageObject.top = packageTop packageObject.right = packageObject.left + packageWidth packageObject.bottom = packageObject.top - packageHeight
if packageObject.bottom < -maxDiagramHeight then
packageColumnIndex = packageColumnIndex + 1 packageTop = -packageVertOffset
packageObject.left = packageHorizOffset + packageColumnIndex * ( packageWidth + packageHorizSpace) packageObject.top = packageTop packageObject.right = packageObject.left + packageWidth packageObject.bottom = packageObject.top - packageHeight
end if
packageObject.Update
packageTop = packageTop - (packageHeight + packageVertSpace)
packageIndex = packageIndex + 1
elementIndex = 0
for each anElement in relatedElementList.Items
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "- Adding diagram object for Element '" & anElement.Name & "'...", 0
elementsPerColumn = Int(( packageHeight - elementVertOffset ) / ( elementHeight + elementVertSpace))
set elementBoundary = subElement.Elements.AddNew(anElement.name,"Boundary")
elementBoundary.Status = anElement.Status 'elementBoundary.Stereotype = anElement.Stereotype elementBoundary.Properties.Item("BorderStyle").Value = "Solid"
for each elementTaggedValue in anElement.TaggedValues
set boundaryTaggedValue = elementBoundary.TaggedValues.AddNew(elementTaggedValue.Name,"")
boundaryTaggedValue.Value = elementTaggedValue.Value
boundaryTaggedValue.Update
next
elementBoundary.Update
set elementObject = heatMapDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew(anElement.Alias,"")
elementColumnIndex = Int(elementIndex / elementsPerColumn)
elementObject.DiagramID = heatMapDiagram.DiagramID elementObject.ElementID = elementBoundary.ElementID
elementObject.left = packageObject.left + elementHorizOffset + elementColumnIndex * (elementWidth + elementHorizSpace) elementObject.top = packageObject.top - ((elementIndex - Int( elementIndex / elementsPerColumn ) * elementsPerColumn) * (elementHeight + elementVertSpace)) - elementVertOffset elementObject.right = elementObject.left + elementWidth elementObject.bottom = elementObject.top - elementHeight
elementObject.Update
elementIndex = elementIndex + 1
next
heatMapDiagram.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram(heatMapDiagram.DiagramID)
end if next
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Finished!", 0
end sub
function GetElementRelatedElements( element, connectorMetaType, relatedElementMetaType)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim relatedElementList dim relatedElementID dim relatedElement as EA.Element
set relatedElementList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, element.Name & " element.Connectors Count is " & element.Connectors.Count, 0
for each connector in element.Connectors
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector Type = " & connector.MetaType & " Metatype " & connectorMetaType, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector.MetaType = " & connector.MetaType, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, element.Name & " has Connectors of type " & connector.MetaType, 0 if connector.MetaType = connectorMetaType then
if connector.ClientID = element.ElementID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(relatedElementID)
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElementID = " & relatedElementID, 0 Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.Name = " & relatedElement.Name, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.MetaType = " & relatedElement.MetaType, 0
if relatedElement.MetaType = relatedElementMetaType then relatedElementList.Add relatedElement.ElementGUID, relatedElement end if
end if next
set GetElementRelatedElements = relatedElementList
end function
OnProjectBrowserScript
sub Test(elementGUID)
dim anElement as EA.Element set anElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid(elementGUID)
CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram anElement
end sub

' Script to change fill color of elements on a diagram based the value of the increments tagged value . ' ' 2011-2015: Armstrong Process Group, Inc. info@aprocessgroup.com
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC APG Diagram Script Utilities.Color Constants !INC APG Diagram Script Utilities.Change Diagram Object Color !INC APG Diagram Script Utilities.Create Diagram Legend
sub OnDiagramScript
dim taggedValueName dim valueArray(6) dim ruleArray(6) dim colorArray(6)
taggedValueName = "Category"
valueArray(0) = "Market/Sales" valueArray(1) = "Engaged Party" valueArray(2) = "Service" valueArray(3) = "Product" valueArray(4) = "Customer" valueArray(5) = "Resource" valueArray(6) = "Enterprise"
ruleArray(0) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(0) & """" ruleArray(1) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(1) & """" ruleArray(2) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(2) & """" ruleArray(3) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(3) & """" ruleArray(4) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(4) & """" ruleArray(5) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(5) & """" ruleArray(6) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(6) & """"
colorArray(0) = colorLightCoral colorArray(1) = colorBlue colorArray(2) = colorPaleGreen colorArray(3) = colorOrange colorArray(4) = colorGold colorArray(5) = colorLightSkyBlue colorArray(6) =colorLightGrey
ChangeDiagramObjectColor ruleArray, colorArray, colorWhite, taggedValueName
CreateDiagramLegend "Capability Type", valueArray, colorArray
end sub
OnDiagramScript

option explicit
' Copyright (c) 2011-2018 Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us ' Script Name: Apply Capability Maturity heatMap ' Author: SNNA ' Purpose: ' Script to change fill color of elements on a diagram based the taggedValueName Increments that defines values between 0 and 5. '(0) = "None" '(1) = "Initial" '(2) = "UnderDevelopment" '(3) = "Defined" '(4) = "Managed" '(5) = "Measured" '
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Color Constants !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Change Diagram Object Color !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Create Diagram Legend
sub OnDiagramScript
dim taggedValueName dim valueArray(5) dim ruleArray(5) dim colorArray(5)
taggedValueName = "Increments"
valueArray(0) = "None" valueArray(1) = "Initial" valueArray(2) = "UnderDevelopment" valueArray(3) = "Defined" valueArray(4) = "Managed" valueArray(5) = "Measured"
ruleArray(0) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(0) & """" ruleArray(1) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(1) & """" ruleArray(2) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(2) & """" ruleArray(3) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(3) & """" ruleArray(4) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(4) & """" ruleArray(5) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(5) & """"
colorArray(0) = colorLightGrey colorArray(1) = colorRed colorArray(2) = colorOrange colorArray(3) = colorGold colorArray(4) = colorPaleGreen colorArray(5) = colorGreen
ChangeDiagramObjectColor ruleArray, colorArray, colorWhite, taggedValueName
CreateDiagramLegend "Maturity Level", valueArray, colorArray
end sub
OnDiagramScript
