Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC APG Diagram Script Utilities.Set Current Diagram Objects Style
const HIERARCHY_TAB = "SNNA Application Hierarchy Diagram"
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
' Get the type of element selected in the Project Browser dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
' Handling Code: Uncomment any types you wish this script to support ' NOTE: You can toggle comments on multiple lines that are currently ' selected with [CTRL]+[SHIFT]+[C]. select case treeSelectedType
case otElement ' Code for when an element is selected dim theElement as EA.Element set theElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram theElement, "Aggregation", "Capability"
'case otPackage ' ' Code for when a package is selected ' dim thePackage as EA.Package ' set thePackage = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram thePackage ' ' case otDiagram ' ' Code for when a diagram is selected ' dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram ' set theDiagram = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' case otAttribute ' ' Code for when an attribute is selected ' dim theAttribute as EA.Attribute ' set theAttribute = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' case otMethod ' ' Code for when a method is selected ' dim theMethod as EA.Method ' set theMethod = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
case else ' Error message Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK
end select
end sub
sub CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram( topElement, connectorMetaType, relatedElementMetaType)
dim subElement as EA.Element dim packageObject as EA.DiagramObject dim packageBoundary as EA.Element dim heatMapDiagram as EA.Diagram dim packageIndex dim packageTop dim packageVertOffset dim packageHorizOffset dim packageVertSpace dim packageHorizSpace dim packageWidth dim packageHeight dim packageElementColumnCount dim packageColumnIndex dim maxDiagramHeight dim relatedElementList1 dim relatedElementList2 dim anElement as EA.Element dim elementBoundary as EA.Element dim elementObject as EA.DiagramObject dim elementIndex dim elementVertOffset dim elementHorizOffset dim elementVertSpace dim elementWidth dim elementHeight dim elementColumnIndex dim elementHorizSpace dim elementsPerColumn dim elementTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue dim boundaryTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue
Repository.CreateOutputTab HIERARCHY_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible HIERARCHY_TAB
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Creating heat map diagram for Element '" & topElement.Name & "'...", 0
set heatMapDiagram = topElement.Diagrams.AddNew( "Heat Map", "Package")
heatMapDiagram.Update
SetDiagramStyle heatMapDiagram, "HideEStereo=1"
Repository.OpenDiagram(heatMapDiagram.DiagramID)
elementVertOffset = 20 elementHorizOffset = 10 elementVertSpace = 10 elementWidth = 100 elementHeight = 45 elementHorizSpace = 10
packageIndex = 0 packageColumnIndex = 0 packageHorizOffset = 10 packageHorizSpace = 10 packageVertOffset = 10 packageVertSpace = 10 packageElementColumnCount = 2 packageTop = -packageVertOffset maxDiagramHeight = 400
packageWidth = packageElementColumnCount * ( elementWidth + elementHorizSpace ) + elementHorizOffset
set relatedElementList1 = GetElementRelatedElements(topElement, connectorMetaType, relatedElementMetaType)
for each subElement in relatedElementList1.Items
if subElement.MetaType = relatedElementMetaType then
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Adding diagram object for Element '" & subElement.Name & "'...", 0
set packageBoundary = topElement.Elements.AddNew(subElement.Name, "Boundary")
packageBoundary.Update
set packageObject = heatMapDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew(subElement.Name,"")
set relatedElementList2 = GetElementRelatedElements(subElement, "UsedBy", "ApplicationComponent")
packageHeight = ( Int( ( relatedElementList2.Count - 1 ) / packageElementColumnCount ) + 1 ) * ( elementHeight + elementVertSpace ) + elementVertOffset
packageObject.DiagramID = heatMapDiagram.DiagramID packageObject.ElementID = packageBoundary.ElementID
packageObject.left = packageHorizOffset + packageColumnIndex * ( packageWidth + packageHorizSpace) packageObject.top = packageTop packageObject.right = packageObject.left + packageWidth packageObject.bottom = packageObject.top - packageHeight
if packageObject.bottom < -maxDiagramHeight then
packageColumnIndex = packageColumnIndex + 1 packageTop = -packageVertOffset
packageObject.left = packageHorizOffset + packageColumnIndex * ( packageWidth + packageHorizSpace) packageObject.top = packageTop packageObject.right = packageObject.left + packageWidth packageObject.bottom = packageObject.top - packageHeight
end if
packageObject.Update
packageTop = packageTop - (packageHeight + packageVertSpace)
packageIndex = packageIndex + 1
elementIndex = 0
for each anElement in relatedElementList2.Items
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "- Adding diagram object for Element '" & anElement.Name & "'...", 0
elementsPerColumn = Int(( packageHeight - elementVertOffset ) / ( elementHeight + elementVertSpace))
set elementBoundary = subElement.Elements.AddNew(anElement.name,"Boundary")
elementBoundary.Status = anElement.Status 'elementBoundary.Stereotype = anElement.Stereotype elementBoundary.Properties.Item("BorderStyle").Value = "Solid"
for each elementTaggedValue in anElement.TaggedValues
set boundaryTaggedValue = elementBoundary.TaggedValues.AddNew(elementTaggedValue.Name,"")
boundaryTaggedValue.Value = elementTaggedValue.Value
boundaryTaggedValue.Update
next
elementBoundary.Update
set elementObject = heatMapDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew(anElement.Alias,"")
elementColumnIndex = Int(elementIndex / elementsPerColumn)
elementObject.DiagramID = heatMapDiagram.DiagramID elementObject.ElementID = elementBoundary.ElementID
elementObject.left = packageObject.left + elementHorizOffset + elementColumnIndex * (elementWidth + elementHorizSpace) elementObject.top = packageObject.top - ((elementIndex - Int( elementIndex / elementsPerColumn ) * elementsPerColumn) * (elementHeight + elementVertSpace)) - elementVertOffset elementObject.right = elementObject.left + elementWidth elementObject.bottom = elementObject.top - elementHeight
elementObject.Update
elementIndex = elementIndex + 1
next
heatMapDiagram.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram(heatMapDiagram.DiagramID)
end if
next
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Finished!", 0
end sub
function GetElementRelatedElements( element, connectorMetaType, relatedElementMetaType)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim relatedElementList dim relatedElementID dim relatedElement as EA.Element
set relatedElementList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, element.Name & " element.Connectors.Count = " & element.Connectors.Count, 0
for each connector in element.Connectors
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector.Type = " & connector.Type, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector.MetaType = " & connector.MetaType, 0
if connector.MetaType = connectorMetaType then
if connector.ClientID = element.ElementID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(relatedElementID)
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElementID = " & relatedElementID, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.Name = " & relatedElement.Name, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.MetaType = " & relatedElement.MetaType, 0
if relatedElement.MetaType = relatedElementMetaType then relatedElementList.Add relatedElement.ElementGUID, relatedElement end if
end if next
set GetElementRelatedElements = relatedElementList
end function
OnProjectBrowserScript
'Test "{BABC61E9-9E7A-4c7c-90C5-46D6614A3E1C}"
sub Test(elementGUID)
dim anElement as EA.Element
set anElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid(elementGUID)
CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram anElement
end sub

option explicit
' Script to change fill color of elements on a diagram based the value of the Status property. ' ' 2011-2015: Armstrong Process Group, Inc. info@aprocessgroup.com
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Color Constants !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Change Diagram Object Color !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Create Diagram Legend
sub OnDiagramScript
dim taggedValueName dim valueArray(2) dim ruleArray(2) dim colorArray(2)
taggedValueName = "Increments"
valueArray(0) = "High (7-10)" valueArray(1) = "Medium (4-6)" valueArray(2) = "Low (1-3)"
ruleArray(0) = "CDbl(taggedValue.Value) >= 7.0" ruleArray(1) = "CDbl(taggedValue.Value) < 7.0 And CDbl(taggedValue.Value) >= 4.0" ruleArray(2) = "CDbl(taggedValue.Value) < 4.0"
colorArray(0) = colorGreen colorArray(1) = colorGold colorArray(2) = colorRed
ChangeDiagramObjectColor ruleArray, colorArray, colorWhite, taggedValueName
CreateDiagramLegend "Ave Health Score", valueArray, colorArray
end sub
OnDiagramScript

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Aggregate Capability Application Data" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC APG Diagram Script Utilities.Set Current Diagram Objects Style
const HIERARCHY_TAB = "APG Aggregate Capability Data"
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
' Get the type of element selected in the Project Browser dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
' Handling Code: Uncomment any types you wish this script to support ' NOTE: You can toggle comments on multiple lines that are currently ' selected with [CTRL]+[SHIFT]+[C]. select case treeSelectedType
case otElement ' Code for when an element is selected dim theElement as EA.Element set theElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram theElement, "ValueStream"
'case otPackage ' ' Code for when a package is selected ' dim thePackage as EA.Package ' set thePackage = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram thePackage ' ' case otDiagram ' ' Code for when a diagram is selected ' dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram ' set theDiagram = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' case otAttribute ' ' Code for when an attribute is selected ' dim theAttribute as EA.Attribute ' set theAttribute = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' case otMethod ' ' Code for when a method is selected ' dim theMethod as EA.Method ' set theMethod = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
case else ' Error message Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK
end select
end sub
sub CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram( topElement, subElementMetaType)
dim subElement as EA.Element dim capAveHealthScore dim capAveRiskScore dim capTotalAnnualCost dim appHealthScore dim appRiskScore dim appTotalAnnualCost dim appCount dim relatedElementList1 dim relatedElementList2 dim anElement as EA.Element dim anApplComp as EA.Element dim elementTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue
Repository.CreateOutputTab HIERARCHY_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible HIERARCHY_TAB
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Aggregating capability application data for Element '" & topElement.Name & "'...", 0
for each subElement in topElement.Elements
if subElement.MetaType = subElementMetaType then
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "- ValueStream '" & subElement.Name & "'...", 0
set relatedElementList1 = GetElementRelatedElements(subElement, "Aggregation", "Capability")
for each anElement in relatedElementList1.Items
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, " - Capability '" & anElement.Name & "'...", 0
capAveHealthScore = 0 capAveRiskScore = 0 capTotalAnnualCost = 0 appCount = 0
set relatedElementList2 = GetElementRelatedElements(anElement, "UsedBy", "ApplicationComponent")
for each anApplComp in relatedElementList2.Items
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, " - Application '" & anApplComp.Name & "'...", 0
appHealthScore = CDbl(anApplComp.TaggedValues.GetByName("Health Score").Value) appRiskScore = CDbl(anApplComp.TaggedValues.GetByName("Risk Score").Value) appTotalAnnualCost = CDbl(anApplComp.TaggedValues.GetByName("Total Annual Cost").Value)
capAveHealthScore = capAveHealthScore + appHealthScore capAveRiskScore = capAveRiskScore + appRiskScore capTotalAnnualCost = capTotalAnnualCost + appTotalAnnualCost
appCount = appCount + 1
next
capAveHealthScore = capAveHealthScore / appCount capAveRiskScore = capAveRiskScore / appCount
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Ave Health Score") elementTaggedValue.Value = capAveHealthScore elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Ave Risk Score") elementTaggedValue.Value = capAveRiskScore elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Total Annual Cost") elementTaggedValue.Value = capTotalAnnualCost elementTaggedValue.Update
next
end if
next
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Finished!", 0
end sub
function GetElementRelatedElements( element, connectorMetaType, relatedElementMetaType)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim relatedElementList dim relatedElementID dim relatedElement as EA.Element
set relatedElementList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, element.Name & " element.Connectors.Count = " & element.Connectors.Count, 0
for each connector in element.Connectors
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector.Type = " & connector.Type, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector.MetaType = " & connector.MetaType, 0
if connector.MetaType = connectorMetaType then
if connector.ClientID = element.ElementID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(relatedElementID)
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElementID = " & relatedElementID, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.Name = " & relatedElement.Name, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.MetaType = " & relatedElement.MetaType, 0
if relatedElement.MetaType = relatedElementMetaType then relatedElementList.Add relatedElement.ElementGUID, relatedElement end if
end if next
set GetElementRelatedElements = relatedElementList
end function

CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram anElement

Column.name: Notes

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Set Current Diagram Objects Style
const HIERARCHY_TAB = "Aggregate Capability Data"
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
' Get the type of element selected in the Project Browser dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
' Handling Code: Uncomment any types you wish this script to support ' NOTE: You can toggle comments on multiple lines that are currently ' selected with [CTRL]+[SHIFT]+[C]. select case treeSelectedType
case otElement ' Code for when an element is selected dim theElement as EA.Element set theElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram theElement, "ValueStream"
'case otPackage ' ' Code for when a package is selected ' dim thePackage as EA.Package ' set thePackage = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram thePackage ' ' case otDiagram ' ' Code for when a diagram is selected ' dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram ' set theDiagram = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' case otAttribute ' ' Code for when an attribute is selected ' dim theAttribute as EA.Attribute ' set theAttribute = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' case otMethod ' ' Code for when a method is selected ' dim theMethod as EA.Method ' set theMethod = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
case else ' Error message Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK
end select
end sub
sub CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram( topElement, subElementMetaType)
dim subElement as EA.Element dim capAveHealthScore dim capAveRiskScore dim capTotalAnnualCost dim appHealthScore dim appRiskScore dim appTotalAnnualCost dim appCount dim relatedElementList1 dim relatedElementList2 dim anElement as EA.Element dim anApplComp as EA.Element dim elementTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue
Repository.CreateOutputTab HIERARCHY_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible HIERARCHY_TAB
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Resetting capability application data for Element '" & topElement.Name & "'...", 0
for each subElement in topElement.Elements
if subElement.MetaType = subElementMetaType then
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "- ValueStream '" & subElement.Name & "'...", 0
set relatedElementList1 = GetElementRelatedElements(subElement, "Aggregation", "Capability")
for each anElement in relatedElementList1.Items
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, " - Capability '" & anElement.Name & "'...", 0
capAveHealthScore = 0 capAveRiskScore = 0 capTotalAnnualCost = 0
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Ave Health Score") elementTaggedValue.Value = capAveHealthScore elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Ave Risk Score") elementTaggedValue.Value = capAveRiskScore elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Total Annual Cost") elementTaggedValue.Value = capTotalAnnualCost elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Category") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Type") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Investment Disposition") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Current Maturity Level") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Future Maturity Level") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Current Performance Level") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Future Performance Level") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
next
end if
next
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Finished!", 0
end sub
function GetElementRelatedElements( element, connectorMetaType, relatedElementMetaType)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim relatedElementList dim relatedElementID dim relatedElement as EA.Element
set relatedElementList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, element.Name & " element.Connectors.Count = " & element.Connectors.Count, 0
for each connector in element.Connectors
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector.Type = " & connector.Type, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector.MetaType = " & connector.MetaType, 0
if connector.MetaType = connectorMetaType then
if connector.ClientID = element.ElementID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(relatedElementID)
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElementID = " & relatedElementID, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.Name = " & relatedElement.Name, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.MetaType = " & relatedElement.MetaType, 0
if relatedElement.MetaType = relatedElementMetaType then relatedElementList.Add relatedElement.ElementGUID, relatedElement end if
end if next
set GetElementRelatedElements = relatedElementList
end function

set anElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid(elementGUID)
CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram anElement

valueArray(0) = "Ariel" valueArray(1) = "Alan" valueArray(2) = "Bernard" valueArray(3) = "Chuck" valueArray(4) = "Craig" valueArray(5) = "Eric"
ruleArray(0) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(0) & """" ruleArray(1) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(1) & """" ruleArray(2) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(2) & """" ruleArray(3) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(3) & """" ruleArray(4) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(4) & """" ruleArray(5) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(5) & """"

Column.value:
' Script to change fill color of objects on a diagram based on an array of rules (conditions) '
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Set Current Diagram Objects Style
sub ChangeDiagramobjectColorNoTaggedValues(ruleArray, colorArray, textColor)
dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim backgroundColor dim elementID dim element as EA.Element dim index dim rule dim updateStyle
set currentDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram() 'set currentDiagram = Repository.GetDiagramByID(6)
if not currentDiagram is nothing then
Repository.SaveDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
for each diagramObject in currentDiagram.DiagramObjects
elementID = diagramObject.ElementID
set element = Repository.GetElementByID( elementID) for index = 0 to UBound(ruleArray)
rule = ruleArray(index)
'Session.Prompt "outside " & element.Name & "complexity is" & element.Complexity & " value is " & rule, promptOK 'if element.Complexity = value then if eval( rule) then 'Session.Prompt "inside array " & element.Name & "color" & backgroundColor, promptOK 'Session.Prompt "inside array " & rule, promptOK backgroundColor = colorArray(index) updateStyle = "BCol=" & backgroundColor & ";BFol=" & textColor SetDiagramObjectStyle diagramObject, updateStyle diagramObject.Update
end if
next
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
else Session.Prompt "This script requires a diagram to be visible", promptOK end if
end sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Create Nested Hierarchy Diagram" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Copyright (c) 2011-2018 Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Set Diagram Styles !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Color Constants
const HIERARCHY_TAB = "SSNA Nested Hierarchy Diagram"
Const TOP_DOWN_FLOW_DIRECTION = 1 ' as Integer Const LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION = 2 ' as Integer
class HierarchyDiagram
public elementMetaType ' as String public objectHeight ' as Integer public objectWidth ' as Integer public horizOffset ' as Integer public horizSpace ' as Integer public vertOffset ' as Integer public vertSpace ' as Integer public seqIndex ' as Integer public levelList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) public childObjectList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyObject) public package ' as EA.Package public diagram ' as EA.Diagram
private sub Class_Initialize
seqIndex = 9999 set levelList = nothing set childObjectList = nothing set package = nothing set diagram = nothing
end sub
public sub createDiagram( diagramName, diagramType)
set diagram = package.Diagrams.AddNew( diagramName, diagramType)
diagram.Update
setDiagramStyle diagram, "HideEStereo=1"
end sub
public sub loadRootObjectList
dim rootObject ' as HierarchyObject
set childObjectList = createPackageHierarchyObjectList( Me, package, elementMetatype)
for each rootObject in childObjectList.Items
set rootObject.diagram = Me
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "--> Loading Root Element '" & rootObject.element.Name & "'...", 0
if levelList.Count > 1 then rootObject.LoadChildObjectList end if
next
end sub
public sub drawRootObjects
dim rootObject ' as HierarchyObject
drawObjectList Me, childObjectList, 1
for each rootObject in childObjectList.Items rootObject.drawChildObjects next
diagram.Update
end sub
public sub hideConnectors
dim link ' as EA.DiagramLink
for each link in diagram.DiagramLinks link.IsHidden = true link.Update next
diagram.DiagramLinks.Refresh
end sub
public sub addObject( anObject)
dim nextSeqIndex ' as Integer
set anObject.diagram = Me
set anObject.diagramObject = Me.diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew("", "")
anObject.diagramObject.ElementID = anObject.element.ElementID
nextSeqIndex = Me.SeqIndex - 1
anObject.diagramObject.sequence = nextSeqIndex
Me.seqIndex = nextSeqIndex
end sub
end Class
class HierarchyLevel
public levelNumber ' as Integer public numObjects ' as Integer = numRows when flowDirection = TOP_DOWN; = numColumns when flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT public flowDirection ' as Integer public objectStyle ' as ObjectStyle
private sub Class_Initialize
set objectStyle = new HierarchyObjectStyle
end sub
End Class
class HierarchyObjectStyle
public fillColor ' as RGB/Integer public lineWidth ' as Integer public lineColor ' as RGB/Integer public fontName ' as String public fontSize ' as Integer public fontColor ' as RGB/Integer public fontBold ' as Boolean public fontItalic ' as Boolean public fontUnderline ' as Boolean
End Class
class HierarchyObject
public levelNumber ' as Integer public row ' as Integer public column ' as Integer public parentObject ' as HierarchyObject public childObjectList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyObject) public diagram ' as HierarchyDiagram public element ' as EA.Element public diagramObject ' as EA.DiagramObject
private sub Class_Initialize
set parentObject = nothing set childObjectList = nothing set diagram = nothing set diagramObject = nothing
end sub
public sub loadChildObjectList
dim eaElement ' as EA.Element dim childObject ' as HierarchyObject
set childObjectList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
for each eaElement in element.Elements
if eaElement.MetaType = diagram.elementMetaType then
set childObject = New HierarchyObject
set childObject.element = eaElement set childObject.parentObject = Me set childObject.diagram = diagram childObject.levelNumber = levelNumber + 1
childObjectList.Add childObject.element.ElementGUID, childObject
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(childObject.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> Loading Child Element '" & childObject.element.Name & "'...", 0
if childObject.levelNumber = diagram.levelList.Count then set childObject.childObjectList = Nothing else childObject.loadChildObjectList end if
end if
next
end sub
public sub drawChildObjects
dim childObject ' as HierarchyObject
if not childObjectList is Nothing then
drawObjectList diagram, childObjectList, levelNumber + 1
for each childObject in childObjectList.Items childObject.drawChildObjects next
end if
end sub
public sub resize( childObject)
dim objectCurrRight ' as Integer dim objectCurrBottom ' as Integer dim objectNewRight ' as Integer dim objectNewBottom ' as Integer
objectCurrRight = diagramObject.right objectCurrBottom = diagramObject.bottom
objectNewRight = childObject.diagramObject.right + diagram.horizSpace objectNewBottom = childObject.diagramObject.bottom - diagram.vertSpace
if objectCurrRight <> objectNewRight or objectCurrBottom <> objectNewBottom then
if objectNewRight > objectCurrRight then diagramObject.right = objectNewRight end if
if objectNewBottom < objectCurrBottom then diagramObject.bottom = objectNewBottom end if
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "*** RESIZED object '" & element.name & "' to (" & diagramObject.left & "," & diagramObject.top & ") x ( " & diagramObject.right & "," & diagramObject.bottom & ")", 0
diagramObject.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
moveNeighborObjects
if Not parentObject is nothing then
if TypeName(parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" Then parentObject.resize Me end if
end if
end if
end sub
public sub moveNeighborObjects
dim rightObject ' as HierarchyObject dim rightObjectWidth ' as Integer dim rightObjectCurrLeft ' as Integer dim rightObjectNewLeft ' as Integer dim rightObjectMoved ' as Integer dim bottomObject ' as HierarchyObject dim bottomObjectHeight ' as Integer dim bottomObjectCurrTop ' as Integer dim bottomObjectNewTop ' as Integer dim bottomObjectMoved ' as Integer
set rightObject = getRightObject set bottomObject = getBottomObject
rightObjectMoved = false bottomObjectMoved = false
if rightObject is nothing then
if TypeName(parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then parentObject.resize Me end if
else
rightObjectWidth = rightObject.width
rightObjectCurrLeft = rightObject.diagramObject.left
rightObjectNewLeft = diagramObject.right + diagram.horizSpace
if rightObjectNewLeft <> rightObjectCurrLeft then
rightObject.diagramObject.left = rightObjectNewLeft rightObject.diagramObject.right = rightObjectNewLeft + rightObjectWidth
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "*** Moved RIGHT object '" & rightObject.element.name & "' to (" & rightObject.diagramObject.left & "," & rightObject.diagramObject.top & ") x ( " & rightObject.diagramObject.right & "," & rightObject.diagramObject.bottom & ")", 0
rightObject.diagramObject.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
rightObjectMoved = true
end if
end if
if bottomObject is nothing then
if TypeName(parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then parentObject.resize Me end if
else
bottomObjectHeight = bottomObject.Height
bottomObjectCurrTop = bottomObject.diagramObject.top
bottomObjectNewTop = diagramObject.bottom - diagram.vertSpace
if bottomObjectNewTop <> bottomObjectCurrTop then
bottomObject.diagramObject.top = bottomObjectNewTop bottomObject.diagramObject.bottom = bottomObjectNewTop - bottomObjectHeight
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "*** Moved BOTTOM object '" & bottomObject.element.name & "' to (" & bottomObject.diagramObject.left & "," & bottomObject.diagramObject.top & ") x ( " & bottomObject.diagramObject.right & "," & bottomObject.diagramObject.bottom & ")", 0
bottomObject.diagramObject.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
bottomObjectMoved = true
end if
end if
if rightObjectMoved then rightObject.moveNeighborObjects end if
if bottomObjectMoved then bottomObject.moveNeighborObjects end if
end sub
public property get height height = diagramObject.top - diagramObject.bottom end property
public property get width width = diagramObject.right - diagramObject.left end property
public function getRightObject set getRightObject = getGridObject(column + 1, row) end function
public function getBottomObject set getBottomObject = getGridObject(column, row + 1) end function
public function getGridObject( getColumn, getRow)
dim peerObject ' as HierarchyObject dim foundObject ' as HierarchyObject
set foundObject = nothing
for each peerObject in parentObject.childObjectList.Items
if peerObject.column = getColumn and peerObject.row = getRow then set foundObject = peerObject exit for end if
next
set getGridObject = foundObject
end function
public property let fillColor( value) if value <> vbNullString then SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "BCol=" & value end if end property
public property let lineWidth( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "LWth=" & value end property
public property let lineColor( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "LCol=" & value end property
public property let fontName( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "font=" & value end property
public property let fontSize( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "fontsz=" & value * 10 end property
public property let fontColor( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "BFol=" & value end property
public property let fontBold( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "bold=" & value end property
public property let fontItalic( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "italic=" & value end property
public property let fontUnderline( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "ul=" & value end property
End Class
public sub drawObjectList( diagram, objectList, levelNumber)
dim level ' as HierarchyLevel dim objectIndex ' as Integer dim coord1 ' as Integer dim coord2 ' as Integer dim object ' as HierarchyObject dim parentObjectLeft ' as Integer dim parentObjectTop ' as Integer
set level = diagram.levelList.Item(levelNumber)
objectIndex = 1
for each object in objectList.Items
diagram.addObject object
coord1 = Int( ( objectIndex - 1 ) / level.numObjects ) + 1 coord2 = objectIndex - ( coord1 - 1 ) * level.numObjects
if level.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION then object.row = coord1 object.column = coord2 else object.row = coord2 object.column = coord1 end if
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(object.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> Adding diagram object for Element '" & object.element.Name & "' #" & objectIndex & " ( " & object.column & ", " & object.row & " )", 0
if object.parentObject is nothing then parentObjectLeft = 0 parentObjectTop = 0 else
if TypeName(object.ParentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then parentObjectLeft = object.parentObject.diagramObject.left parentObjectTop = object.parentObject.diagramObject.top else parentObjectLeft = 0 parentObjectTop = 0 end if
end if
object.diagramObject.left = parentObjectLeft + ( object.column - 1 ) * ( diagram.objectWidth + diagram.horizSpace ) + diagram.horizOffset object.diagramObject.top = parentObjectTop - ( ( object.row - 1 ) * ( diagram.objectHeight + diagram.vertSpace ) + diagram.vertOffset ) object.diagramObject.right = object.diagramObject.left + diagram.objectWidth object.diagramObject.bottom = object.diagramObject.top - diagram.objectHeight
object.fillColor = level.objectStyle.fillColor object.lineWidth = level.objectStyle.lineWidth object.lineColor = level.objectStyle.lineColor object.fontName = level.objectStyle.fontName object.fontSize = level.objectStyle.fontSize object.fontColor = level.objectStyle.fontColor object.fontBold = level.objectStyle.fontBold object.fontItalic = level.objectStyle.fontItalic object.fontUnderline = level.objectStyle.fontUnderline
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(object.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> LeftTop: ( " & object.diagramObject.left & ", " & object.diagramObject.top & " ) RightBottom: ( " & object.diagramObject.right & ", " & object.diagramObject.bottom & " )", 0
object.diagramObject.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram(object.diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
if Not object.parentObject is Nothing then
if TypeName(object.parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then object.parentObject.resize object end if
end if
objectIndex = objectIndex + 1
next
end sub
sub createNestedHierarchyDiagram( package, elementMetaType, levelList)
dim diagram ' as HierarchyDiagram
Repository.CreateOutputTab HIERARCHY_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible HIERARCHY_TAB
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Creating nested hierarchy diagram for Element '" & package.Name & "'...", 0
set diagram = New HierarchyDiagram
diagram.elementMetaType = elementMetatype diagram.horizOffset = 10 diagram.horizSpace = 10 diagram.vertOffset = 50 diagram.vertSpace = 10 diagram.objectHeight = 50 diagram.objectWidth = 150 set diagram.package = package
diagram.createDiagram elementMetaType & " Nested Hierarchy", "Package"
Repository.OpenDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
set diagram.levelList = levelList
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "diagram.levelList.Count = " & diagram.levelList.count, 0
diagram.loadRootObjectList
diagram.drawRootObjects
diagram.hideConnectors
Repository.SaveDiagram(diagram.diagram.diagramID)
Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Finished!", 0
end sub
function createPackageHierarchyObjectList( diagram, package, elementMetaType)
dim objectList dim eaElement as EA.Element dim object
set objectList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
for each eaElement in package.Elements
if eaElement.MetaType = elementMetaType then
set object = New HierarchyObject
set object.Element = eaElement set object.ParentObject = diagram object.levelNumber = 1
objectList.Add object.element.ElementGUID, object
end if
next
set createPackageHierarchyObjectList = objectList
end function

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Set Diagram Styles" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Scripts to update styles diagram objects. ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2018 Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us
const STYLE_DELIMITER = ";" const STYLE_ASSIGNMENT = "="
sub SetCurrentDiagramObjectsStyle(elementMetaType, updateStyleList)
dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram
set theDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram
theDiagram.Update
SetDiagramObjectsStyle theDiagram, elementMetaType, updateStyleList
theDiagram.Update
end sub
sub SetDiagramObjectsStyle( theDiagram, elementMetaType, updateStyleList)
dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim diagramElement as EA.Element dim elementID dim updateStyleArray dim updateStyle
updateStyleArray = Split(updateStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
for each diagramObject in theDiagram.DiagramObjects
elementID = diagramObject.ElementID
set diagramElement = Repository.GetElementByID(elementID)
if diagramElement.metaType = elementMetaType then
for each updateStyle in updateStyleArray SetDiagramObjectStyle diagramObject, updateStyle next
diagramObject.Update
end if
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram theDiagram.DiagramID
end sub
sub SetDiagramObjectStyle( diagramObject, updateStyle)
dim updateStylePartArray dim updateStyleName dim lineStyleList dim lineStyleArray dim lineStyleIndex dim lineStyle dim styleFound
updateStylePartArray = Split(updateStyle, STYLE_ASSIGNMENT)
updateStyleName = updateStylePartArray(0)
lineStyleList = diagramObject.Style
lineStyleArray = Split(lineStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
lineStyleIndex = 0 styleFound = false
for each lineStyle in lineStyleArray
if InStr( lineStyle, updateStyleName & STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) then
lineStyle = updateStyle
lineStyleArray(lineStyleIndex) = lineStyle
styleFound = true
end if
lineStyleIndex = lineStyleIndex + 1
next
lineStyleList = Join(lineStyleArray, STYLE_DELIMITER)
if not( styleFound) then lineStyleList = lineStyleList & updateStyle & STYLE_DELIMITER end if
diagramObject.Style = lineStyleList
end sub
sub SetDiagramStyle( diagram, updateStyle)
dim updateStylePartArray dim updateStyleName dim lineStyleList dim lineStyleArray dim lineStyleIndex dim lineStyle dim styleFound
updateStylePartArray = Split(updateStyle, STYLE_ASSIGNMENT)
updateStyleName = updateStylePartArray(0)
lineStyleList = diagram.ExtendedStyle
lineStyleArray = Split(lineStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
lineStyleIndex = 0 styleFound = false
for each lineStyle in lineStyleArray
if InStr( lineStyle, updateStyleName & STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) then
lineStyle = updateStyle
lineStyleArray(lineStyleIndex) = lineStyle
styleFound = true
end if
lineStyleIndex = lineStyleIndex + 1
next
lineStyleList = Join(lineStyleArray, STYLE_DELIMITER)
if not( styleFound) then lineStyleList = lineStyleList & updateStyle & STYLE_DELIMITER end if
diagram.ExtendedStyle = lineStyleList
end sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Report External Package Dependencies (Details)" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
dim m_packageHierarchyList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim m_extPackageConnList 'as Scripting.Dictionary
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
dim treeSelectedType dim package as EA.Package
treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
select case treeSelectedType
case otPackage
set package = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
startReportExternalPackageDependencies package
case else Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK end select
end sub
sub startReportExternalPackageDependencies( package)
dim packageHierarchyList ' as Scripting.Dictionary
set m_packageHierarchyList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary") set m_extPackageConnList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary")
Session.Output "Report External Package Dependencies (Details)"
Session.Output "- Building package hierarchy list..." buildPackageHierarchyList package
checkPackage package
end sub
sub checkPackage( package)
dim element as EA.Element dim childPackage as EA.Package
Session.Output "- Checking package " & package.Name
checkElement package.Element
for each element in package.Elements checkElement element next
for each childPackage in package.Packages checkPackage childPackage next
reportConnectors package
end sub
sub reportConnectors( package)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim sourceElement as EA.Element dim targetElement as EA.Element dim sourcePackageID 'as Integer dim targetPackageID 'as Integer dim connDirection 'as String dim relatedElement as EA.Element dim connElementList 'as EA.Connector() dim sourcePackage as EA.Package dim targetPackage as EA.Package
Session.output vbCRLF
if m_extPackageConnList.Count = 0 then Session.Output "'" & package.Name & "': There are no external package dependencies for any elements." else
Session.Output "'" & package.Name & "' External Package Dependencies"
connElementList = m_extPackageConnList.Items
for each connector in connElementList
set sourceElement = Repository.GetElementByID( connector.ClientID) set targetElement = Repository.GetElementByID( connector.SupplierID)
sourcePackageID = sourceElement.PackageID targetPackageID = targetElement.PackageID
if m_packageHierarchyList.Exists( sourcePackageID) = false then connDirection = "<- FROM" else connDirection = "TO ->" end if
set sourcePackage = Repository.GetPackageByID( sourcePackageID) set targetPackage = Repository.GetPackageByID( targetPackageID)
Session.Output "- " & sourcePackage.Element.FQName & ":" & sourceElement.Name & " " & connDirection & " " & targetPackage.Name & ":" & targetElement.Name
next
end if
end sub
sub checkElement( element)
dim childElement as EA.Element dim connector as EA.Connector
for each connector in element.Connectors checkConnector element, connector next
for each childElement in element.Elements checkElement childElement next
end sub
sub checkConnector( element, connector)
dim relatedElementID 'as Integer dim relatedElement as EA.Element dim relatedPackageID 'as Integer
if element.ElementID = connector.ClientID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID( relatedElementID)
relatedPackageID = relatedElement.PackageID
if m_packageHierarchyList.Exists( relatedPackageID) = false then m_extPackageConnList.Add connector.ConnectorID, connector end if
end sub
sub buildPackageHierarchyList( package)
dim childPackage as EA.Package
m_packageHierarchyList.Add package.PackageID, package
for each childPackage in package.Packages buildPackageHierarchyList childPackage next
end sub
OnProjectBrowserScript

startReportExternalPackageDependencies package
end sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Diagram -> Create Roadmap Diagram" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Roadmap Diagram Generator option explicit
' Include EA constants and utilities !INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Create Nested Hierarchy Diagram !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Color Constants
' Entry point: invoked on selected package Sub OnProjectBrowserScript() Dim itemType Dim rootPkg As EA.Package Dim levelList ' Dictionary of HierarchyLevel Dim childPkg As EA.Package Dim elm As EA.Element
itemType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType() If itemType <> otPackage Then Session.Prompt "Please select a package to generate the roadmap.", promptOK Exit Sub End If
' Get the selected package Set rootPkg = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() Session.Output "Generating roadmap for package: " & rootPkg.Name
' Prepare the hierarchy levels Set levelList = getDiagramLevelList()
' Create one diagram under the root package createNestedHierarchyDiagram rootPkg, levelList, "RoadmapDiagram", False
Session.Output "Roadmap diagram created." End Sub
' Define the hierarchy levels: Roadmap Phase Milestone Function getDiagramLevelList() Dim levels Dim lvl1, lvl2, lvl3
Set levels = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
' Level 1: Roadmap container Set lvl1 = New HierarchyLevel lvl1.numObjects = 1 lvl1.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION lvl1.elementMetatype = "Program" ' expects sub-package with stereotype 'Roadmap' lvl1.horizOffset = 20 lvl1.horizSpace = 20 lvl1.vertOffset = 20 lvl1.vertSpace = 20 lvl1.objectWidth = 400 lvl1.objectHeight = 100 lvl1.objectStyle.fillColor = colorWhite lvl1.objectStyle.fontSize = 16 lvl1.objectStyle.fontName = "Calibri" lvl1.objectStyle.fontBold = "1" levels.Add 1, lvl1
' Level 2: Phases Set lvl2 = New HierarchyLevel lvl2.numObjects = 4 ' e.g. Q1-Q4 lvl2.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION lvl2.elementMetatype = "Growth Package" ' expects sub-package with stereotype 'Phase' lvl2.horizOffset = 10 lvl2.horizSpace = 10 lvl2.vertOffset = 120 lvl2.vertSpace = 10 lvl2.objectWidth = 180 lvl2.objectHeight = 60 lvl2.objectStyle.fillColor = colorLightSkyBlue lvl2.objectStyle.fontSize = 12 lvl2.objectStyle.fontBold = "1" levels.Add 2, lvl2
' Level 3: Milestones Set lvl3 = New HierarchyLevel lvl3.numObjects = 6 lvl3.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION lvl3.elementMetatype = "Initiative" ' expects elements with stereotype 'Milestone' lvl3.horizOffset = 10 lvl3.horizSpace = 10 lvl3.vertOffset = 200 lvl3.vertSpace = 10 lvl3.objectWidth = 120 lvl3.objectHeight = 40 lvl3.objectStyle.fillColor = colorDeepSkyBlue lvl3.objectStyle.fontSize = 10 lvl3.objectStyle.fontColor = colorWhite lvl3.objectStyle.fontBold = "1" levels.Add 3, lvl3
Set getDiagramLevelList = levels End Function
OnProjectBrowserScript()

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Report External Package Dependencies (Summary)" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Set Current Diagram Objects Style
dim m_packageHierarchyList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim m_extPackageList 'as Scripting.Dictionary
const PACKAGE_WIDTH = 130 const PACKAGE_HEIGHT = 80 const PACKAGE_OFFSET = 20 const PACKAGE_HORIZ_SPACING = 20 const PACKAGE_VERT_SPACING = 150
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
dim treeSelectedType dim package as EA.Package
treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
select case treeSelectedType
case otPackage
set package = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
startReportExternalPackageDependencies package
case else Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK end select
end sub
sub startReportExternalPackageDependencies( package)
dim packageHierarchyList ' as Scripting.Dictionary
set m_packageHierarchyList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary") set m_extPackageList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary")
Session.Output "Report External Package Dependencies (Summary)"
Session.Output "- Building package hierarchy list..."
buildPackageHierarchyList package
deletePackageDependencies package
checkPackage package
reportPackages package
end sub
sub checkPackage( package)
dim element as EA.Element dim childPackage as EA.Package
Session.Output "- Checking package " & package.Name
checkElement package.Element
for each element in package.Elements checkElement element next
for each childPackage in package.Packages checkPackage childPackage next
end sub
sub reportPackages( package)
dim packageDiagram as EA.Diagram dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim dependConn as EA.Connector dim packageList 'as List( Of EA.Package) dim packageIndex 'as Integer dim packageKeyList 'as Object() dim packageKey 'as String dim extPackage as EA.Package dim connDirection 'as String dim extPackageElement as EA.Element dim fqName 'as String dim prevPackageRight 'as Integer
Session.output vbCRLF
if m_extPackageList.Count = 0 then Session.Output "'" & package.Name & "': There are no external package dependencies for any elements." else
Session.Output "'" & package.Name & "' External Package Dependencies"
set packageDiagram = package.Diagrams.AddNew("Package Dependencies", "Package")
packageDiagram.ShowPackageContents = false packageDiagram.StyleEx = UpdateStyleList( packageDiagram.StyleEx, "ShowFQN=1") packageDiagram.Update
set diagramObject = packageDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "", "")
diagramObject.ElementID = package.Element.ElementID diagramObject.left = PACKAGE_OFFSET diagramObject.top = - PACKAGE_OFFSET diagramObject.right = diagramObject.left + PACKAGE_WIDTH diagramObject.bottom = diagramObject.top - PACKAGE_HEIGHT
diagramObject.Update
prevPackageRight = 0
packageKeyList = m_extPackageList.Keys
for packageIndex = 0 to m_extPackageList.Count - 1
packageKey = packageKeyList( packageIndex)
set extPackage = m_extPackageList.Item( packageKey) set extPackageElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid( extPackage.PackageGUID)
connDirection = Mid( packageKey, InStr( packageKey, ":") + 1)
fqName = Repository.GetFormattedName( extPackage.PackageGUID, &H01 or &H02 or &H04 or &H08 or &H10 or &H20 or &H40 or &H80 , "::", 0)
Session.Output "- " & connDirection & " '" & extPackage.Name & "' (" & fqName & ")"
set dependConn = package.Element.Connectors.AddNew( "", "Package")
if connDirection = "TO" then dependConn.ClientID = package.Element.ElementID dependConn.SupplierID = extPackageElement.ElementID else dependConn.ClientID = extPackageElement.ElementID dependConn.SupplierID = package.Element.ElementID end if
dependConn.Stereotype = "import"
dependConn.Update
set diagramObject = packageDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "", "")
diagramObject.ElementID = extPackageElement.ElementID diagramObject.left = prevPackageRight + PACKAGE_OFFSET + PACKAGE_HORIZ_SPACING diagramObject.top = - PACKAGE_OFFSET - PACKAGE_HEIGHT - PACKAGE_VERT_SPACING diagramObject.right = diagramObject.left + PACKAGE_WIDTH diagramObject.bottom = diagramObject.top - PACKAGE_HEIGHT
diagramObject.Update packageDiagram.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram packageDiagram.DiagramID
prevPackageRight = diagramObject.right
next
Repository.SaveDiagram packageDiagram.DiagramID
end if
end sub
sub deletePackageDependencies( package)
dim conn as EA.Connector dim connIndex 'as Integer
for connIndex = package.Connectors.Count - 1 to 0 step -1
set conn = package.Connectors.GetAt( connIndex)
if conn.Type = "Package" and conn.Stereotype = "import" then package.Connectors.Delete( connIndex) end if
next
package.Update
end sub
sub checkElement( element)
dim childElement as EA.Element dim connector as EA.Connector
Session.Output " + " & element.Name
for each connector in element.Connectors checkConnector element, connector next
for each childElement in element.Elements checkElement childElement next
end sub
sub checkConnector( element, connector)
dim relatedElementID 'as Integer dim relatedElement as EA.Element dim relatedPackageID 'as Integer dim relatedPackage as EA.Package dim connDirection 'as String dim packageKey 'as String
if element.ElementID = connector.ClientID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID connDirection = "TO" else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID connDirection = "FROM" end if
Session.Output " -> " & connector.ConnectorGUID & " " & connDirection & " " & relatedElementID
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID( relatedElementID)
relatedPackageID = relatedElement.PackageID
if m_packageHierarchyList.Exists( relatedPackageID) = false then
packageKey = CStr(relatedPackageID) & ":" & connDirection
if m_extPackageList.Exists( packageKey) = false then
set relatedPackage = Repository.GetPackageByID( relatedPackageID)
m_extPackageList.Add packageKey, relatedPackage
end if
end if
end sub
sub buildPackageHierarchyList( package)
dim childPackage as EA.Package
m_packageHierarchyList.Add package.PackageID, package
for each childPackage in package.Packages buildPackageHierarchyList childPackage next
end sub
OnProjectBrowserScript

dim packageGUID 'as String dim package as EA.Package
packageGUID = "{43574089-F19F-43cd-AA71-9DC435BFCB6B}"
set package = Repository.GetPackageByGuid( packageGUID)
startReportExternalPackageDependencies package
end sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="TAM -> Create Application Map" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
' Copyright (c) 2019 Sparx Services North America. www.sparxsystems.us
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Report Scripts.Report Script Library !INC SSNA Diagram Script Utilities.Color Constants !INC SSNA Diagram Script Utilities.Set Current Diagram Objects Style !INC SSNA Diagram Script Utilities.Clone Routines
dim m_sqlStringTemplate 'as String dim m_countryCode 'as String
const APP_PACKAGE_ID = 5182 const SCALING_FACTOR = 2
const SOLID_FILL_BORDER_STYLE = 0 const SOLID_NOFILL_BORDER_STYLE = 3 const LINE_HEIGHT = 13 ' 8pt font = 13 pixels tall const TEXT_BOX_MARGIN = 5 ' 8pt font = 5 pixels top & bottom const PIXELS_PER_CHAR = 5 ' 8pt font = 5 pixels wide
sub createTAMApplicationMap( packageGUID, templateDiagramGUID, sqlElementGUID, diagramSuffix)
dim templateDiagram as EA.Diagram dim newDiagram as EA.Diagram dim package as EA.Package dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim elementID 'as Integer dim element as EA.Element dim customStyleList 'as String
m_sqlStringTemplate = GetMappedApplicationsSQLString( sqlElementGUID) set templateDiagram = Repository.GetDiagramByGuid( templateDiagramGUID) set package = Repository.GetPackageByGUID( packageGUID)
Session.Output "Copying template diagram..."
set newDiagram = CopyElementDiagram( templateDiagram, package)
newDiagram.Name = newDiagram.Name & " " & diagramSuffix
Session.Output "Scaling diagram..."
ScaleDiagram newDiagram, SCALING_FACTOR
Session.Output "Add Applications to TAM Diagram '" & newDiagram.name & "'"
for each diagramObject in newDiagram.DiagramObjects
elementID = diagramObject.ElementID set element = Repository.GetElementByID( elementID) Session.Output "Processing diagram element '" & element.Name & "' " & element.Stereotype customStyleList = "SSJ=12:" ' Name - Top Center
setDiagramObjectCustomStyle newDiagram, diagramObject, customStyleList
if element.Stereotype = "TMF_Application" then updateDiagramObject package, newDiagram, diagramObject, element end if
next
newDiagram.StyleEx = UpdateStyleList( newDiagram.StyleEx, "DSO=1") newDiagram.ExtendedStyle = UpdateStyleList( newDiagram.ExtendedStyle, "HideEStereo=1") newDiagram.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram newDiagram.DiagramID
Session.Output "Finished!"
end sub
sub updateDiagramObject( package, diagram, diagramObject, element)
dim boundaryElement as EA.Element dim boundaryObject as EA.DiagramObject dim boundaryStyleList 'as String dim completeAppList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim appNameList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim appNameKeys 'as String() dim appArray 'as Object() dim application as EA.Element dim appCount 'as Integer dim appName 'as String dim appNameText 'as String dim textMaxLines 'as Integer dim columnCount 'as Integer dim columnWidth 'as Integer dim columnIndex 'as Integer dim appIndex 'as Integer dim textObject as EA.DiagramObject dim textElement as EA.Element dim objIndex 'as Integer dim topOffset 'as Integer dim boundaryHeight 'as Integer dim textHeight 'as Integer dim maxTextLength 'as Integer
Session.Output "'" & element.Name & "' TAM Application"
objIndex = -1
set boundaryElement = package.Elements.AddNew( "", "Boundary")
boundaryElement.Update
setElementBorderStyle boundaryElement, SOLID_FILL_BORDER_STYLE
set boundaryObject = diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "", "")
boundaryObject.ElementID = boundaryElement.ElementID boundaryObject.top = diagramObject.top - 20 boundaryObject.bottom = diagramObject.bottom + 5 boundaryObject.left = diagramObject.left + 5 boundaryObject.right = diagramObject.right - 5 boundaryObject.Sequence = objIndex
boundaryStyleList = "BCol=" & colorWhite & ";LCol=" & colorWhite
SetDiagramObjectStyleList boundaryObject, boundaryStyleList
boundaryObject.Update
objIndex = objIndex - 1
set appNameList = getMappedAppNameList( element)
appCount = appNameList.Count
if appCount > 0 then
boundaryHeight = boundaryObject.top - boundaryObject.bottom
textMaxLines = Int( ( boundaryHeight - TEXT_BOX_MARGIN ) / LINE_HEIGHT)
if textMaxLines = 0 then textMaxLines = 1 end if
textHeight = textMaxLines * LINE_HEIGHT + TEXT_BOX_MARGIN * 2
if boundaryHeight <> textHeight then topOffset = ( textHeight - boundaryHeight ) / 2 else topOffset = 0 end if
columnCount = Int( ( ( appCount - 1 ) / textMaxLines) + 1 )
Session.Output element.Name & ": appCount = " & appCount & ", textMaxLines = " & textMaxLines & ", columnCount = " & columnCount
columnWidth = Int( ( boundaryObject.right - boundaryObject.left ) / columnCount)
maxTextLength = Int( columnWidth / PIXELS_PER_CHAR)
appIndex = 0
for columnIndex = 1 to columnCount
set textElement = package.Elements.AddNew( "", "Text")
textElement.Update
set textObject = diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "", "")
textObject.ElementID = textElement.ElementID textObject.top = boundaryObject.top + topOffset textObject.bottom = boundaryObject.bottom textObject.left = boundaryObject.left + ( columnIndex - 1) * columnWidth textObject.right = textObject.left + columnWidth textObject.Sequence = objIndex
textObject.Update
appNameText = ""
do
appNameKeys = appNameList.Keys()
appName = appNameKeys( appIndex)
Session.Output "- Application '" & appName & "'..."
if ( len( appName) * PIXELS_PER_CHAR ) > columnWidth then appName = Left( appName, maxTextLength - 1) & "..." end if
if appNameText = vbNullString then appNameText = appName else appNameText = appNameText & vbCRLF & appName end if
appIndex = appIndex + 1
loop until ( ( appIndex mod textMaxLines) = 0) or appIndex = appCount
textElement.Notes = appNameText
textElement.Update
objIndex = objIndex - 1
next
end if
end sub
function getMappedAppNameList( tamApp)
dim sqlString 'as String dim elementList_XML 'ss String dim elementList_XMLDoc 'as Xml.XmlDocument dim element_XMLNodeList 'as Xml.XmlNodeList dim element_XMLNode 'as Xml.XmlNode dim appNameList 'as SortedList dim childNodeList 'as Xml.XmlNodeList dim appName 'as String dim appGUID 'as String
sqlString = Replace( m_sqlStringTemplate, "%TAM_APP_GUID%", tamApp.ElementGUID) sqlString = Replace( sqlString, "%COUNTRY_CODE%", m_countryCode)
elementList_XML = Repository.SQLQuery(sqlString)
set elementList_XMLDoc = CreateObject("Microsoft.XMLDOM")
elementList_XMLDoc.LoadXml(elementList_XML)
set element_XMLNodeList = elementList_XMLDoc.SelectNodes("/EADATA/Dataset_0/Data/Row")
set appNameList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary")
for each element_XMLNode in element_XMLNodeList
set childNodeList = element_XMLNode.ChildNodes
appName = childNodeList.Item(2).Text appGUID = childNodeList.Item(3).Text
appNameList.Add appName, appGUID
next
set getMappedAppNameList = appNameList
end function
function getMappedApplicationsSQLString( sqlElementGUID)
dim sqlElement as EA.Element dim sqlString 'as String
set sqlElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid( sqlElementGUID)
sqlString = sqlElement.Notes
getMappedApplicationsSQLString = sqlString
end function
'DEPRECATED function getMappedApplicationListEA( element, parentAppList)
dim appList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim appIndex 'as Integer dim appName 'as String dim childElement as EA.Element dim childAppList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim childAppIndex 'as Integer dim childAppName 'as String
set appList = getSortedRelatedElementList( element, "Association", "ArchiMate_Assignment", "Component", "ArchiMate_ApplicationComponent", APP_PACKAGE_ID)
for appIndex = 0 to appList.Count - 1
appName = appList.GetKey( appIndex)
if not parentAppList.ContainsKey( appName) then parentAppList.Add appName, appList( appName) end if
next
for each childElement in element.Elements
set childAppList = getMappedApplicationList( childElement, parentAppList)
for childAppIndex = 0 to childAppList.Count - 1
childAppName = childAppList.GetKey( childAppIndex)
if not appList.ContainsKey( childAppName) then appList.Add childAppName, childAppList( childAppName) end if
next
next
set getMappedApplicationList = appList
end function
sub setElementBorderStyle( boundaryElement, borderStyle)
setElementColumnValue boundaryElement, "BorderStyle", borderStyle
end sub
sub setElementColumnValue( element, columnName, columnValue)
dim sqlString 'As String
sqlString = "UPDATE t_object SET " & columnName & "='" & columnValue & "' WHERE Object_ID = " & element.ElementID
Repository.Execute( sqlString)
element.Refresh
end sub
sub scaleDiagram( diagram, scalingFactor)
dim diagObj as EA.DiagramObject
for each diagObj in diagram.DiagramObjects
diagObj.left = diagObj.left * SCALING_FACTOR diagObj.right = diagObj.right * SCALING_FACTOR diagObj.top = diagObj.top * SCALING_FACTOR diagObj.bottom = diagObj.bottom * SCALING_FACTOR
diagObj.Update
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram diagram.DiagramID
end sub
sub test
dim packageGUID 'as String dim templateDiagramGUID 'as String dim sqlElementGUID 'as String dim diagramSuffix 'as String
'' the package where the template is '' packageGUID = "{2159C734-5A2D-4d09-B713-A9493477BA27}" packageGUID = "{C7056F32-D521-41ff-A840-87929410BABF}" 'templateDiagramGUID = "{1FDC0199-9232-45d1-B20D-99F45CFC476F}" 'Test 'templateDiagramGUID = "{38A899FD-9E1F-40a8-BD2C-FB5E3577A591}" '#1 'templateDiagramGUID = "{500B865F-2DED-44b8-8D28-842D3219B33C}" '#2 templateDiagramGUID = "{18621EBC-596C-49c3-95A8-39C867FE54B8}" '#3 'sqlElementGUID = "{61DE3C47-717B-4e5e-84FC-6D80726492DA}" 'Across Countries 'sqlElementGUID = "{24DA0A36-C111-447f-8B25-08CBA6A91E82}" 'By Country By App 'sqlElementGUID = "{A1A7AA62-A3EC-41bc-81FE-CAE8EACA3018}" 'By App By Country 'sqlElementGUID = "{5F287123-C51A-4f93-A609-D1524A832731}" 'Country Code Only sqlElementGUID = "{77CBC20C-1511-435f-B510-FEAAC4FD14AC}" 'Country Code + Shared
m_countryCode = "VE" diagramSuffix = "[" & m_countryCode & "]" createTAMApplicationMap packageGUID, templateDiagramGUID, sqlElementGUID, diagramSuffix end sub
test

Notes

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script Name: * Author: Giu Platania ' Purpose: generate a ProtoBuff File. this is used in the schema composer ' Date: 8/28/2020 ' !INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Wrappers.Include
Sub main() Dim schema As EA.SchemaComposer Dim xmlType As EA.SchemaType
Dim xmlTypeEnum As EA.SchemaTypeEnum Dim xmlProp As EA.SchemaProperty Dim xmlPropEnum As EA.SchemaPropEnum Dim xmlChoice As EA.SchemaType Dim xmlChoiceEnum As EA.SchemaTypeEnum ' COnfiguration Header
Dim thesyntax 'As String thesyntax = "syntax = ""proto3"";" Dim optionOptimizeFor 'As String optionOptimizeFor = "option optimize_for = LITE_RUNTIME;" Dim protobufPackage '' As String protobufPackage = "package atakmap.commoncommo.protobuf.v3;"
Session.Output syntax Session.Output optionOptimizeFor Session.Output protobufPackage ' Get SchemaComposer Set schema = Repository.SchemaComposer ' Get Schema Types Enumerator Set xmlTypeEnum = schema.SchemaTypes ' Get total number of types in schema Dim count ''As Integer count = xmlTypeEnum.GetCount() ' Enumerate Types Dim UMLProtoDict ''As Object Set UMLProtoDict = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary") UMLProtoDict.Add "boolean", "bool" UMLProtoDict.Add "int", "sint32" UMLProtoDict.Add "string", "string" UMLProtoDict.Add "float", "float" UMLProtoDict.Add "long", "sint64" UMLProtoDict.Add "byte", "bytes" UMLProtoDict.Add "double", "double" Set xmlType = xmlTypeEnum.GetFirst() While Not (xmlType Is Nothing) ' Print Class note 'Session.Output( "// " + xmlType. + " {"); Session.Output "Message " & xmlType.TypeName & " {" Set xmlPropEnum = xmlType.Properties Dim number ''As Integer number = 0 If Not (xmlPropEnum Is Nothing) Then Set xmlProp = xmlPropEnum.GetFirst()
While Not (xmlProp Is Nothing) number = number + 1 Dim sPropDesc '' As String sPropDesc = xmlProp.Name sPropDesc = sPropDesc & " =" & number
' checks if attribute is optional
If xmlProp.IsPrimitive() Then
sPropDesc = UMLProtoDict.Item(xmlProp.PrimitiveType) & " " & sPropDesc Else 'seems to be triggered on attrib type being a uml object instance sPropDesc = xmlProp.TypeName.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + xmlProp.TypeName.substring(1) + " " + sPropDesc; End If
If xmlProp.Cardinality = "0..1" Then sPropDesc = "optional " & sPropDesc End If
If xmlProp.InitialValue.length>0 Then sPropDesc = sPropDesc & " [default = " & xmlProp.InitialValue & "]" End If
If xmlProp.IsByReference() Then sPropDesc = sPropDesc & " (by reference) " End If If xmlProp.IsInline() Then sPropDesc = sPropDesc & " (inline) " End If
Dim comment ''As String comment = xmlProp.Annotation.replace(/(\r\n|\n|\r)/gm, "") Session.Output " " & sPropDesc & "; // " & comment Set xmlChoiceEnum = xmlProp.Choices If xmlChoiceEnum.GetCount()>0 Then
Set xmlChoice = xmlChoiceEnum.GetFirst() Session.Output " ENUM: " While Not (xmlChoice Is Nothing)
Session.Output " " & xmlChoice.TypeName Set xmlChoice = xmlChoiceEnum.GetNext() Wend End If Set xmlProp = xmlPropEnum.GetNext() Wend End If Set xmlType = xmlTypeEnum.GetNext() ' close tag Session.Output "}" Wend 'TODO: change from VB to JS set scriptFile = New TextFile scriptfile.Contents = sqlGetString ''save the script scriptFile.FullPath = Path & SourceStereotype& "_" & connectortype & "_" & TargetStereotype & ".sql" scriptFile.Save

Column.value:
option explicit ' Script Name: Create Metric Diagram ' Author: gplatania@tmforum.org ' Purpose: create a component IIC diagram with ABE and processes ' Date: 2022-06025 !INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Create Nested Hierarchy Diagram !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Color Constants
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
dim treeSelectedType dim package as EA.Package dim levelList ' as Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim element as EA.Element dim subElement as EA.Element
treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType() Session.Output "Create Function diagram....starting..." select case treeSelectedType case otPackage set package = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() set levelList = getDiagramLevelList ' for each element in package.Elements ' Session.Output "element type " + element.MetaType + " found!" ' for each subElement in element.Elements ' if subElement.MetaType = "TMF DMM Dimension" then createNestedHierarchyDiagram package, levelList, "Component", true ''params: parentItem, levelList, diagramType, openDiagram ' end if ' next ' next case else Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK end select Session.Output "Done!" end sub
OnProjectBrowserScript 'test "{66A70E55-2B99-4e54-8893-B0D7224818DD}"
function getDiagramLevelList
dim levelList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim level1 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level2 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level3 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level4 ' as HierarchyLevel
set levelList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
' *** FIRST LEVEL ***
set level1 = New HierarchyLevel
level1.numObjects = 1 level1.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION level1.elementMetatype = "Independent Component" level1.objectHeight = 120 level1.objectWidth = 400 level1.horizOffset = 10 level1.horizSpace = 10 level1.vertOffset = 10 level1.vertSpace = 10
level1.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" level1.objectStyle.fontSize = 12 level1.objectStyle.fontBold = "0" ' true level1.objectStyle.fontColor = colorBlack
level1.elementProfiles.Add "Function", elementProfileFunc
levelList.Add 1, level1
set level2 = new hierarchylevel
level2.numobjects = 3 level2.flowdirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION level2.elementMetatype = "ABE;Process" level2.objectHeight = 70 level2.objectWidth = 300 level2.horizOffset = 25 level2.horizSpace = 10 level2.vertOffset = 50 level2.vertSpace = 20
level2.objectstyle.fillColor = colorWhite level2.objectstyle.fontName = "Arial" level2.objectstyle.fontSize = 9
dim elementProfileFunc set elementProfileFunc = new ElementProfile
dim relationProfileFunc set relationProfileFunc = new RelationProfile relationProfileFunc.nestingType = "Nested"
elementProfileFunc.relationProfiles.Add "NestedFunc", relationProfileFunc elementProfileFunc.elementMetatype = "Function"
dim relationProfileAggFunc set relationProfileAggFunc = new RelationProfile relationProfileAggFunc.nestingType = "Nested"
dim elementProfileAggFunc set elementProfileAggFunc = new ElementProfile elementProfileAggFunc.relationProfiles.Add "NestedAggFunc", relationProfileAggFunc elementProfileAggFunc.elementMetatype = "Aggregated Function"
level2.elementProfiles.Add "Function", elementProfileFunc level2.elementProfiles.Add "AggFunction", elementProfileAggFunc
levellist.add 2, level2
' begin level 3 definition NOT USED set level3 = new hierarchylevel
level3.numobjects = 3 level3.flowdirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION level3.elementMetatype = "Aggregated Function;Function" level3.objectHeight = 70 level3.objectWidth = 300 level3.horizOffset = 25 level3.horizSpace = 10 level3.vertOffset = 50 level3.vertSpace = 20
level3.objectstyle.fillColor = colorWhite level3.objectstyle.fontName = "Arial" level3.objectstyle.fontSize = 9
' begin level 3 function element profile dim Level3FuncElementProfile set Level3FuncElementProfile = new ElementProfile Level3FuncElementProfile.elementMetatype = "Function"
' begin level 3 function element profile, aggregation relation profile dim Level3FuncRelationProfileAggr set Level3FuncRelationProfileAggr = new RelationProfile Level3FuncRelationProfileAggr.nestingType = "Related" Level3FuncRelationProfileAggr.relationType = "Aggregation" Level3FuncRelationProfileAggr.relationStereotype = "TMF_AFAggregatesFunction" Level3FuncRelationProfileAggr.relatedStereotype = "TMF_AF" Level3FuncRelationProfileAggr.relatedType = "Class" Level3FuncElementProfile.relationProfiles.Add "AggregatedRel", Level3FuncRelationProfileAggr ' end level 3 function element profile, aggregation relation profile
' end level 3 function element profile
' begin level 3 Aggregated Function element profile dim Level3AggFuncElementProfile set Level3AggFuncElementProfile = new ElementProfile Level3AggFuncElementProfile.elementMetatype = "Aggregated Function"
' begin level 3 aggregated function element profile, nested profile dim Level3NestRelationProfile set Level3NestRelationProfile = new RelationProfile Level3NestRelationProfile.nestingType = "Nested" Level3AggFuncElementProfile.relationProfiles.Add "Nested", Level3NestRelationProfile ' end level 3 aggregated function element profile, nested profile
' end level 3 Aggregated Function element profile
level3.elementProfiles.Add "Function", Level3FuncElementProfile level3.elementProfiles.Add "AggFunction", Level3AggFuncElementProfile
''levellist.add 3, level3 ' end level 3 set getDiagramLevelList = levelList
end function
sub Test(packageGUID)
dim package As EA.Package dim levelList ' as Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim element as EA.Element dim subElement as EA.Element set package = Repository.GetPackageByGuid(packageGUID) set levelList = getDiagramLevelList for each element in package.Elements
createNestedHierarchyDiagram subElement, levelList, "Aggregated Function", false next end sub

option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
' ' Script Name: ' Author: ' Purpose: generate a word Document. WIP ' Date: '
' ' Diagram Script main function ' sub OnDiagramScript()
' Get a reference to the current diagram dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram set currentDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram()
if not currentDiagram is nothing then ' Get a reference to any selected connector/objects dim selectedConnector as EA.Connector dim selectedObjects as EA.Collection set selectedConnector = currentDiagram.SelectedConnector set selectedObjects = currentDiagram.SelectedObjects
if not selectedConnector is nothing then ' A connector is selected elseif selectedObjects.Count > 0 then ' One or more diagram objects are selected else ' Nothing is selected end if else Session.Prompt "This script requires a diagram to be visible", promptOK end if
end sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="ODA -Create IIC element" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
' Script Name: CreatecheckElement Not ready ' Version : 4.1 ' Author: Giu ' Purpose: This method creates a Implementation Independent Component (IIC) from a package, and connect the new ISC with the using a Realization. ' in the project browser, right click on a package containing IIC,
' Date: 15-Oct-2022 ' Project Browser Script main function ' Dim CheckElementCount, createdChecks CheckElementCount = 12
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
' Get the type of element selected in the Project Browser dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
' Handling Code: Uncomment any types you wish this script to support ' NOTE: You can toggle comments on multiple lines that are currently ' selected with [CTRL]+[SHIFT]+[C]. select case treeSelectedType
case otPackage dim basePackageElement as EA.Element
set basePackageElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() CreateCheckElements basePackageElement, CheckElementCount case otElement 'The root usecase element dim usecaseElement as EA.Element
'The ISC class created for the ISC element. dim controllerClass as EA.Element
'The name for the controller class. This will be use case name + Controller. All the spaces are removed. dim className
'Temporary variable and not used. dim retVal
'Getting the use case element. set usecaseElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
checkUsecaseElement(usecaseElement)
end select
if createdChecks > 0 then Session.Prompt "Check created for " & createdChecks & " Artifacts.", promptOK else Session.Prompt "IIC can ONLY be created for elements of type Artifacts .", promptOK end if
end sub
Sub CreateCheckElements(basePackageElement, CheckElementCount) Dim i 'as Integer For i = 1 To CheckElementCount Dim Check as EA.Element set Check = basePackageElement.Elements.AddNew(i, "Artifact") ' If you want to update the element after adding it createdChecks = createdChecks +1 Check.Update() Next ' Refresh the package to see the new elements basePackageElement.Elements.Refresh() End Sub
Function checkUsecaseElement(usecaseElement) 'The controller class created for the usecase element. dim Check as EA.Element
'Temporary value dim retVal 'The elements should be dFeature. When any other element is selected it will throw an error message to user. if (usecaseElement.Stereotype = "TMF_ISC") then 'When the Use Case already exist for feature. Throw an error. if(checkUseCaseControllerClass(usecaseElement)) = 1 then Session.Prompt "TMF_IIC already exist for ISC " + usecaseElement.Name, promptOK 'When the controller class is NOT available, then create the class. else className = usecaseElement.Name + "_IIC" className = Replace(className, " ", " ") set controllerClass = usecaseElement.Elements.AddNew(className, "TMF_IIC") controllerClass.stereotype = "TMF_IIC" controllerClass.Notes = usecaseElement.Notes CreateConnector usecaseElement, controllerClass controllerClass.Update 'Call the add Methods method which will add all the activity under the usecase as methods to the Controller class. retVal = addMethods(usecaseElement, controllerClass) usecaseControllerClassCreated = usecaseControllerClassCreated + 1 end if usecaseElementCount = usecaseElementCount + 1 'else ' Session.Prompt "Controllers can ONLY be created for elements of type dBusinessUseCase or dBusinessUseCaseCore.", promptOK end if end function
'Function to check if the ISC element if it has an IIC element with same name already Function checkUseCaseControllerClass(usecaseElement) dim elementCount, elementIndex dim controllerClassElement as EA.Element dim className
elementCount = usecaseElement.Elements.Count if elementCount > 0 then for elementIndex = 0 to elementCount className = usecaseElement.Name + "_IIC" set controllerClassElement = usecaseElement.Elements.GetAt(elementIndex) if (controllerClassElement.stereotype = "TMF_IIC") and (controllerClassElement.Name = className) then checkUseCaseControllerClass = 1 Exit For end if next 'elementCount else checkUseCaseControllerClass = 0 end if end Function
'Function to add the activities under usecase to controller as methods. Function addMethods(usecaseElement, controllerClass)
end Function
OnProjectBrowserScript

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC EAScriptLib.VBScript-XML
' Script Name: ' Author: ' Purpose: Print a table with all the messages between a ISC and API for doc generators ' Date:
Function GenerateMessages(elementGuid, diagramType) dim IIC 'set IIC = Repository.GetElementByGuid(elementGuid) set IIC = Repository.GetElementByID(elementGuid) 'Dim ISC 'Set ISC = GetISCFromIIC(IIC)
Dim diagrams Set diagrams = IIC.Diagrams
Dim xmlOutput xmlOutput = "<EADATA><Dataset_0><Data>"
Dim o For o = 0 To diagrams.Count - 1 Dim diagram as EA.Diagram Set diagram = diagrams.GetAt(o) If diagram.MetaType = diagramType Then xmlOutput = xmlOutput & GetMessageNamesFromDiagram(diagram) End If Next xmlOutput = xmlOutput & "</Data></Dataset_0></EADATA>" Session.Output xmlOutput GenerateMessages = xmlOutput End Function
Function GetMessageNamesFromDiagram(diagram) Dim xmlContent xmlContent = ""
Dim l For l = 0 To diagram.DiagramLinks.Count - 1 Dim link Set link = diagram.DiagramLinks.GetAt(l)
Dim connector as EA.Connector Set connector = Repository.GetConnectorByID(link.ConnectorID)
If connector.Type = "Sequence" Then ' xmlContent = xmlContent & "<Row"&_ ' " OperationName = """ & ConvertToCamelCase(connector.Name) & """" &_ ' " ResourceName = """ & GetReturnVal(connector.TransitionGuard) & """" &_ ' " APIName = """ & Repository.GetElementByID(connector.SupplierID).Name & """" &_ ' "></Row>" xmlContent = xmlContent & "<Row>"&_ "<OperationName>" & ConvertToCamelCase(connector.Name) & "</OperationName>" &_ "<APIName>" & Repository.GetElementByID(connector.SupplierID).Name & "</APIName>" &_ "</Row>" End If Next
GetMessageNamesFromDiagram = xmlContent End Function
Function GetISCFromIIC(IIC) Dim n For n = 0 To IIC.Elements.Count - 1 Dim child Set child = IIC.Elements.GetAt(n)
If child.Stereotype = "TMF_ISC" Then Set GetISCFromIIC = child Exit Function End If Next Set GetISCFromIIC = Nothing End Function
Function GetReturnVal(inputString) Dim result Dim parts parts = Split(Split(inputString, ";")(0), "=") if UBound(parts) + 1 >1 then if parts(0) = "retval" then GetReturnVal = parts(1) Else GetReturnVal = "" End if Else GetReturnVal = "" END IF End Function
Function ConvertToCamelCase(inputString) Dim parts Dim i Dim result
' Split the input string by "(" to get the first part (the camel case name). parts = Split(inputString, "(") if UBound(parts) + 1 >0 then ConvertToCamelCase = parts(0) Else ConvertToCamelCase = "" END IF
End Function
Function Main(elementGuid) Session.Output "Processing Some Object id" dim returnVal returnVal = GenerateMessages(elementGuid, "Component::Components - Events Published") Main = returnVal END Function
'Main 50690
