sub Test(packageGUID) dim package As EA.Package dim levelList ' as Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim element as EA.Element Session.Output "starting AF diagram" set package = Repository.GetPackageByGuid(packageGUID) set levelList = getDiagramLevelList Session.Output "found " + cstr(package.Elements.Count) + " elements!" for each element in package.Elements if element.MetaType = "Aggregated Function" then createNestedHierarchyDiagram element, levelList, "Custom", false end if next end sub
function getDiagramLevelList
dim levelList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim level1 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level2 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level3 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level4 ' as HierarchyLevel
set levelList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
' *** FIRST LEVEL *** set level1 = New HierarchyLevel
level1.numObjects = 1 level1.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION level1.elementMetatype = "Aggregated Function" level1.objectHeight = 100 level1.objectWidth = 300 level1.horizOffset = 10 level1.horizSpace = 20 level1.vertOffset = 10 level1.vertSpace = 20 level1.objectStyle.fontName = "Calibri" level1.objectStyle.fontSize = 12 level1.objectStyle.fontBold = "1" ' true level1.isParent = true
' begin level 1 aggregated function element profile dim AggFuncProfile set AggFuncProfile = new ElementProfile AggFuncProfile.elementMetatype = "Aggregated Function" level1.elementProfiles.Add 1, AggFuncProfile
' begin level 1 aggregated function element profile, nested relation profile dim AggFuncNested set AggFuncNested = new RelationProfile AggFuncNested.nestingType = "Nested"
AggFuncProfile.relationProfiles.Add 1, AggFuncNested ' end level 1 aggregated function element profile, nested relation profile ' end level 1 aggregated function element profile
levelList.Add 1, level1
set level2 = new hierarchylevel level2.numObjects = 2 level2.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION level2.elementMetatype = "Aggregated Function" level2.objectHeight = 100 level2.objectWidth = 300 level2.horizOffset = 30 level1.horizSpace = 20 level2.vertOffset = 60 level2.vertSpace = 20 level2.objectStyle.fontName = "Calibri" level2.objectStyle.fontSize = 10 level2.objectStyle.fontBold = "1" ' true
' begin level 2 aggregated function element profile dim AggFuncProfile2 set AggFuncProfile2 = new ElementProfile AggFuncProfile2.elementMetatype = "Aggregated Function" level2.elementProfiles.Add 1, AggFuncProfile
' begin level 2 aggregated function element profile, nested relation profile dim AggFuncNested2 set AggFuncNested2 = new RelationProfile AggFuncNested2.nestingType = "Nested"
AggFuncProfile2.relationProfiles.Add 2, AggFuncNested
levelList.add 2, level2
' *** 3rd LEVEL *** set level3 = New HierarchyLevel
level3.numObjects = 2 level3.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION
level3.elementMetatype = "Function" level3.objectHeight = 60 level3.objectWidth = 160 level3.horizOffset = 30 level3.horizSpace = 3 level3.vertOffset = 50 level3.vertSpace = 3
level3.objectStyle.fillColor = colorWhite level3.objectStyle.lineWidth = 1 level3.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack level3.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" level3.objectStyle.fontSize = 8 level3.objectStyle.fontColor = colorBlack
' begin level 2 function element profile dim L3FuncProfile set L3FuncProfile = new ElementProfile L3FuncProfile.elementMetatype = "Function"
' begin level 2 function element profile, AF relation profile dim L3FuncRelatedAF set L3FuncRelatedAF = new RelationProfile L3FuncRelatedAF.nestingType = "Related" L3FuncRelatedAF.relationType = "Aggregation" L3FuncRelatedAF.relationStereotype = "TMF_AFAggregatesFunction" L3FuncRelatedAF.relatedType = "Class" L3FuncRelatedAF.relatedStereotype = "TMF_Function" L3FuncProfile.relationProfiles.Add 1, L3FuncRelatedAF ' end level 2 function element profile, AF relation profile
level3.elementProfiles.Add 1, L3FuncProfile
levelList.Add 3, level3
' *** FOURTH LEVEL *** NOT ACTITVE set level4 = New HierarchyLevel
level4.numObjects = 3 level4.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION
level4.elementMetatype = "Aggregated Function" level4.objectHeight = 40 level4.objectWidth = 140 level4.horizOffset = 20 level4.horizSpace = 3 level4.vertOffset = 50 level4.vertSpace = 3 'level4.nestingType = "Related" 'level4.relationType = "Aggregation" 'level4.relationStereotype = "TMF_AFAggregatesFunction" 'level4.relatedType = "Class" 'level4.relatedStereotype = "TMF_Function"
level4.objectStyle.fillColor = colorWhite 'level4.objectStyle.lineWidth = 1 'level4.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack level4.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" level4.objectStyle.fontSize = 8 'level4.objectStyle.fontColor = colorBlack
'levelList.Add 4, level4
set getDiagramLevelList = levelList
end function

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="util - SetPackageRefId" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Utils.Model Management Utilities !INC Utils.Util
' ' Script Name: SetPackageRefId ' Author: Giu Platania ' Purpose: This script search for elements of a determine type and the for a package with the exact same name ' the it set the a Tag value with the reference ID of the element in the package ' The script can be configured for different cases by commenting out the specific line of code. ' Date: 2023-05-16 dim StereotypeName, MetaTypeName dim Masterpackage as EA.Package dim subElement as EA.Element ' lev 2 dim subsubElement as EA.Element ' lev 3
''comment and uncomment as required StereotypeName = "TMF_ABE" MetaTypeName = "ABE" ' StereotypeName = "TMF_AF" 'MetaTypeName = "Aggregated Function" 'StereotypeName = "TMF_MetricGroup" ' MetaTypeName = "Metric Group"
' function SetRefGUID(element) Dim package As EA.Package Dim parentPackage as EA.Package
' find the package which should be relatred to the given element set package = getCorrespondingPackage(element.name, StereotypeName) ' if the package exists then set it's RefGUID to add traceability If Not package Is Nothing Then Session.Output "Package found: " & package.Name & " with package ID " & package.PackageID setTaggedValuePackageValue Package, "RefGUID", element.ElementGUID Else ' Package not found Session.Output "ERROR! Package " & element.name & " not found nor created" end if 'GetPackageByName element.name
end function
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
dim treeSelectedType dim element as EA.Element Session.Prompt "This script currently check for " + MetaTypeName, promptOK treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType() select case treeSelectedType case otPackage set Masterpackage = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
' iterate the first level of elements in the package for each element in Masterpackage.Elements ' find those of a specific metatype and set the RefGUID of their associated package if element.MetaType = MetaTypeName then Session.Output "processing " + element.Name SetRefGUID element end if ' now evaluate children for each subElement in element.Elements if subElement.MetaType = MetaTypeName then set Masterpackage = getParentPackage(element.name, StereotypeName) Session.Output "Parent package is" + Masterpackage.Name Session.Output "processing " + subElement.Name SetRefGUID subElement end if ' now evaluate children's children for each subsubElement in subelement.Elements if subsubElement.MetaType = MetaTypeName then set Masterpackage = getParentPackage(subelement.name, StereotypeName) Session.Output "Parent package for "& subsubElement.name & " is" + Masterpackage.Name Session.Output "processing " + subsubElement.Name SetRefGUID subsubElement end if next ' subsubElement next 'subelement next ' element Session.Output "Done setting all REFGUID! " & Masterpackage.Elements.Count case else Session.Prompt "This script is looking for elements " = MetaTypeName + "in a package.", promptOK end select end sub
' get a package with the same name as the element by SQL function getCorrespondingPackage(ElementName, StereotypeName) dim sqlGetElement dim masterElement as EA.Package dim getCorrespondingElement as EA.Package dim parentPackage as EA.Package dim connectorIDs dim connectorID dim result
'initialize to nothing 'set getCorrespondingElement = nothing sqlGetElement = "SELECT p.Package_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM t_object AS o " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_package as p ON o.name = p.name " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE o.Stereotype = '"& StereotypeName &"' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND o.name='"& ElementName &"' "
' execute query to get all pacakges of name `ElementName` and stereotype `StereotypeName` result = Repository.SQLQuery(sqlGetElement) 'Session.Output "XML query is" & result
' QUESTION: why is the result of the query Connector IDs? connectorIDs = convertQueryResultToArray(result) 'Iterate over connectorIDs array and get the first result for each connectorID in connectorIDs
on error resume next ' Get the corresponding package based on connectorID set getCorrespondingElement = Repository.GetPackageByID(connectorID)
' QUESTION: why do we create a new package here but not on line 29? if err.Number <> 0 or getCorrespondingElement is nothing then Session.Output "Package "& element.name & " not found. creating a new one" on error goto 0 set parentPackage = Masterpackage set getCorrespondingElement = parentPackage.Packages.AddNew(ElementName, "") getCorrespondingElement.Update() err.Clear end if
' Exit the loop after getting the first result exit for next ' Return the corresponding package set getCorrespondingPackage = getCorrespondingElement end function
' Function: getParentPackage ' ' Description: Retrieves the parent package with the specified name and stereotype. ' If not found, it returns the Masterpackage. ' ' Parameters: ' - ElementName: The name of the element to find. ' - StereotypeName: The stereotype of the element to find. ' ' Returns: The parent package if found, or the Masterpackage if not found. ' '----
Function getParentPackage(ElementName, StereotypeName) Dim sqlGetElement Dim newMasterPackage As EA.Package Dim result Dim resultArray DIM Query
' Define the SQL query to find the package sqlGetElement = "SELECT o.Package_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM t_package AS o " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE o.name='"& ElementName &"' "
' Execute the query to get the package ID Query = Repository.SQLQuery(sqlGetElement) resultArray = convertQueryResultToArray(Query) ' Check if the query returned any results If Not IsEmpty(resultArray) Then ' Get the first package ID from the result for each result in resultArray on error resume next ' Get the corresponding package based on package ID session.output("Get the corresponding package based on package ID: " & result) Set newMasterPackage = Repository.GetPackageByID(result) ' Check if the package exists If Not (newMasterPackage Is Nothing) Then ' Return the corresponding package Set getParentPackage = newMasterPackage session.output("Parent is" = getParentPackage.name) Exit Function End If On Error GoTo 0 next End If ' If the package was not found, return the Masterpackage Set getParentPackage = Masterpackage session.output("failed to retrieve. Parent is" = getParentPackage.name) End Function
' NOT USED ATM ' we look for a package to be the new parent with the name of the element function getParentPackage2(ElementName, StereotypeName) dim sqlGetElement dim masterElement as EA.Package dim getCorrespondingElement as EA.Package dim parentPackage as EA.Package dim connectorIDs dim connectorID dim result
' Initialize to nothing ' Set getCorrespondingElement = nothing sqlGetElement = "SELECT o.Package_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM t_object AS o " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE o.Stereotype = '"& StereotypeName &"' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND o.name='"& ElementName &"' "
' Execute query to get all packages of name `ElementName` and stereotype `StereotypeName` result = Repository.SQLQuery(sqlGetElement) ' Session.Output "XML query is" & result
connectorIDs = convertQueryResultToArray(result) ' Iterate over connectorIDs array and get the first result for each connectorID in connectorIDs on error resume next ' Get the corresponding package based on connectorID set getCorrespondingElement = Repository.GetPackageByID(connectorID) Session.Output "Master Package " & getCorrespondingElement.name if err.Number <> 0 or getCorrespondingElement is nothing then Session.Output "ERROR: Package "& ElementName & " not found." set getParentPackage = Masterpackage break on error goto 0 end if ' Exit the loop after getting the first result exit for next ' Return the corresponding package set getParentPackage = getCorrespondingElement end function
' NOT working ' Search for a package by name with API within all packages and sub-packages Function GetPackageByName(packageName, parentPackage) Dim package As EA.Package For Each package In parentPackage.Packages If package.Name = packageName Then Set GetPackageByName = package Exit Function Else Dim foundPackage Set foundPackage = GetPackageByName(packageName, package) If Not foundPackage Is Nothing Then Set GetPackageByName = foundPackage Exit Function End If End If Next Set GetPackageByName = Nothing End Function
OnProjectBrowserScript

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="TMF - eamatic" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
'EA-Matic !INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
'Tell EA what the menu options should be function EA_GetMenuItems(MenuLocation, MenuName) if MenuName = "" then 'Menu Header EA_GetMenuItems = "-&TMF" else if MenuName = "-&TMF" then 'Menu items Dim menuItems(2) menuItems(0) = "Create Diagrams" menuItems(1) = "Utils" menuItems(2) = "DiagramMenu" EA_GetMenuItems = menuItems end if end if end function
'Define the state of the menu options function EA_GetMenuState(MenuLocation, MenuName, ItemName, IsEnabled, IsChecked) if MenuName = "-&TMF" then Select Case ItemName case "Create Diagrams" if MenuLocation = "TreeView" then IsEnabled = true else IsEnabled = false end if case "DiagramMenu" if MenuLocation = "Diagram" then IsEnabled = true else IsEnabled = false end if end select end if 'to return out parameter values we should return an array with all parameters EA_GetMenuState = Array(MenuLocation, MenuName, ItemName, IsEnabled, IsChecked) end function
'react to user clicking a menu option function EA_MenuClick(MenuLocation, MenuName, ItemName) if MenuName = "-&TMF" then Select Case ItemName case "Create Diagrams" Dim Package Set Package = Repository.GetTreeSelectedPackage() MsgBox ("Current Package is: " & Package.Name) case "Utils"
Set Package = Repository.GetTreeSelectedPackage() MsgBox ("util functions ") case "DiagramMenu" Dim Diagram Set Diagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram() MsgBox("Current Diagram is: " & Diagram.Name) end select end if end function

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Util - Sort by Alias" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit !INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC EAScriptLib.VBScript-Logging ' ' Script Name: SortbyAlias ' Author: Giu Platania ' Purpose: Sort elements contained in the selected package from the Project Browser by the Alias name ASC ' Date: 2023 11 ' sub SortDictionary (objDict) ' constants Const dictKey = 1 Const dictItem = 2 ' variables Dim strDict() Dim objKey Dim strKey,strItem Dim X,Y,Z ' get the dictionary count Z = objDict.Count ' sorting needs more than one item If Z > 1 Then ' create an array to store dictionary information ReDim strDict(Z,2) X = 0 ' populate the string array For Each objKey In objDict strDict(X,dictKey) = CStr(objKey) strDict(X,dictItem) = CStr(objDict(objKey)) X = X + 1 Next ' perform a a shell sort of the string array For X = 0 To (Z - 2) For Y = X To (Z - 1) If StrComp(strDict(X,1),strDict(Y,1),vbTextCompare) > 0 Then strKey = strDict(X,dictKey) strItem = strDict(X,dictItem) strDict(X,dictKey) = strDict(Y,dictKey) strDict(X,dictItem) = strDict(Y,dictItem) strDict(Y,dictKey) = strKey strDict(Y,dictItem) = strItem End If Next Next ' erase the contents of the dictionary object objDict.RemoveAll ' repopulate the dictionary with the sorted information For X = 0 To (Z - 1) objDict.Add strDict(X,dictKey), strDict(X,dictItem) Next ' sort the package elements based on the new sorting order dim newOrder newOrder = 0 dim theItem dim eaelement for each objKey in objDict theItem = objDict.Item(objKey) Set eaelement = Repository.GetElementByGuid(theItem) 'change the position of the element in the package to the new sorting order value eaelement.TreePos = CLng(newOrder) eaelement.Update() newOrder = newOrder + 1 next end if end sub
sub sortElementsbyAlias (selectedPackage) LOGInfo("Processing selected package " & selectedPackage.Name) dim elements as EA.Collection dim i dim processedElements set processedElements = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary" ) set elements = selectedPackage.Elements for i = 0 to elements.Count - 1 dim currentElement as EA.Element set currentElement = elements.GetAt( i ) LOGInfo("Processing " & currentElement.Type & " no " & i & " with alias " & currentElement.Alias & "(" & currentElement.ElementGUID & ")") processedElements.Add currentElement.Alias, currentElement.ElementGUID next LOGInfo("Sorting package elements") SortDictionary processedElements end sub ' ' Project Browser Script main function ' sub OnProjectBrowserScript() Repository.ClearOutput "Script" LOGInfo( "Starting SortbyAlias script" ) LOGInfo( "==============================" ) ' Get the type of element selected in the Project Browser dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType() select case treeSelectedType case otPackage ' Code for when a package is selected dim thePackage as EA.Package set thePackage = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() sortElementsbyAlias thePackage Repository.RefreshModelView (thePackage.PackageID) case else ' Error message Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK end select end sub OnProjectBrowserScript

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="util - Sort by UID" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit !INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC EAScriptLib.VBScript-Logging ' ' Script Name: SortbyTaggedValue_SortingOrder ' Author: Giu.platania ' Purpose: Sort elements contained in the selected package from the Project Browser by the tagged value SortingOrder value ' current version contains a Function to transform property into integer format when those are in a eTOM like format ' e.g. propertiesArray = Array("7", "7.4", "7.4.1", "7.4.1.1", "7.4.1.2") ' Date: 25/05/2023 ' ' SortDictionary subroutine sorts the keys of a given dictionary in ascending order ' and repositions elements in an Enterprise Architect model based on the sorted order
dim taggedValueName taggedValueName = "Process Identifier" sub SortDictionary (objDict)
' Declare dictionary key and item constants Const dictKey = 1 Const dictItem = 2
' Declare variables Dim strDict() Dim objKey Dim strKey,strItem Dim X,Y,Z
' Get the count of items in the dictionary Z = objDict.Count
' Proceed if the dictionary has more than one item If Z > 1 Then ' Create a 2D array to hold dictionary key-item pairs ReDim strDict(Z,2) X = 0
' Populate the array with keys and items from the dictionary For Each objKey In objDict strDict(X,dictKey) = CStr(objKey) strDict(X,dictItem) = CStr(objDict(objKey)) X = X + 1 Next
' Implement shell sort on the array based on the keys For X = 0 To (Z - 2) For Y = X To (Z - 1) If StrComp(strDict(X,1),strDict(Y,1),vbTextCompare) > 0 Then ' If the key at index X is greater than the key at index Y, swap them strKey = strDict(X,dictKey) strItem = strDict(X,dictItem) strDict(X,dictKey) = strDict(Y,dictKey) strDict(X,dictItem) = strDict(Y,dictItem) strDict(Y,dictKey) = strKey strDict(Y,dictItem) = strItem End If Next Next
' Clear the original dictionary objDict.RemoveAll
' Repopulate the dictionary with the sorted key-item pairs For X = 0 To (Z - 1) objDict.Add strDict(X,dictKey), strDict(X,dictItem) Next
' Initialize the new order variable dim newOrder newOrder = 0 dim theItem dim eaelement
' For each key in the sorted dictionary, find the corresponding Enterprise Architect element ' and reposition it in the model based on the new order for each objKey in objDict theItem = objDict.Item(objKey) Set eaelement = Repository.GetElementByGuid(theItem)
' Change the tree position of the element to the new order value eaelement.TreePos = CLng(newOrder) eaelement.Update() newOrder = newOrder + 1 next end if end sub
sub SortbyTaggedValue_SortingOrder (selectedPackage) LOGInfo("Processing selected package " & selectedPackage.Name) LOGInfo("sorting TAG is " & taggedValueName) dim elements as EA.Collection dim i dim processedElements dim aLong ' as Long set processedElements = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary" ) set elements = selectedPackage.Elements for i = 0 to elements.Count - 1 dim currentElement as EA.Element set currentElement = elements.GetAt( i ) dim tag as EA.TaggedValue set tag = currentElement.TaggedValues.GetByName(taggedValueName) if tag Is Nothing then 'nothing to do : the element will be at the beginning LOGInfo("tag is nothing for" & currentElement.Name & " no " & i & "( " & currentElement.Type & ")") processedElements.Add "0", currentElement.ElementGUID else LOGInfo("Processing " & currentElement.Name & " no " & i & " TV= " & tag.Value & " (" & currentElement.ElementGUID & ")") tag.Value = TransformProperty(tag.Value) aLong = CLng(tag.Value) LOGInfo("Long is " & aLong) processedElements.Add aLong , currentElement.ElementGUID end if next LOGInfo("Sorting package elements") SortDictionary processedElements 'SortEtomArray processedElements end sub
' Function to transform property into integer format when those are in a eTOM like format ' e.g. propertiesArray = Array("7", "7.4", "7.4.1", "7.4.1.1", "7.4.1.2")
Function TransformProperty2(property) Dim parts parts = Split(property, ".") Dim transformedParts ReDim transformedParts(Ubound(parts))
Dim i For i = 0 To Ubound(parts) transformedParts(i) = CInt(parts(i)) Next TransformProperty = Join(transformedParts, ".") End Function
' Function to transform property into padded format when those are in an eTOM like format ' e.g. propertiesArray = Array("7", "7.4", "7.4.1", "7.4.1.1", "7.4.1.2")
Function TransformProperty(property) Dim parts dim partcount
parts = Split(property, ".")
If Ubound(parts) < 5 Then Dim transformedParts ReDim transformedParts(Ubound(parts))
Dim i For i = 0 To Ubound(parts) ' Pad each segment to 5 digits width by adding leading zeros transformedParts(i) = Right("00000" & parts(i), 1) Next
' Return the joined parts as a single number TransformProperty = CLng(Join(transformedParts, "")) Else ' If a part has 5 or more characters, bypass the padding and use it as is If IsNumeric(Join(parts, "")) Then TransformProperty = CLng(Join(parts, "")) Else Randomize ' Initialize random-number generator. TransformProperty = Int((1000000 - 1 + 1) * Rnd + 1) End If End If End Function
' Sort the array using transformed properties function SortEtomArray(propertiesArray) dim dicitionary set dicitionary = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary" )
Dim i, j, temp
' Iterate over the array For i = 0 To propertiesArray.Count - 2 For j = i + 1 To propertiesArray.Count - 1 ' Convert to long instead of integer and compare If CLng(TransformProperty(propertiesArray.GetAt(i))) > CLng(TransformProperty(propertiesArray.GetAt(j))) Then ' Swap elements temp = propertiesArray.GetAt(i) propertiesArray.SetAt i, propertiesArray.GetAt(j) propertiesArray.SetAt j, temp End If Next Next
' Output the sorted array For i = 0 To propertiesArray.Count - 1 Session.Output(propertiesArray.GetAt(i)) Next end Function
' ' Project Browser Script main function ' sub OnProjectBrowserScript() Repository.ClearOutput "Script" LOGInfo( "Starting SortbyTaggedValue_SortingOrder script" ) LOGInfo( "==============================" ) ' Get the type of element selected in the Project Browser dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType() select case treeSelectedType case otPackage ' Code for when a package is selected dim thePackage as EA.Package set thePackage = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() SortbyTaggedValue_SortingOrder thePackage Repository.RefreshModelView (thePackage.PackageID) case else ' Error message Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK end select end sub OnProjectBrowserScript

option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Utils.Include
' Script Name: Create ETOM Compositions ' Author: Giu ' Purpose: THis script will traverse a project tree and extract all the element with a certain stereotype ' It will then get the children of the current element and create a relationship between the owner and the child ' Date: 2023.06 ' TODO: add check to avoid duplicate relationship
Dim componentElementCount, componentControllerClassCreated 'Used to check if there are any use case element are available and throw an error when no use case element is present. componentElementCount = 0 componentControllerClassCreated = 0 dim Stereo, connType, connStereotype Stereo = "TMF_Process" connType = "Aggregation" connStereotype = "TMF_isComposedByProcess"
'
Function createRelationship(fromElement) dim childElement as EA.Element dim childElementList 'as Scripting.Dictionary set childElementList = getChildElementList(fromElement,Stereo) for each childElement in fromElement.Elements if childElement.Stereotype = stereo then addConnector childElement, connType, connStereotype, fromElement Session.Output( "created relationship from " + childElement.Name + " to " + fromElement.name ) fromElement.Update childElement.Update end if next end function
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
' Get the type of element selected in the Project Browser dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType() select case treeSelectedType case otPackage dim basePackageElement as EA.Element dim packagesubElement as EA.Element 'level 1 dim subElement as EA.Element ''level 2 dim subsubElement as EA.Element '' level 3 dim subsubsubElement as EA.Element '' level 4 dim subsubsubsubElement as EA.Element '' level 5 dim subsubsubsubsubElement as EA.Element '' level 6
dim packageElementIndex, packageElementCount set basePackageElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() Session.Output( "package " + basePackageElement.Name) packageElementCount = basePackageElement.Elements.Count - 1 set basePackageElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
for packageElementIndex = 0 to packageElementCount '''level 1 set packagesubElement = basePackageElement.Elements.GetAt(packageElementIndex) createRelationship(packagesubElement) ''level 2 for each subElement in packagesubElement.Elements createRelationship(subElement) '' level 3 if subElement.Elements.Count > 0 then for each subsubElement in subElement.Elements createRelationship(subsubElement) '' lev 4 if subsubElement.Elements.Count > 0 then for each subsubsubElement in subsubElement.Elements createRelationship(subsubsubElement) ''lev 5 if subsubsubElement.Elements.Count > 0 then for each subsubsubsubElement in subsubsubElement.Elements createRelationship(subsubsubsubElement) next componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 end if '' lev 5 next componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 end if '' lev 4 next end If '' level 3 componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 next componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 next 'packageElementIndex case otElement 'element selected dim Element as EA.Element set packagesubElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() createRelationship(packagesubElement) componentElementCount =componentElementCount + 1 ''level 2 for each subElement in packagesubElement.Elements createRelationship(subElement) '' level 3 if subElement.Elements.Count > 0 then for each subsubElement in subElement.Elements createRelationship(subsubElement) '' lev 4 if subsubElement.Elements.Count > 0 then for each subsubsubElement in subsubElement.Elements createRelationship(subsubsubElement) ''lev 5 if subsubsubElement.Elements.Count > 0 then for each subsubsubsubElement in subsubsubElement.Elements createRelationship(subsubsubsubElement) next componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 end if '' lev 5 next componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 end if '' lev 4 next end If '' level 3 componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 next end select
if componentElementCount > 0 then Session.Prompt "relationship created for for" & componentElementCount & " Process.", promptOK else Session.Prompt "relationship can ONLY be created for elements of type" & Stereo, promptOK end if end sub
OnProjectBrowserScript()

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="DMM - Capabilities and Requirements" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
' Script Name: DMM - Capabilities and Requirements ' Author: gplatania@tmforum.org ' Purpose: create a diagram with 3 levels of capabilities and the related requirements as 4th level. WIP ' Date: 2022-06025
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Create Nested Hierarchy Diagram !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Color Constants
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
dim treeSelectedType dim package as EA.Package dim levelList ' as Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim element as EA.Element
treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType() Session.Output "starting DMM" select case treeSelectedType case otPackage Session.Output "package selected" set package = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() Session.Output "found " + cstr(package.Elements.Count) + " elements!" set levelList = getDiagramLevelList 'for each element in package.Elements 'Session.Output "element type " + element.MetaType + " found!" 'if element.MetaType = "Aggregated Function" then createNestedHierarchyDiagram package, levelList, "custom", false 'end if 'next case else Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK end select Session.Output "done" end sub
OnProjectBrowserScript 'test("{B8FDEF86-54B6-4964-B33D-2A7783432493}")
sub Test(packageGUID) dim package As EA.Package dim levelList ' as Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim element as EA.Element Session.Output "starting DMM diagram" set package = Repository.GetPackageByGuid(packageGUID) set levelList = getDiagramLevelList Session.Output "found " + cstr(package.Elements.Count) + " elements!" for each element in package.Elements if element.MetaType = "Capability" then createNestedHierarchyDiagram element, levelList, "Custom", false end if next end sub
function getDiagramLevelList
dim levelList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim level1 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level2 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level3 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level4 ' as HierarchyLevel
set levelList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
' *** FIRST LEVEL *** ' *** FIRST LEVEL *** set level1 = New HierarchyLevel
level1.numObjects = 2 level1.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION level1.elementMetatype = "Capability" level1.objectHeight = 100 level1.objectWidth = 200 level1.horizOffset = 10 level1.horizSpace = 20 level1.vertOffset = 10 level1.vertSpace = 20 level1.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" level1.objectStyle.fontSize = 14 level1.objectStyle.fontBold = "1" ' true
' begin level 1 aggregated function element profile dim DomainProfile set DomainProfile = new ElementProfile DomainProfile.elementMetatype = "Capability" level1.elementProfiles.Add 1, DomainProfile
' begin level 1 aggregated function element profile, nested relation profile dim DomainNested set DomainNested = new RelationProfile DomainNested.nestingType = "Nested"
DomainProfile.relationProfiles.Add 1, DomainNested ' end level 1 aggregated function element profile, nested relation profile ' end level 1 aggregated function element profile
levelList.Add 1, level1
set level2 = new hierarchylevel
level2.numobjects = 3 level2.flowdirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION level2.elementMetatype = "Aggregated Function" level2.objectHeight = 110 level2.objectWidth = 230 level2.horizOffset = 10 level2.horizSpace = 10 level2.vertOffset = 80 level2.vertSpace = 10 level2.objectstyle.fontname = "Calibri" level2.objectstyle.fontsize = 10
' begin level 2 function element profile dim L2AFProfile set L2AFProfile = new ElementProfile L2AFProfile.elementMetatype = "Aggregated Function"
' begin level 2 function element profile, AF relation profile dim L2AFRelatedFunction set L2AFRelatedFunction = new RelationProfile L2AFRelatedFunction.nestingType = "Related" L2AFRelatedFunction.relationType = "Aggregation" L2AFRelatedFunction.relationStereotype = "TMF_AFAggregatesFunction" L2AFRelatedFunction.relatedType = "Class" L2AFRelatedFunction.relatedStereotype = "TMF_Function"
L2AFProfile.relationProfiles.Add 1, L2AFRelatedFunction ' end level 2 function element profile, AF relation profile
' begin level 2 function element profile, AF relation profile dim L2AFRelatedAD set L2AFRelatedAD = new RelationProfile L2AFRelatedAD.nestingType = "Related" L2AFRelatedAD.relationType = "Aggregation" L2AFRelatedAD.relationStereotype = "TMF_DomainAggregatesFunction" L2AFRelatedAD.relatedType = "Class" L2AFRelatedAD.relatedStereotype = "TMF_AF"
L2AFProfile.relationProfiles.Add 2, L2AFRelatedAD ' end level 2 function element profile, AF relation profile
level2.elementProfiles.Add 1, L2AFProfile ' end level 2 function element profile
levellist.add 2, level2
' *** 3rd LEVEL *** set level3 = New HierarchyLevel
level3.numObjects = 4 level3.flowDirection = TOP_DOWN_FLOW_DIRECTION level3.elementMetatype = "Function" level3.objectHeight = 60 level3.objectWidth = 180 level3.horizOffset = 30 level3.horizSpace = 3 level3.vertOffset = 50 level3.vertSpace = 3 level3.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" level3.objectStyle.fontSize = 9
' begin level 3 function element profile dim L3FunctionProfile set L3FunctionProfile = new ElementProfile L3FunctionProfile.elementMetatype = "Function"
' begin level 3 function element profile, AF relation profile dim L3FunctionRelatedAF set L3FunctionRelatedAF = new RelationProfile L3FunctionRelatedAF.nestingType = "Related" L3FunctionRelatedAF.relationType = "Aggregation" L3FunctionRelatedAF.relationStereotype = "TMF_AFAggregatesFunction" L3FunctionRelatedAF.relatedType = "Class" L3FunctionRelatedAF.relatedStereotype = "TMF_Function"
L3FunctionProfile.relationProfiles.Add 1, L3FunctionRelatedAF ' end level 3 function element profile, function relation profile
level3.elementProfiles.Add 1, L3FunctionProfile
levelList.Add 3, level3
' *** FOURTH LEVEL *** set level4 = New HierarchyLevel ' level4.numObjects = 3 level4.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION
level4.elementMetatype = "Requirement" level4.objectHeight = 30 level4.objectWidth = 85 level4.horizOffset = 20 level4.horizSpace = 3 level4.vertOffset = 50 level4.vertSpace = 3 level4.nestingType = "Related" level4.relationType = "Aggregation" level4.relationStereotype = "TMF_AFAggregatesFunction" level4.relatedType = "Class" level4.relatedStereotype = "TMF_Function" ' level4.objectStyle.fillColor = colorWhite level4.objectStyle.lineWidth = 1 level4.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack level4.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" level4.objectStyle.fontSize = 8 'level4.objectStyle.fontColor = colorBlack
levelList.Add 4, level4
set getDiagramLevelList = levelList
end function

option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Utils.Include
' Script Name: Create FF Compositions ' Author: Giu Platania ' Purpose: THis script will traverse a project tree and extract all the element with a certain stereotype ' It will then get the children of the current element and create a relationship between the owner and the child ' Date: 2023.12 ' TODO: add check to avoid duplicate relationship ' TODO: ' retrieve element ' retrieve Tagged Value called RefGUID ' get corresponding package ' get all element in that package
Dim componentElementCount, componentControllerClassCreated 'Used to check if there are any use case element are available and throw an error when no use case element is present. componentElementCount = 0 componentControllerClassCreated = 0 dim Stereo, connType, connStereotype Stereo = "TMF_Function" connType = "Aggregation" connStereotype = "TMF::TMF_AFAggregatesFunction"
'
Function createRelationship(fromElement) dim childElement as EA.Element dim childElementList 'as Scripting.Dictionary set childElementList = getChildElementList(fromElement,Stereo) for each childElement in fromElement.Elements if childElement.Stereotype = stereo then addConnectorMDG childElement, connType, connStereotype, fromElement Session.Output( "created relationship from " + childElement.Name + " to " + fromElement.name ) fromElement.Update childElement.Update end if next end function
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
' Get the type of element selected in the Project Browser dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType() select case treeSelectedType case otPackage dim basePackageElement as EA.Element dim packagesubElement as EA.Element 'level 1 dim subElement as EA.Element ''level 2 dim subsubElement as EA.Element '' level 3 dim subsubsubElement as EA.Element '' level 4 dim subsubsubsubElement as EA.Element '' level 5 dim subsubsubsubsubElement as EA.Element '' level 6
dim packageElementIndex, packageElementCount set basePackageElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() Session.Output( "package " + basePackageElement.Name) packageElementCount = basePackageElement.Elements.Count - 1 set basePackageElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
for packageElementIndex = 0 to packageElementCount '''level 1 set packagesubElement = basePackageElement.Elements.GetAt(packageElementIndex) createRelationship(packagesubElement) ''level 2 for each subElement in packagesubElement.Elements createRelationship(subElement) '' level 3 if subElement.Elements.Count > 0 then for each subsubElement in subElement.Elements createRelationship(subsubElement) '' lev 4 if subsubElement.Elements.Count > 0 then for each subsubsubElement in subsubElement.Elements createRelationship(subsubsubElement) ''lev 5 if subsubsubElement.Elements.Count > 0 then for each subsubsubsubElement in subsubsubElement.Elements createRelationship(subsubsubsubElement) next componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 end if '' lev 5 next componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 end if '' lev 4 next end If '' level 3 componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 next componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 next 'packageElementIndex case otElement 'element selected dim Element as EA.Element set packagesubElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() createRelationship(packagesubElement) componentElementCount =componentElementCount + 1 ''level 2 for each subElement in packagesubElement.Elements createRelationship(subElement) '' level 3 if subElement.Elements.Count > 0 then for each subsubElement in subElement.Elements createRelationship(subsubElement) '' lev 4 if subsubElement.Elements.Count > 0 then for each subsubsubElement in subsubElement.Elements createRelationship(subsubsubElement) ''lev 5 if subsubsubElement.Elements.Count > 0 then for each subsubsubsubElement in subsubsubElement.Elements createRelationship(subsubsubsubElement) next componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 end if '' lev 5 next componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 end if '' lev 4 next end If '' level 3 componentElementCount = componentElementCount + 1 next end select
if componentElementCount > 0 then Session.Prompt "relationship created for for " & componentElementCount & " " & Stereo, promptOK else Session.Prompt "relationship can ONLY be created for elements of type" & Stereo, promptOK end if end sub
OnProjectBrowserScript()

option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Utils.Model Management Utilities ' ' This code has been included from the default Project Browser template. ' If you wish to modify this template, it is located in the Config\Script Templates ' directory of your EA install path. ' ' Script Name: ' Author: ' Purpose: ' Date: '
' ' Project Browser Script main function ' sub OnProjectBrowserScript() dim jsonElement as EA.Element dim sourceClass as EA.Element
set jsonElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid ("{C1763ED8-75C2-465d-B981-E385A2F406B5}") set sourceClass = Repository.GetElementByGuid ("{8E4FF238-DAD9-4e5c-AD87-D9DD2042F5AB}")
CreateAssociation sourceClass, jsonElement
end sub
sub CreateAssociation (sourceClass, sourceJsonElem) ' define variables dim connectorList dim targetElem as EA.Element dim targetJsonElem as EA.Element dim connectorGUID as EA.Connector dim connector AS EA.Connector ' get all associations from sourceClass set connectorList = getRelatedSupplierElementList3 (sourceClass, "Association", "Class")
' iterate associations and create for each connectorGUID in connectorList set connector = Repository.GetConnectorByGuid (connectorGUID) ' search for element w/ target name and stereotype set targetElem = Repository.GetElementByID(connector.SupplierID) set targetJsonElem = lookupElement (targetElem.Name, "TMF_JSON_Schema", "Class") ' if not found, create element and association if targetJsonElem = null then set targetJsonElem = TransferClass (targetElem, Repository.GetCurrentDiagram) addConnector sourceJsonElem, "Association", "TMF_Schema_Associates_Schema", targetJsonElem end if next end sub
OnProjectBrowserScript

option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
' ' Script Name: ' Author: ' Purpose: ' Date: '
Function StripHTMLCharacters(str) Dim htmlRegex Set htmlRegex = CreateObject("VBScript.RegExp")
' Define the regular expression pattern to match HTML tags and entities htmlRegex.Pattern = "<[^>]+>|&[^;]+;"
' Replace HTML tags and entities with an empty string StripHTMLCharacters = htmlRegex.Replace(str, "") End Function

Column.name: Notes

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
'[path=\Projects\Project EC\EAC scripts] '[group=EAC scripts]
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Wrappers.Include
' ' Script Name: Export components Tree to Excel ' Author: giu Platania ' Purpose: Exports the list of components to an excel file ' Date: 2023-12-08 ' 'name of the output tab const outPutName = "Export components" dim excelOutput
sub main
'create output tab Repository.CreateOutputTab outPutName Repository.ClearOutput outPutName Repository.EnsureOutputVisible outPutName
'create the excel file set excelOutput = new ExcelFile
'tell the user we are starting Session.Output now() & " Starting components Export " 'do the actual export exportProgrammeTree()
' export the processes Session.Output now() & " Exporting components' processes" exportProcesses() 'export the functions Session.Output now() & " Exporting components' functions" exportFunction() ' export ABEs Session.Output now() & " Exporting components' ABEs" exportABE() ' Export APIs Session.Output now() & " Exporting components' APIs" exportAPI() excelOutput.save excelOutput.close 'tell the user we are finished Session.Output now() & " Finished Export components Tree '"
end sub
function defineHeader() dim messageHeaders(9) messageHeaders(0) = "Function Block" messageHeaders(1) = "Component Name" messageHeaders(2) = "Short Name" messageHeaders(3) = "ID" messageHeaders(4) = "Status" messageHeaders(5) = "Version" messageHeaders(6) = "Release" messageHeaders(7) = "Description" messageHeaders(8) ="Remarks" ' Return the messageHeaders array defineHeader = messageHeaders end function
function defineProcessHeader() dim messageHeaders(6) messageHeaders(0) = "Component Name" messageHeaders(1) = "ID" messageHeaders(2) = "Process Name" messageHeaders(3) = "Process ID" messageHeaders(4) = "Proc. Level" messageHeaders(5) = "Process Documentation"
' Return the messageHeaders array defineProcessHeader = messageHeaders end function
function exportProgrammeTree()
dim getPogrammeTreeContents dim getComponentList dim getComponentList2
getComponentList2 = "SELECT ODAFunctionBlock.Name as 'ODA_FunctionslBlock', TMF_ODAComponents.Name as 'ComponentsName', TMF_ODAComponents.Alias as 'ComponentshortName', " & vbNewLine & _ " CompID.value as 'ID', TMF_ODAComponents.status as 'status', " & vbNewLine & _ " TMF_ODAComponents.version as 'version', TMF_ODAComponents.phase as 'Release', TMF_ODAComponents.Note as 'Description' , CompIssue.notes as 'Remarks' " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM t_object AS TMF_ODAComponents " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_connector as connector ON TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID = connector.Start_Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_object AS ODAFunctionBlock ON connector.End_Object_ID = ODAFunctionBlock.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS CompID ON (CompID.Object_ID = TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID AND CompID.property = 'ID') " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS CompIssue ON (CompIssue.Object_ID = TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID AND CompIssue.property = 'issue') " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE TMF_ODAComponents.Stereotype='TMF_ISC' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND ODAFunctionBlock.Stereotype='TMF_ODAFunctionBlock' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND connector.Stereotype='TMF_BlockContainsFunction' " dim arrayResult arrayResult = getArrayFromQuery(getComponentList2) dim messageHeaders messageHeaders = defineHeader()
if Ubound(arrayResult) > 0 then dim mergedArray mergedArray = AddRowToArray(arrayResult, messageHeaders)
excelOutput.createTab "Components", mergedArray, true, "TableStyleMedium13" 'excelOutput.save
else Session.Output now() & " Empty query!" end if end function
function exportProcesses()
dim getPogrammeTreeContents dim getComponentList dim getComponentList2
getComponentList2 = "SELECT Distinct TMF_ODAComponents.name, TMF_IIC_ID.value as 'ComponentID', ProcID.value as ProcessID, TMF_Process.Name as TMF_Process, HierarchiLevel.value as 'level', TMF_Process.Note as [Docs.Formatted] " & vbNewLine & _ " --, CompID.value, TMF_ODAComponents.Name as TMF_ODAComponents, " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM t_object AS TMF_ODAComponents " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_connector as connector ON TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID = connector.Start_Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_object AS TMF_Process ON connector.End_Object_ID = TMF_Process.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS ProcID ON (ProcID .Object_ID = TMF_Process.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND ProcID .property = 'Process Identifier') " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS HierarchiLevel ON (HierarchiLevel.Object_ID = TMF_Process.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND HierarchiLevel.property = 'HierarchyLevel') " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties TMF_IIC_ID on (TMF_IIC_ID.Object_ID = TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID AND TMF_IIC_ID.property = 'ID') " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE TMF_ODAComponents.Stereotype='TMF_IIC' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND TMF_Process.Stereotype='TMF_Process' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND connector.Stereotype='TMF_ComponentDependsProcess' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND TMF_ODAComponents.status NOT like 'TODO' "
dim arrayResult arrayResult = getArrayFromQuery(getComponentList2) dim messageHeaders messageHeaders = defineProcessHeader()
if Ubound(arrayResult) > 0 then dim mergedArray mergedArray = AddRowToArray(arrayResult, messageHeaders) excelOutput.createTab "Processes", mergedArray, true, "TableStyleMedium13" 'excelOutput.save
else Session.Output now() & " Empty query!" end if end function
function defineAPIHeader() dim messageHeaders(6) messageHeaders(0) = "Component Name" messageHeaders(1) = "ID" messageHeaders(2) = "API ID" messageHeaders(3) = "API Name" messageHeaders(4) = "Type" messageHeaders(5) = "Mandatory"
' Return the messageHeaders array defineAPIHeader = messageHeaders end function
function exportAPI()
dim getPogrammeTreeContents dim getComponentList dim getComponentList2
getComponentList2 = "SELECT TMF_IIC.name as 'component', TMF_IIC_ID.value as 'compID', TMF_API_ID.value as 'APIID', TMF_API.Name as 'API', " & vbNewLine & _ " Replace(Replace(TMF_API_INST.stereotype, 'TMF_ExposedAPI', 'Exposed API'), 'TMF_RequiredAPI', 'Dependent API') as 'type', " & vbNewLine & _ " TMF_API_INST_REQ.value as 'isMandatory' " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM t_object AS TMF_IIC " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_object AS TMF_API_INST on (TMF_API_INST.ParentID = TMF_IIC.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_object AS TMF_API on (TMF_API_INST.Classifier = TMF_API.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties TMF_IIC_ID on (TMF_IIC_ID.Object_ID = TMF_IIC.Object_ID AND TMF_IIC_ID.property = 'ID') " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties TMF_API_ID on (TMF_API_ID.Object_ID = TMF_API.Object_ID AND TMF_API_ID.property = 'ID') " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties TMF_API_INST_REQ on (TMF_API_INST_REQ.Object_ID = TMF_API_INST.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE TMF_IIC.Stereotype='TMF_IIC' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND (TMF_API_INST.Stereotype = 'TMF_ExposedAPI' OR TMF_API_INST.Stereotype = 'TMF_RequiredAPI' ) " & vbNewLine & _ " AND TMF_IIC.status NOT like 'TODO' "
dim arrayResult arrayResult = getArrayFromQuery(getComponentList2) dim messageHeaders messageHeaders = defineAPIHeader()
if Ubound(arrayResult) > 0 then dim mergedArray mergedArray = AddRowToArray(arrayResult, messageHeaders) excelOutput.createTab "API", mergedArray, true, "TableStyleMedium13" else Session.Output now() & " Empty query!" end if end function
function defineABEHeader() dim messageHeaders(5) messageHeaders(0) = "Component Name" messageHeaders(1) = "ID" messageHeaders(2) = "ABE Name" messageHeaders(3) = "Level" messageHeaders(4) = "ABE Documentation"
' Return the messageHeaders array defineABEHeader = messageHeaders end function
function exportABE()
dim getPogrammeTreeContents dim getComponentList dim getComponentList2
getComponentList2 = "SELECT distinct TMF_ODAComponents.name, TMF_IIC_ID.value, TMF_ABE.Name as TMF_ABE, HierarchiLevel.value as 'level', TMF_ABE.Note as [Docs.Formatted] " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM t_object AS TMF_ODAComponents " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_connector as connector ON TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID = connector.Start_Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties TMF_IIC_ID on (TMF_IIC_ID.Object_ID = TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID AND TMF_IIC_ID.property = 'ID') " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_object AS TMF_ABE ON connector.End_Object_ID= TMF_ABE.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS HierarchiLevel ON (HierarchiLevel.Object_ID = TMF_ABE.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND HierarchiLevel.property = 'HierarchyLevel') " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE TMF_ODAComponents.Stereotype='TMF_IIC' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND TMF_ODAComponents.status NOT like 'TODO' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND TMF_ABE.Stereotype='TMF_ABE' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND connector.Stereotype='TMF_ComponentDependsOnABE' "
dim arrayResult arrayResult = getArrayFromQuery(getComponentList2) dim messageHeaders messageHeaders = defineABEHeader()
if Ubound(arrayResult) > 0 then dim mergedArray mergedArray = AddRowToArray(arrayResult, messageHeaders) excelOutput.createTab "ABE", mergedArray, true, "TableStyleMedium13" else Session.Output now() & " Empty query!" end if end function
function defineFunctionHeader() dim messageHeaders(7) messageHeaders(0) = "Component Name" messageHeaders(1) = "ID" messageHeaders(2) = "Function ID" messageHeaders(4) = "AF lev 2" messageHeaders(5) = "AF lev 1" messageHeaders(6) = "Function Documentation"
' Return the messageHeaders array defineFunctionHeader = messageHeaders end function
function exportFunction()
dim getPogrammeTreeContents dim getComponentList dim getComponentList2
getComponentList2 = "SELECT TMF_ODAComponents.name, CompID.value, FunctionIdentifier.value as 'FunctionID', TMF_Function.Name as TMF_Function, aDomain.Name as 'AggregatedFunctionLev2', aDomain1.Name as AggregatedFunctionlev1, " & vbNewLine & _ " TMF_Function.Note as [Docs.Formatted] " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " ---TMF_ODAComponents.Name as TMF_ODAComponents, " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM t_object AS TMF_ODAComponents " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_connector as connector ON TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID = connector.End_Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_object AS TMF_Function ON connector.Start_Object_ID = TMF_Function.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS CompID ON (CompID.Object_ID = TMF_ODAComponents.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND CompID.property = 'ID') " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS FunctionIdentifier ON (FunctionIdentifier.Object_ID = TMF_Function.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND FunctionIdentifier.property = 'Function Identifier') " & vbNewLine & _ " -- AF lev 2 " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_connector as DomainConnector ON (TMF_Function.Object_ID = DomainConnector.Start_Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND (DomainConnector.Stereotype = 'TMF_DomainAggregatesFunction' OR DomainConnector.Stereotype = 'TMF_AFAggregatesFunction')) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_object AS aDomain ON DomainConnector.End_Object_ID= aDomain.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " -- AF lev 1 " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_connector as Domain1Connector1 ON (aDomain.Object_ID = Domain1Connector1.Start_Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND (Domain1Connector1.Stereotype = 'TMF_DomainAggregatesDomain' OR Domain1Connector1.Stereotype = 'TMF_AFAggregatesAF')) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_object AS aDomain1 ON Domain1Connector1.End_Object_ID= aDomain1.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE TMF_ODAComponents.Stereotype='TMF_IIC' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND TMF_Function.Stereotype='TMF_Function' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND connector.Connector_Type ='Dependency' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND TMF_ODAComponents.status NOT like 'TODO' "
dim arrayResult arrayResult = getArrayFromQuery(getComponentList2) dim messageHeaders messageHeaders = defineFunctionHeader()
if Ubound(arrayResult) > 0 then dim mergedArray mergedArray = AddRowToArray(arrayResult, messageHeaders) excelOutput.createTab "Function", mergedArray, true, "TableStyleMedium13" else Session.Output now() & " Empty query!" end if end function
main

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="gen Excel - FF" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
'[path=\Projects\Project EC\EAC scripts] '[group=EAC scripts]
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Wrappers.Include
' ' Script Name: Export components Tree to Excel, including tabs for Functions, Aggregated Functions amd AF of level 1 ' Author: giu Platania ' Purpose: Exports the Programme tree to an excel file ' Date: 2023-04-11 ' 'name of the output tab const outPutName = "Export Functional Framework" dim excelOutput set excelOutput = new ExcelFile
sub main
'create output tab Repository.CreateOutputTab outPutName Repository.ClearOutput outPutName Repository.EnsureOutputVisible outPutName 'tell the user we are starting
Session.Output now() & " Starting FF Export to Excel V4" 'do the actual export exportFunction() exportAFAll() exportAFlev1() 'tell the user we are finished Session.Output now() & " Finished Export FF Tree to Excel"
end sub
'' Headers function defineHeader() dim messageHeaders(4) messageHeaders(0) = "Vertical" messageHeaders(1) = "Domain" messageHeaders(2) = "AF" messageHeaders(3) = "Description" ' Return the messageHeaders array defineHeader = messageHeaders end function
function defineHeaderAF() dim messageHeaders(5) messageHeaders(0) = "ID" messageHeaders(1) ="UID" messageHeaders(2) = "AF" messageHeaders(3) = "Hierarchy" messageHeaders(4) = "Description" ' Return the messageHeaders array defineHeaderAF = messageHeaders end function
function defineHeaderFunction dim messageHeaders(8) messageHeaders(0) = "Domain" messageHeaders(1) = "AF Lev.1" messageHeaders(2) = "AF Lev.2'" messageHeaders(3) = "Function Name" messageHeaders(4) = "Function ID" messageHeaders(5) = "UID" messageHeaders(6) = "Description" messageHeaders(7) = "Vertical"
' Return the messageHeaders array defineHeaderFunction = messageHeaders end function
function exportAFLev1() Session.Output now() & " Exporting AF Lev 1 " dim getPogrammeTreeContents dim getComponentList dim getComponentList2, getComponentList3
getComponentList2 = "SELECT Distinct " & vbNewLine & _ " 'Vertical' = STUFF( " & vbNewLine & _ " verticalNames.VerticalList, 1, 1, ''), " & vbNewLine & _ " mainDomain.name as 'Domain', aDomain.name as 'AF', aDomain.Note as [Docs.Formatted] " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM t_object AS aDomain " & vbNewLine & _ " left JOIN t_connector as domainConnector ON (aDomain.Object_ID = domainConnector.Start_Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND (domainConnector.Stereotype = 'TMF_DomainAggregatesDomain' OR domainConnector.Stereotype = 'TMF_DomainAggregatesFunction' )) " & vbNewLine & _ " left JOIN t_object AS mainDomain ON domainConnector.End_Object_ID= mainDomain.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " left JOIN t_objectproperties AS HierarchyLevel ON (HierarchyLevel.Object_ID = aDomain.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND HierarchyLevel.property = 'HierarchyLevel') " & vbNewLine & _ " OUTER APPLY ( " & vbNewLine & _ " SELECT (SELECT ',' + aVertical.name " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM t_connector AS VerticalConnector " & vbNewLine & _ " LEFT JOIN t_object AS aVertical ON VerticalConnector.End_Object_ID = aVertical.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE VerticalConnector.Start_Object_ID = aDomain.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND VerticalConnector.Connector_Type = 'Dependency' " & vbNewLine & _ " FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)') AS VerticalList " & vbNewLine & _ " ) AS verticalNames " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE aDomain.Stereotype = 'TMF_AF' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND HierarchyLevel.value = '1' " dim arrayResult 'set arrayResult = CreateObject( "System.Collections.ArrayList" )
arrayResult = getArrayFromQuery(getComponentList2) dim messageHeaders dim i ' as integer dim modifiedString ' as string messageHeaders = defineHeader()
if Ubound(arrayResult) > 0 then
For i = 0 To UBound(arrayResult) modifiedString = StripHTMLCharacters(arrayResult(i, 3)) ' Accessing the string at position 4 (index 3) of each object ' Update the string property in the object arrayResult(i,3) = modifiedString Next
dim mergedArray mergedArray = AddRowToArray(arrayResult, messageHeaders) excelOutput.createTab "AF lev 1", mergedArray, true, "TableStyleMedium13" excelOutput.save ' last tab so close the file excelOutput.close else Session.Output now() & " Empty query!" end if end function
function exportAFAll() Session.Output now() & " Exporting AF all " dim getPogrammeTreeContents dim getComponentList dim getComponentList2 getComponentList2 = "SELECT FunctionID.Value As 'ID', UID.Value as 'UID', aDomain.name as 'AF', HierarchyLevel.value As 'Hierarchy', aDomain.Note as [Docs.Formatted] " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM t_object AS aDomain " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS FunctionID ON (FunctionID.Object_ID = aDomain.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND FunctionID.property = 'FunctionID') " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS UID ON (UID.Object_ID = aDomain.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND UID.property = 'UID') " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS HierarchyLevel ON (HierarchyLevel.Object_ID = aDomain.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND HierarchyLevel.property = 'HierarchyLevel') " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE aDomain.Stereotype = 'TMF_AF' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND aDomain.status NOT LIKE '%TODO%' " & vbNewLine & _ " order by FunctionID.value ASC " dim i ' as integer dim modifiedString ' as string dim arrayResult 'set arrayResult = CreateObject( "System.Collections.ArrayList" ) arrayResult = getArrayFromQuery(getComponentList2) dim messageHeaders messageHeaders = defineHeaderAF()
if IsArray(arrayResult) and UBound(arrayResult) > -1 then
For i = 0 To UBound(arrayResult) modifiedString = StripHTMLCharacters(arrayResult(i, 3)) ' Accessing the string at position 4 (index 3) of each object ' Update the string property in the object arrayResult(i,3) = modifiedString Next dim mergedArray mergedArray = AddRowToArray(arrayResult, messageHeaders) excelOutput.createTab "AF All", mergedArray, true, "TableStyleMedium13" 'excelOutput.save else Session.Output now() & " Empty query!" end if end function
function exportFunction() Session.Output now() & " Exporting Functions" dim getPogrammeTreeContents dim getPogrammeTreeContents2
' new query with aggregation of vertical getPogrammeTreeContents = "SELECT DISTINCT " & vbNewLine & _ " RealDomain.name AS 'Domain', " & vbNewLine & _ " aDomain1.name AS 'AFLev.1', " & vbNewLine & _ " aDomain.name AS 'AFLev.2', " & vbNewLine & _ " TMF_Function.Name AS 'Function', " & vbNewLine & _ " FunctionID.value AS 'FunctionID', " & vbNewLine & _ " SystemID.value AS 'SustemID', " & vbNewLine & _ " TMF_Function.Note as [Docs.Formatted], " & vbNewLine & _ " 'Vertical' = STUFF( " & vbNewLine & _ " verticalNames.VerticalList, 1, 1, '' " & vbNewLine & _ " ) " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM " & vbNewLine & _ " t_object AS TMF_Function " & vbNewLine & _ " Inner JOIN t_connector AS DomainConnector ON " & vbNewLine & _ " TMF_Function.Object_ID = DomainConnector.Start_Object_ID AND " & vbNewLine & _ " ( " & vbNewLine & _ " DomainConnector.Stereotype = 'TMF_DomainAggregatesFunction' OR " & vbNewLine & _ " DomainConnector.Stereotype = 'TMF_AFAggregatesFunction' " & vbNewLine & _ " ) " & vbNewLine & _ " Inner JOIN t_object AS aDomain ON DomainConnector.End_Object_ID = aDomain.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " LEFT JOIN t_connector AS Domain1Connector1 ON " & vbNewLine & _ " aDomain.Object_ID = Domain1Connector1.Start_Object_ID AND " & vbNewLine & _ " ( " & vbNewLine & _ " Domain1Connector1.Stereotype = 'TMF_DomainAggregatesDomain' OR " & vbNewLine & _ " Domain1Connector1.Stereotype = 'TMF_AFAggregatesAF' " & vbNewLine & _ " ) " & vbNewLine & _ " LEFT JOIN t_object AS aDomain1 ON Domain1Connector1.End_Object_ID = aDomain1.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " LEFT JOIN t_connector AS DomainConnector2 ON " & vbNewLine & _ " aDomain1.Object_ID = DomainConnector2.Start_Object_ID AND " & vbNewLine & _ " ( " & vbNewLine & _ " DomainConnector2.Stereotype = 'TMF_DomainAggregatesDomain' OR " & vbNewLine & _ " DomainConnector2.Stereotype = 'TMF_DomainAggregatesFunction' " & vbNewLine & _ " ) " & vbNewLine & _ " LEFT JOIN t_object AS RealDomain ON " & vbNewLine & _ " DomainConnector2.End_Object_ID = RealDomain.Object_ID AND " & vbNewLine & _ " RealDomain.Stereotype = 'TMF_Domain' " & vbNewLine & _ " LEFT JOIN t_objectproperties AS FunctionID ON " & vbNewLine & _ " FunctionID.Object_ID = TMF_Function.Object_ID AND " & vbNewLine & _ " FunctionID.property = 'Function Identifier' " & vbNewLine & _ " LEFT JOIN t_objectproperties AS SystemID ON " & vbNewLine & _ " SystemID.Object_ID = TMF_Function.Object_ID AND " & vbNewLine & _ " SystemID.property = 'System ID' " & vbNewLine & _ " OUTER APPLY ( " & vbNewLine & _ " SELECT (SELECT ',' + aVertical.name " & vbNewLine & _ " FROM t_connector AS VerticalConnector " & vbNewLine & _ " LEFT JOIN t_object AS aVertical ON VerticalConnector.End_Object_ID = aVertical.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE VerticalConnector.Start_Object_ID = aDomain1.Object_ID " & vbNewLine & _ " AND VerticalConnector.Connector_Type = 'Dependency' " & vbNewLine & _ " FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)') AS VerticalList " & vbNewLine & _ " ) AS verticalNames " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " WHERE TMF_Function.Stereotype = 'TMF_Function' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND TMF_Function.status NOT LIKE '%TODO%' "
dim arrayResult 'set arrayResult = CreateObject( "System.Collections.ArrayList" )
arrayResult = getArrayFromQuery(getPogrammeTreeContents) dim messageHeaders dim i ' as integer dim modifiedString ' as string messageHeaders = defineHeaderFunction()
if IsArray(arrayResult) and UBound(arrayResult) > -1 then For i = 0 To UBound(arrayResult) modifiedString = StripHTMLCharacters(arrayResult(i, 5)) ' Accessing the string at position 4 (index 3) of each object ' Update the string property in the object arrayResult(i,5) = modifiedString Next dim mergedArray mergedArray = AddRowToArray(arrayResult, messageHeaders) excelOutput.createTab "Functions", mergedArray, true, "TableStyleMedium13" 'excelOutput.saveTab end if end function
Function StripHTMLCharacters(str) 'Session.Output now() & " stripping HTML" On Error Resume Next Dim htmlRegex Set htmlRegex = CreateObject("VBScript.RegExp") If htmlRegex Is Nothing Then ' The VBScript.RegExp library is missing; return the original string Session.Output now() & " The VBScript.RegExp library is missing; return the original string" StripHTMLCharacters = str Else 'Session.Output now() & " The VBScript.RegExp library is present" htmlRegex.IgnoreCase = True htmlRegex.Global = True ' Define the regular expression pattern to match HTML tags and entities htmlRegex.Pattern = "<[^>]+>|&[^;]+;"
' Replace HTML tags and entities with an empty string StripHTMLCharacters = htmlRegex.Replace(str, "") end if End Function
main

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="conf Docx - Components" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
' ' ' Script Name: conf Docx - Components ' Author: Giu Platania ' Purpose: setup the generator to generate a TMFCXXX IIC component ' Instructions: ' 1. Ensure that a template called 'TMFCXXX_Appendix" is present under Resources.Document Publ;ishing.Custom Template.Components Appendix ' 2. Navigate to a diagram where the IIC is located ' 3. RIght click on the IIC, select specialize.scripts.conf Docx - Components ' 4. navigate to the MODA.Documents.Document Generator.Components Documents.Component Document Generation ' ' Date: 2023-04-19 '
class DocumentSelectedComponent
' Define a method to set the SearchValue tagged value of the specified element Public Sub SetSearchValue(elementGuid) Dim searchValueElement ' main element Set searchValueElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid("{93FA3D76-E022-4737-A34E-981F0145DCFA}") Dim taggedValues Set taggedValues = searchValueElement.TaggedValues Dim taggedValue For Each taggedValue In taggedValues If taggedValue.Name = "SearchValue" Then taggedValue.Value = elementGuid taggedValue.Update() Exit For End If Next searchValueElement.Update() End Sub
Public Sub UpdateAppendixTemplate(element) Dim RTFTemplateName RTFTemplateName = "" Dim taggedValue For Each taggedValue In element.taggedValues If taggedValue.Name = "ID" Then RTFTemplateName = RTFTemplateName+taggedValue.Value+"_Appendix" Exit For End If Next Dim endElement ' Model Document appendix ' TODO need first to look for the existence of the template
Set endElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid("{846C6AEB-0BCD-4f9f-84CE-F3AA881B981C}") For Each taggedValue In endElement.taggedValues If taggedValue.Name = "RTFTemplate" Then taggedValue.Value = RTFTemplateName 'taggedValue.Value = "{0414AC96-337F-4ead-B819-21EF097AEE2F}" taggedValue.Update() Exit For End If Next endElement.Update() End Sub
' Define a method to open the Generate Documentation dialog ' NOT IN USE Public Sub OpenGenerateDocumentation Dim docGenerator As EA.DocumentGenerator Set docGenerator = Repository.CreateDocumentGenerator() docGenerator.NewDocument "" docGenerator.DocumentElement "{AF22BFE9-E653-4d73-9FFF-CBB5F2CA1CEC}", 0 End Sub
public sub UpdateMasterDocument(Element) Dim masterElement Dim taggedValue dim componentID
Set componentID = Element.TaggedValues.GetByName("ID")
' Model Document appendix ' TODO need first to look for the existence of the template
Set masterElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid("{F2A36A2B-DF38-4f49-9699-5279DB9320F1}") ' e.g. TMFC001: Product Catalog Management v1.1.0 masterElement.Name = componentID.value & ": " & Element.Name & " v." & Element.version
Set taggedValue = masterElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("ReportTitle") taggedValue.Value = componentID.value taggedValue.Update()
Set taggedValue = masterElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("ReportName") taggedValue.Value = Element.name taggedValue.Update()
' more efficient approach
Set taggedValue = masterElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("ReportVersion") taggedValue.Value = Element.version taggedValue.Update() masterElement.Update() End Sub
end class
' ' Diagram Script main function ' sub OnDiagramScript()
dim diagramID ' the diagram ID where the generator is located diagramID = "5978" dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram set currentDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram()
if not currentDiagram is nothing then ' Get a reference to any selected objects dim selectedObjects as EA.Collection set selectedObjects = currentDiagram.SelectedObjects Session.Output now() & " # selected " & selectedObjects.Count
' Get a reference to the current element dim currentElement as EA.Element '' this is wrong, you want to select in the diagram '' set currentElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() else Session.Prompt "This script requires a diagram to be visible", promptOK end if
If selectedObjects.Count > 0 Then Set currentElement = Repository.GetElementByID(selectedObjects(0).ElementID) End If
'' Giu: this needs to be the stereotype Session.Output now() & " selected: " & currentElement.Stereotype If currentElement.Stereotype <> "TMF_IIC" Then Session.Prompt "ERROR! This script requires an IIC to be selected a" & currentElement.Stereotype , promptOK Set currentElement = Nothing End If
if not currentElement is nothing then dim genDoc set genDoc = new DocumentSelectedComponent genDoc.SetSearchValue(currentElement.ElementGUID) genDoc.UpdateAppendixTemplate(currentElement) genDoc.UpdateMasterDocument(currentElement) Repository.OpenDiagram(diagramID) Session.Prompt currentElement.Name & " configured! Please start the generation with F8", promptOK end if
end sub
OnDiagramScript

sub main
'create output tab Repository.CreateOutputTab outPutName Repository.ClearOutput outPutName Repository.EnsureOutputVisible outPutName
'tell the user we are starting 'Repository.WriteOutput outPutName, now() & " Starting Export metric processes Tree " Session.Output "Starting Export Metric Tree" ' create the file set excelOutput = new ExcelFile
exportmetricnotfullydevelopedTree exportmetricTree
' close the file excelOutput.save ' close file excelOutput.close 'tell the user we are finished Session.Output " Finished Export Metric Tree '"
end sub
function exportmetricTree()
dim getPogrammeTreeContents getPogrammeTreeContents = "select CAST(tid.value as int) as tid, mgroup.value as 'group', maturity.value as 'maturity', Metric.Name as Metric, metrictype.value as 'metricType', " & vbNewLine & _ " category1.value as 'category1', category2.value as 'category2', category3.value as 'category3', " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " Metric.Note as 'Description', units.value as 'units', process.name as eTOMmapping, ABE.name as ABE, " & vbNewLine & _ " txtformula.value as 'textFormula', busvalue.Notes as 'BusinessValue' " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " from ((((((((((((((t_object Metric " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS units ON units.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS busvalue ON busvalue.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS txtformula ON txtformula.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS category3 ON category3.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS category2 ON category2.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS category1 ON category1.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS maturity ON maturity.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS mgroup ON mgroup.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS metrictype ON metrictype.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS tid ON (tid.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID AND tid.property='tid')) " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " full join t_connector con on con.End_Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " full join t_object process on process.Object_ID = con.Start_Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " full join t_connector con2 on con2.Start_Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " full join t_object ABE on ABE.Object_ID = con2.End_Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " where " & vbNewLine & _ " Metric.Stereotype='TMF_Metric' " & vbNewLine & _ " and process.Stereotype='TMF_Process' " & vbNewLine & _ " and con.Stereotype= 'TMF_isMeasuredBy' " & vbNewLine & _ " and con2.Connector_Type='Dependency' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND ABE.Stereotype='TMF_ABE' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND metrictype.property='metrictype' " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " AND mgroup.property='group' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND maturity.property='maturity' " & vbNewLine & _ " and category1.property = 'category1' " & vbNewLine & _ " and category2.property = 'category2' " & vbNewLine & _ " and category3.property = 'category3' " & vbNewLine & _ " and txtformula.property = 'txtformula' " & vbNewLine & _ " and busvalue.property = 'busvalue' " & vbNewLine & _ " and units.property = 'units' " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " AND ( maturity.value ='3-Validated' OR maturity.value='4-Normalized' OR maturity.value='5-Benchmarked') " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " UNION " & vbNewLine & _ " select CAST(tid.value as int) as tid, mgroup.value as 'group', maturity.value as 'maturity', Metric.Name as Metric, " & vbNewLine & _ " category1.value as 'category1', category2.value as 'category2', category3.value as 'category3', " & vbNewLine & _ " metrictype.value as 'metricType', units.value as 'units', " & vbNewLine & _ " Metric.Note as 'Description', process.value as eTOMmapping, ABE.value as ABE, " & vbNewLine & _ " txtformula.value as 'textFormula', busvalue.Notes as 'BusinessValue' " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " from ((((((((((((t_object Metric " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS ABE ON ABE.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS process ON process.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS units ON units.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS busvalue ON busvalue.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS txtformula ON txtformula.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS category3 ON category3.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS category2 ON category2.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS category1 ON category1.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS maturity ON (maturity.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID AND maturity.property='maturity')) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS mgroup ON mgroup.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS metrictype ON metrictype.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS tid ON tid.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) " & vbNewLine & _ " where " & vbNewLine & _ " Metric.Stereotype='TMF_Metric' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND ABE.property='business objects' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND process.property = 'etommapping' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND metrictype.property='metrictype' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND tid.property='tid' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND mgroup.property='group' " & vbNewLine & _ " " & vbNewLine & _ " and category1.property = 'category1' " & vbNewLine & _ " and category2.property = 'category2' " & vbNewLine & _ " and category3.property = 'category3' " & vbNewLine & _ " and txtformula.property = 'txtformula' " & vbNewLine & _ " and busvalue.property = 'busvalue' " & vbNewLine & _ " and units.property = 'units' " & vbNewLine & _ " AND ( maturity.value ='3-Validated' OR maturity.value='4-Normalized' OR maturity.value='5-Benchmarked') "
dim arrayResult arrayResult = getArrayFromQuery(getPogrammeTreeContents)
dim messageHeaders messageHeaders = defineHeader() if IsArray(arrayResult) and UBound(arrayResult) > -1 then dim mergedArray mergedArray = AddRowToArray(arrayResult, messageHeaders)
excelOutput.createTab "METRICS-Main", mergedArray, true, "TableStyleMedium13" 'excelOutput.saveTab 'excelOutput.close end if
end function
function defineHeader() dim messageHeaders(14) messageHeaders(0) = "tid" messageHeaders(1) = "Group" messageHeaders(2) = "Maturity" messageHeaders(3) = "Metric" messageHeaders(4) = "Metric Type" messageHeaders(5) = "Category 1" messageHeaders(6) = "Category 2" messageHeaders(7) = "Category 3" messageHeaders(8) = "Description" messageHeaders(9) = "units" messageHeaders(10) = "etomMapping" messageHeaders(11) = "ABE" messageHeaders(12) = "Text Formula" messageHeaders(13) = "Business Value"
' Return the messageHeaders array defineHeader = messageHeaders end function
