Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Relationships -> switch type" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script Name: Diagram: Retype & Restereotype Relationships in Current Diagram ' Author: Giu Platania ' Purpose: Evaluate all elements on the current diagram, collect their relationships ' into a dictionary, then convert matching connectors from ' (TypeOrigin, StereotypeOrigin) (TypeDestination, StereotypeDestination). ' Date: 2025-08-26 ' Version: 1.0 ' ' Notes: ' - Uses only Session.Output for logging. ' - Designed as a Diagram Script; entry point is OnDiagramScript. ' - Uses Scripting.Dictionary keyed by ConnectorGUID to avoid duplicates when multiple ' selected elements share the same connector. ' - Changes both Connector.Type and Connector.Stereotype (also touches StereotypeEx to keep EA in sync). ' - Example mapping default below can be edited inline.
Option Explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
' ======================= USER CONFIG ======================= ' Define the origin and destination mapping here. Edit as needed. Dim TypeOrigin, StereotypeOrigin Dim TypeDestination, StereotypeDestination
TypeOrigin = "Generalization" StereotypeOrigin = "" TypeDestination = "Generalization" StereotypeDestination= "TMF_SchemaGeneralizesSchema" ' ===========================================================
' ---------------- Output helpers ---------------- Sub EnsureOutput() On Error Resume Next Repository.EnsureOutputVisible "Script" On Error GoTo 0 End Sub
Sub LOG(msg) On Error Resume Next Session.Output CStr(Now) & ": " & msg On Error GoTo 0 End Sub
' ---------------- Entry: Diagram Script ---------------- Sub OnDiagramScript() ' fresh console Repository.ClearOutput "Script" EnsureOutput
Dim d As EA.Diagram Set d = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram() If d Is Nothing Then Session.Prompt "Open a diagram and run the script again.", promptOK Exit Sub End If
Session.Output "Diagram: " & d.Name
' build dictionary of connectors for all elements shown on the diagram Dim connDict Set connDict = BuildConnectorDictionary(d)
Session.Output "Collected connectors: " & DictCount(connDict) If DictCount(connDict) = 0 Then Session.Output "No connectors found. Nothing to do." Exit Sub End If
' perform transformation TransformConnectors connDict, TypeOrigin, StereotypeOrigin, TypeDestination, StereotypeDestination
' refresh diagram to reflect updates Repository.ReloadDiagram d.DiagramID Session.Output "Done." End Sub
' ---------------- Build connector dictionary ---------------- Function BuildConnectorDictionary(d) Dim dict 'as dictionary Dim i dim dobj As EA.DiagramObject, dim el As EA.Element dim c As EA.Connector Set dict = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
Session.Output "Scanning diagram objects: " & d.DiagramObjects.Count
For i = 0 To d.DiagramObjects.Count - 1 Set dobj = d.DiagramObjects.GetAt(i) Set el = Repository.GetElementByID(dobj.ElementID) If Not el Is Nothing Then Session.Output " Element: " & el.Name & " (ID=" & el.ElementID & ") connectors=" & el.Connectors.Count For Each c In el.Connectors If Not dict.Exists(c.ConnectorGUID) Then dict.Add c.ConnectorGUID, c End If Next End If Next
Set BuildConnectorDictionary = dict End Function
' ---------------- Transform connectors ---------------- Sub TransformConnectors(connDict, tOrigin, sOrigin, tDest, sDest) Dim keys Dim lb dim ub dim i dim guid dim c As EA.Connector
If connDict Is Nothing Then Session.Output "TransformConnectors: connector dictionary is Nothing" Exit Sub End If
On Error Resume Next keys = connDict.Keys If Err.Number <> 0 Then Session.Output "TransformConnectors: failed to read keys from dictionary" Err.Clear On Error GoTo 0 Exit Sub End If On Error GoTo 0
lb = LBound(keys) ub = UBound(keys) If ub < lb Then Session.Output "TransformConnectors: dictionary has no keys" Exit Sub End If
Session.Output "Transforming connectors where Type='" & tOrigin & "' AND Stereotype='" & sOrigin & "'" Session.Output " set Type='" & tDest & "', Stereotype='" & sDest & "'"
Dim changedCount: changedCount = 0 Dim skippedCount: skippedCount = 0
For i = lb To ub guid = CStr(keys(i)) Set c = connDict.Item(guid) If c Is Nothing Then skippedCount = skippedCount + 1 Else Dim matchType, matchStereo matchType = (StrComp(c.Type, tOrigin, vbTextCompare) = 0) ' Prefer StereotypeEx if present, else Stereotype Dim currentStereo currentStereo = c.Stereotype If Len(c.StereotypeEx) > 0 Then currentStereo = c.StereotypeEx matchStereo = (InStr(1, "," & LCase(currentStereo) & ",", "," & LCase(sOrigin) & ",", vbTextCompare) > 0) Or _ (StrComp(currentStereo, sOrigin, vbTextCompare) = 0)
If matchType And matchStereo Then Session.Output " * Match: GUID=" & c.ConnectorGUID & " | Type=" & c.Type & " | Stereo=" & currentStereo c.Type = tDest c.Stereotype = sDest c.StereotypeEx = sDest If c.Update() Then changedCount = changedCount + 1 Session.Output " Updated to Type='" & c.Type & "', Stereo='" & c.Stereotype & "'" Else Session.Output " Update FAILED: " & c.GetLastError() End If Else skippedCount = skippedCount + 1 End If End If Next
Session.Output "Summary: changed=" & changedCount & ", skipped=" & skippedCount End Sub
' ---------------- Utility: dictionary count ---------------- Function DictCount(d) On Error Resume Next If d Is Nothing Then DictCount = 0 Else DictCount = d.Count End If If Err.Number <> 0 Then DictCount = 0 Err.Clear End If On Error GoTo 0 End Function
' ------------- Run as Diagram Script ------------- OnDiagramScript

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Relationships -> add information" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script Name: Normalize Diagram Associations ' Author: Giu Platania ' Purpose: Iterate all connectors shown on the current diagram and, for those matching a ' configurable Type & Stereotype, force end properties as configured: ' - Source (Client end): multiplicity + navigability ' - Target (Supplier end): multiplicity + navigability ' This script only touches connectors visible on the active diagram, and logs every change. ' Date: 2025-08-28 ' Version: 1.0 ' Option Explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
' ------------------------------ ' Configuration (edit here) ' ------------------------------ ' Diagram Output tab name Const OUT_TAB = "Normalize Diagram Associations"
' Connector filter Const CFG_CONNECTOR_TYPE = "Association" Const CFG_CONNECTOR_STEREOTYPE = "TMF_Schema_Associates_Schema" ' e.g. "TMF_TMF_Schema_Associates_Schema"
' End settings to apply when a connector matches the filter Const CFG_SOURCE_MULTIPLICITY = "1" ' Client end multiplicity Const CFG_TARGET_MULTIPLICITY = "0..*" ' Supplier end multiplicity Const CFG_SOURCE_NAVIGABILITY = "Non-Navigable" ' Client end navigability: "Navigable" | "Non-Navigable" | "Unspecified" Const CFG_TARGET_NAVIGABILITY = "Navigable" ' Supplier end navigability
' --------------------------------- ' Utility: output and safe formatting ' --------------------------------- Private Sub EnsureOutput() On Error Resume Next Repository.CreateOutputTab OUT_TAB Repository.ClearOutput OUT_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible OUT_TAB On Error GoTo 0 End Sub
Private Sub LOG(msg) On Error Resume Next Repository.WriteOutput OUT_TAB, CStr(Now()) & ": " & msg, 0 On Error GoTo 0 End Sub
Private Function NameOfElement(elem) If elem Is Nothing Then NameOfElement = "<none>" Else NameOfElement = elem.Name & " (#" & elem.ElementID & ")" End If End Function
' ------------------------------ ' Entry point ' ------------------------------ Sub NormalizeAssociationsOnDiagram() Dim diag As EA.Diagram Dim dlink As EA.DiagramLink Dim conn As EA.Connector Dim clientElem As EA.Element Dim supplierElem As EA.Element Dim touchedCount, skippedCount
EnsureOutput LOG "Start applying settings to connectors on current diagram"
Set diag = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram() If diag Is Nothing Then MsgBox "Open a diagram before running this script.", vbExclamation, "Normalize Diagram Associations" LOG "Abort: no active diagram" Exit Sub End If
LOG "Diagram: '" & diag.Name & "' (ID=" & diag.DiagramID & ") | Links=" & diag.DiagramLinks.Count
touchedCount = 0 skippedCount = 0
' Iterate only connectors that are actually displayed on this diagram Dim i For i = 0 To diag.DiagramLinks.Count - 1 Set dlink = diag.DiagramLinks.GetAt(i) Set conn = Repository.GetConnectorByID(dlink.ConnectorID) If conn Is Nothing Then skippedCount = skippedCount + 1 LOG "Skip: DiagramLink #" & i & " connector not found (ID=" & dlink.ConnectorID & ")" Else ' Filter by Type & Stereotype If LCase(conn.Type) = LCase(CFG_CONNECTOR_TYPE) _ And LCase(conn.Stereotype) = LCase(CFG_CONNECTOR_STEREOTYPE) Then
Set clientElem = Repository.GetElementByID(conn.ClientID) Set supplierElem = Repository.GetElementByID(conn.SupplierID)
LOG "Match: " & conn.Type & ":" & conn.Stereotype & _ " | " & NameOfElement(clientElem) & " > " & NameOfElement(supplierElem) & _ " | ConnID=" & conn.ConnectorID
' Apply settings to the ends conn.ClientEnd.Cardinality = CFG_SOURCE_MULTIPLICITY conn.SupplierEnd.Cardinality = CFG_TARGET_MULTIPLICITY conn.ClientEnd.Navigable = CFG_SOURCE_NAVIGABILITY conn.SupplierEnd.Navigable = CFG_TARGET_NAVIGABILITY
If conn.Update() Then touchedCount = touchedCount + 1 LOG " Updated: ClientEnd(Mult='" & conn.ClientEnd.Cardinality & "', Nav='" & conn.ClientEnd.Navigable & _ "') | SupplierEnd(Mult='" & conn.SupplierEnd.Cardinality & "', Nav='" & conn.SupplierEnd.Navigable & "')" Else skippedCount = skippedCount + 1 LOG " ERROR: Update failed " & conn.GetLastError() End If Else skippedCount = skippedCount + 1 LOG "Skip: ConnID=" & conn.ConnectorID & " Type='" & conn.Type & "' Stereo='" & conn.Stereotype & "'" End If End If Next
' Refresh UI Repository.ReloadDiagram diag.DiagramID
LOG "Done updated=" & touchedCount & ", skipped=" & skippedCount End Sub
' Convenience: allow run by name NormalizeAssociationsOnDiagram()
